story:
Believe in your own power!



 



We are passionate about discovering the human mind. Our fascination with the possibilities and power of mind brought us to this invention. We wanted experience this force on our own. We believe that if we learn how to harness that power we can achieve great things and even produce our own miracles.


Admit that we are not the only ones! Have you dreamed of superpower, which make it possible to move the objects with your mind!

We are still keeping this dream alive! And now comes the time to fulfill it. We think that in a world full of doubt the best way to know it is real is to do it yourself. We are not telling you just an interesting story. We are showing you it happening!

Remember that we live in an infinite universe. Our current level of awareness let us understand a lot, but there is still so much going on. Don’t limit your potential for growth.  Discover how great you can be.

So here we are – a group of dreamers, who put theirs dreams into action. We made this little box to show that not only it is possible, but you can learn how to do it too! Your mind holds power.

We are proud of the difference we make!



                                                  

 
  Why support us? 

* together with us you can be a maker of a new-generation-technology, where the mind is over matter not otherwise,

* this is like discovering new world together; this is exciting and full of adrenaline - 

* you are helping us to carry out the research on other possibilities which this invention is having or can have; discover new objects which our mind can control with help of our adapter,

* take into your mind exploration the attitude of scientist, experimenter and adventurer,

* discover in practice the powerful force of your mind.


  


About our invention

Our product is ready to use however we are still improving it. It means that our big vision has only partly been translated into product. 

This adapter can be connected to many different devices/ toys which are working with 5 V- 15 V DC power supply.  You are switching it on and off by means of the brainwaves signals (alpha: relaxation, beta: concentration) measured by neurofeedback headset.


         


At this moment after several tests the prototype of our adapter is working properly with following items:

1) Slot car race track "Carrera - Evolution Turbo Drift". Cars are racing faster or slower it depends accordingly of the level of concentration or relaxation.

2) Automatic Floor Dusting “Virobi RoboMop”. Robot is switching on after the intended LoC (Level of Concentration) or LoR (Level of Relaxation) was achieved, and turning off when your brainwaves are below Loc/LoR.

3) LED panel 12V. Diodes are functioning in two ways: brightness of light can be controlled – if you are concentrated they are lighting brighter and the second way is: switching on after the intended LoC or LoR was achieved, and turning off when your brainwaves are below Loc/LoR.

LoC/LoR can be changed smoothly, to use from beginners to advanced skilled users.

Most important information eg. your current concentration/meditation, headset signal quality will be displayed on build-in OLED screen


      


Our mission!

  

Children

Many of attempts at making a play for children both educational and fun end up being neither.

                                          

         


Are you helping your child to understand that some things are not fun or interesting but we have to do it anyway because there is no other way to learn? Your child is collecting the less-than-interesting tasks, mostly boring, because later come the time to enjoy. 

You don’t have to split the tasks up into groups of boring learning and funny playing.

In the fact one of the keys to concentration is genuine interest in a subject. Something what is boring can’t let us concentrate enough long. On the other hand something what is new and not familiar doesn’t hold our concentration.

Our invention makes a subtle balance between this two – familiarity and novelty. It forces a child to concentrate so the car keep going. If the concentration increase, the car is moving faster! It is not to easy that you become bored and not to hard to feel unable to concentrate!


 People with disabilities

Some disabilities are excluding people from everyday life activities. Many of physically inactive people need help with the day-to-day tasks, such as doing everyday housework for example. Although there are organizations providing the help or family is taking the primary role as caregiver, there is still possibility that the tasks with which an individual requires assistance can be done with help of some home appliances adjusted to our adapter.  


      


The activities of daily living discussed here include tasks of basic care or simple physical needs, so the usage of our adapter can increase the quality of everyday life. This facilitate than lees active engagement or assistance from caregiver to disabled person. Mostly the help is asked in daily life activities as dusting, tiding up, moving inside residence, shopping for groceries, washing, dressing or taking medication. If we enable to do only some of this activities with help of brainwave signals going through our device it will revolutionize theirs life.


Concentration training      

Does your child need better focus? You have already tried to achieve this by many solutions like reducing sugar intake, increasing protein levels, giving sufficient sleep, removing distractions at home, creating the mood for concentration with calming music or removing fluorescent lights?


     

                                                                                 

Figure it out! The extensive practice allows for the pathways of concentration! There is no better moment for your child to exercise this than time of having fun.

Active children focus better! You know it yourself the best that to accomplish any task you need to concentrate your attention. It is hard enough for you to be able to focus for a time! You can meditate or study the techniques for improving focus and concentration. How to share your knowledge with a child?  The best way to achieve this is to play together.

You are not only showing your kids that the game is fun - but most important -  you are letting them decide that concentration itself is really cool! We are nor going from the place that learning is unpleasant. The requirement for learning is concentration. This is how to improve  concentration without forcing your child to stay in one place long enough focusing and following the instructions.


Relaxation background     

There is no doubt that everyone no more or less is struggling with stress. Even our children are not free of its influence. The key to long and pleasant life is to avoid worries, tension and stress. However there are so many tasks to accomplish and so little time to relax. How to find enough time to reduce stress, transform the way you live in a positive way without quitting everything at the same moment? 

   

    

                      

You can try by doing some of your activities with help of our technology. Because relaxation is one of required condition to move the objects which are driven by the power of our mind. You can be calmed by housework. This helps you train the meditation state. Pleasant chore – we can say! 

For a child this is a real advantage too. It is not so easy to get a child to do something what is having noting to do with fun and play. Here is another level coming to game. Relaxation is necessary in the play!


 You, yourself and you!  

Usually within the scope of many question there is this common one: “What will I get from it?”


    


The answer is - You will know you better! Aren’t you curious how your mind is working? You can not only know the function of your brain but train it to higher achievements. 

Besides you have opportunity to reduce stress in you life. You can do this through the play with children. They are taking your mind off stressful things and during the play you are using concentration and relaxation. 

Finally, you are participating in developing process of our technology. We encourage you to give us any feedback, which help us make this adapter matching various needs.  

                

“Goals are dreams with deadline

We need 553 000 USD to develop our technology and start in the future commercial manufacturing (by saving he highest quality of our merchandise).  Our interest is to introduce new advanced technology, which make it possible to control various devices with brainwave signals more precisely. Components for development like this are obviously more expensive so the production costs are increasing in proportion. We want to provide our project in best tools to construct electronic elements we need. This are then the main costs for now.

     


In next 2-3 years we want to focus on other application for technology based on the brainwave signals. We undertake an experimental projects not only for education or entertainment but also for supporting by treatment of neurological diseases or moving disabilities. To the best of our technology, our work is combining the existing devices with adapter which can move this objects by using brainwave signals. 


Even if we only approach but don’t achieve our goal, we wont stop our work. Motivated by all achievements up to now we will test various electronic devices, capture the brainwave signals and perform the universal adapter, which will educate, train, entertain, assist and help in everyday life. Finally, if we raise less money that our goal is, we start our work with the plan only customizing the timeline for it. 

                                

           


Keep calm! Our team is awesome!

As a team we are committed to being among the best inventors is how we support and improve the product we build. We try o be transparent about our developing process and our strategy. We believe that this helps us to attract yours attention and receive your opinion. And also because we want to involve you in what we create.


Support our team and help us make this technology better! Our invention is unique and so our perks are too. We hope that you will like it!

             

            

           


15 $ <

Everyone who contributed to our Crystal Waves Project at least 15 $ will be participating in prize draw after campaign.

The awards are:

1) grand prix – original EarlyBird slot car track from our movie with two adapters and Virobi RoboMop. All this devices with our team members signatures

2) special prize – 7 days stay in Poland. Fully paid and with many attractions organized by Crystal Waves Team. We are the best company to visit the best places in Poland and spend here unforgettable moments!

3) 10 sets of full Crystal Waves version – that means 10 sets which are including 1 slot car track + 2 headphone sets + 2 Crystal Waves adapters

                                          

50 $ <

Additional to every more than 50 $ contribution we will send you postcard from Krakow with all Happy Crystal Waves Team signatures

                                             


Other Ways You Can Help

It is not always all about the money. There are another ways you can support our project if you feel like you want to participate in it, you can…

* link our campaign to your Facebook/ Tweeter account. Let your friends know about us with WhatsApp or other messenger. You can easily use Indiegogo share tools.

* make with us a list with others possible applications for our adapter

* share with us your ideas, where this adapter can be welcome 

* say “hello” to us and let us know that you are there!


Risk &challenges                   

 We think that trying something new often requires courage and is itself the benefit. Trying something new forces us to grow and this growth seems to require we take a new action first. This adopting a new attitude and also a new way of thinking. We are confronting challenges by taking a risks. We are aware of our imperfection but “man errs as long as he doth strive”. Here are some questions we asked our self trying to improve this project.


   

                                                 

Q: Is this early bird product free from technical problems?

A:  The newly discovered technology has always its weaknesses but we are testing our adapter all the time. Many of questions, yours questions, which we are expecting after release should help us to solve this problems.

Q: Not everyone has the same power in concentration. What if my child can’t concentrate enough to move the car?

A: Our adapter has potentiometer which let you reduce threshold of concentration or relaxation. 

Q: How can I know if this adapter will be compatible with my device, so it can work?

A: We are still updating a list with items and devices which are working together with our adapter. Concerning both headphones and receiving sets like car racing track.

Please do not hesitate to contact us when you have other question to ask: contact@crystalwaves.com

Drodzy Rodacy!

Kampania po polsku znajduje się tutaj https://drive.google.com/file/d/0B4iDxPJ4o-DuS3dmZ2ZKN1FfUVhkUVRDWnEwSlRhODZmcWFz/view, zapraszamy Was serdecznie nie tylko do wsparia finansowego lecz rowniez do pomocy w promocji naszego projektu. Polacy, pokazmy ze potrafimy dzialac razem w szczytnym celu!

Many thanks!


Crystal waves team :)
story_txt:
Believe in your own power!  


We are passionate about discovering the human mind. Our fascination with the possibilities and power of mind brought us to this invention. We wanted experience this force on our own. We believe that if we learn how to harness that power we can achieve great things and even produce our own miracles.



Admit that we are not the only ones! Have you dreamed of superpower, which make it possible to move the objects with your mind!
We are still keeping this dream alive! And now comes the time to fulfill it. We think that in a world full of doubt the best way to know it is real is to do it yourself. We are not telling you just an interesting story. We are showing you it happening!
Remember that we live in an infinite universe. Our current level of awareness let us understand a lot, but there is still so much going on. Don’t limit your potential for growth.  Discover how great you can be.
So here we are – a group of dreamers, who put theirs dreams into action. We made this little box to show that not only it is possible, but you can learn how to do it too! Your mind holds power.
We are proud of the difference we make!



                                                  

 

  Why support us? 


* together with us you can be a maker of a new-generation-technology, where the mind is over matter not otherwise,
* this is like discovering new world together; this is exciting and full of adrenaline - 
* you are helping us to carry out the research on other possibilities which this invention is having or can have; discover new objects which our mind can control with help of our adapter,
* take into your mind exploration the attitude of scientist, experimenter and adventurer,
* discover in practice the powerful force of your mind.


  
About our invention



Our product is ready to use however we are still improving it. It means that our big vision has only partly been translated into product. 
This adapter can be connected to many different devices/ toys which are working with 5 V- 15 V DC power supply.  You are switching it on and off by means of the brainwaves signals (alpha: relaxation, beta: concentration) measured by neurofeedback headset. 


         


At this moment after several tests the prototype of our adapter is working properly with following items:
1) Slot car race track "Carrera - Evolution Turbo Drift". Cars are racing faster or slower it depends accordingly of the level of concentration or relaxation.
2) Automatic Floor Dusting “Virobi RoboMop”. Robot is switching on after the intended LoC (Level of Concentration) or LoR (Level of Relaxation) was achieved, and turning off when your brainwaves are below Loc/LoR.
3) LED panel 12V. Diodes are functioning in two ways: brightness of light can be controlled – if you are concentrated they are lighting brighter and the second way is: switching on after the intended LoC or LoR was achieved, and turning off when your brainwaves are below Loc/LoR.
LoC/LoR can be changed smoothly, to use from beginners to advanced skilled users.
Most important information eg. your current concentration/meditation, headset signal quality will be displayed on build-in OLED screen

story:
Update #3: First stretch goal reached! Thanks to your generosity U-TOUCH is now able to provide 20 Computers for the business center in Gulu, Uganda!

Update #2: All donations made through 12/31/2013 will be matched by an anonymous donor. Double your impact and give the gift of opportunity before the year-end deadline!

Update #1: We reached our goal to raise funds to purchase 15 computers for the business center in Uganda!  These computers will enable hundreds of young people to learn computer skills and access the internet each month.

Stretch Goals

$6700 -  5 additional computers, for a total of 20, providing training to hundreds more eager youth each year.

$7500 - Color printer to provide printing services to local businesses. 

$10,000 - Badge and ID card printer to provide an additional income stream for the business center. 100% of the profit from the printing and copying services goes back to the centers in Uganda to provide free computer training.

Our Story

After the 20 year LRA war, Uganda is struggling to find a way to rebuild and escape from what must appear as intractable poverty. Our solution of battling abject poverty is unique; it is based upon respecting and empowering the indigenous people.  Using technology, U-TOUCH unlocks the brilliance that already exists in these impoverished communities and provides the tools for individual and community growth leading toward self-reliance. Brilliance and talent are equally distributed across the world, though opportunity is not

U-TOUCH has created a new model to unleash untapped potential in the rural and poorest villages of the world. It is a new day and a new way for Ugandans to develop independence by advancing their computer skills, using the Internet and increasing employment opportunities. They are gaining skills and knowledge to advance their livelihoods after training at the U-TOUCH Digital Library Centers.

To become self-sustainable U-TOUCH is creating a new business center offering printing, scanning and advanced computer training which will generate income to support free computer training at our five U-TOUCH Digital Library Centers in Uganda. U-TOUCH is asking you to provide seed funds to help equip the business center with computers to provide an ongoing revenue stream to fund the operations at the U-TOUCH Digital Library.



What We Need 

We are opening a new U-TOUCH Business Center and need 15 computers, which cost $335 each for a total of $5,000. We have received a grant to cover the building costs and now we need the funds for the technical equipment.  We are asking you to help fund the computers from which the trainees will have access to the Internet and learn in-depth computer and job related skills to gain employment and become independent.

The impact you will make in funding the computers for the new U-TOUCH Business Center is that you will provide OPPORTUNITY for the Gulu community to take advanced computer training classes to create or get new jobs. The additional benefit is that money will be generated to fund the five satellite U-TOUCH Digital Library Centers. By helping the people living on less than $1.25 a day you are exponentially helping them, their families and their communities! 

Could you imagine living on so little without basic needs like running water, electricity, school, or even food? By helping our friends in Uganda we are helping those in the poorest of conditions help themselves become independent! Imagine with computer access young women and men are using online resources to develop entrepreneurship opportunities and so much more! Please join us. We know we can make a huge difference together for those who are eager to join the conversation around the world! 

U-TOUCH changes lives!  After a generation terrorized by war and dependent upon the international community for support, the people of northern Uganda living in abject poverty wanted hope for the future.  They wanted to be self-reliant.  They wanted the opportunity to become educated and get jobs.  This is what U-TOUCH was able to do!

In the last three years U-TOUCH has provided technology and life skills training to over 3500 people in Uganda.  Most of these people had never touched a computer and now they are computer literate.  Provided with skills to utilize computers and navigate the Internet these beneficiaries are learning valuable and relevant skills and becoming empowered.

U-TOUCH is a results-driven organization. We tell the stories of success through personal testimonials as well as objective statistical analysis. In other words, we measure success one person at a time as well as through empirical program evaluation of large and representative samples.

In each of the U-TOUCH Digital Centers pre and post monthly income data were collected and impressive results were obtained.  On the average, beneficiaries improved their monthly income 81.75% as compared to their baseline.  What did they do with this meaningful increase in money? They used it to change the quality of their lives in the most essential and important ways: food, school and health care.  At the most basic level they were able to cure their hunger. They used the money to invest in their and their families education.  They could afford to go to doctors, obtain medicine and pay health bills. 

U-TOUCH transforms lives.  It provides the skills to ensure enduring change. 

What you get ~ The Perks:

We are excited to offer some incredible perks to thank you for supporting us. In the spirit of supporting infrastructure of Uganda we will be offering items including jewelry and iPad covers hand-made by the talented women in the rural Ugandan villages who are eager to earn the funds to help their families. We will be offering hand-carved wooden spoons and bowls and of course, our signature “Uganda-Have-Chocolate-Chip-Cookies”. 

Other Ways You Can Help

Think of all the people in your life who benefit from computers, laptops, and iPads/tablets and please share with them a short personal message via email or Facebook with the link to this page and tell them about how you think donating to U-TOUCH is an important and terrific cause.

compared to their baseline.  What did
they do with this meaningful increase in money? They used it to change the
quality of their lives in the most essential and important ways: food, school
and health care.  At the most basic level
they were able to cure their hunger. They used the money to invest in their and their families education.  They could afford to
go to doctors, obtain medicine and pay health bills.  
U-TOUCH
transforms lives.  It provides the skills
to ensure enduring change. 

What you get ~ The Perks:


We are excited to offer some
incredible perks to thank you for supporting us. In the spirit of supporting
infrastructure of Uganda we will be offering items including jewelry and iPad
covers hand-made by the talented women in the rural Ugandan villages who are
eager to earn the funds to help their families. We will be offering hand-carved
wooden spoons and bowls and of course, our signature
“Uganda-Have-Chocolate-Chip-Cookies”. 

Other
Ways You Can Help
Think of all the people in your
life who benefit from computers, laptops, and iPads/tablets and please share
with them a short personal message via email or Facebook with the
link to this page and tell them about how you think donating to U-TOUCH is an
important and terrific cause.

story:
It is no surprise that with the rise of eSports and online gaming, people are becoming more and more interested in playing themselves and being part of an interactive online community.  Anyone can become the next big sports star from the comforts of their living room, they can score touchdowns, play for a crowd, be watched live and even acquire fans.  At home interactive gaming provides all the recognition of playing professionally. This phenomenon is really taking off and the proof is in the numbers: Twitch.tv, a company that was just bought by Amazon.com for 970 million dollars. Twitch.tv allows the average Joe to play the same games as the pros do, allowing other people to watch them and interact with them live.

Overview

The reason for our campaign is because we want to create software so everyone can watch and participate in online game streaming.  Currently, the problem many face is (unless you are a big company like Riot, the developers of League of Legends and the most watch game on Twitch.tv) that it takes money to be able to produce what is essentially a live online TV show. 

their show.                                                                                                        https://twitter.com/SmaKills 

Big name streamers have to put up multiple screens and have a very intrusive set up in order to enjoy the interaction.  The reason for a setup like this is because you have to have multiple programs running on different screens for the broadcasting software to capture and send the video out to Twitch.tv. It’s not reasonable for most and Twitch.tv does not want that. Combined with my expertise, I have a team of programmers that specialize in the video-streaming arena. I have modeled an all-in-one solution that I am devoted myself to, so that anyone can truly stream seamlessly. This will allow someone with the software to use one computer to produce professional quality game streams on Twitch.tv, in an instant.

More about the Project

It has been yet another year of exponential growth for Twitch, the streaming platform dedicated to video games. Launching in June 2011, what started, as a spin-off of Justin.tv has quickly become the most popular resource for video game live streams on the Internet, reaching over 45 million viewers every month. In fact, Twitch reaches more viewers during prime time than MTV, TNT and AMC.  This information inspired me to think about options for the future and how I could bring this enjoyment and gaming to largest amount of people.


I feel this campaign is particular positioned for success for the following reasons:

·  Pro and Amateur streamers can use the software alike.

·  Top development team that specializes in high quality streaming technology.

·  The only software with a hardware controller.

·  We already have a following of streamers ready for this product.

I feel these features make me exceptionally qualified to succeed.  This paired with attention to detail and quality service will make me the leader in the industry.

About Us

I am Anthony Martin a career salesman, 20 year gamer and father to six.  I work for Limo Anywhere, a SaaS company that is one of the biggest cloud based software providers for the limousine industry. My role as a Salesman and being the key person that brings new product lines to our clients and to new prospects via the internet and trade shows will help me in the marketing for the new streaming software.  

Our lead programmer Brett Killins has been a C+/C# coder for 17 years and more recently a .net professional. Now he is working with the US branch of Verizon to reprogram their internal systems.

Together we have engineered a software program that is second to none. Help us make this product a reality and let’s play together!

How You Can Help

For us to bring the "Streaming Software” to life, we need your support!  Your kind-hearted funding will help us get things started in order to realize our product. By contributing to this project you will be helping us reach people that may never have had the opportunity otherwise to take streaming on as a profession, which many already do. 

The Streaming Software needs pledging but above all it needs your attention and interest! If you love this product as much as we do then please take a moment to click on one of our social media buttons (Facebook, Twitter and Youtube at the bottom of the page). Help us spread the word and get things started!

How We'll Use the Funds

We need about $25,000 in order to break our “Live Stream Software” onto the market. That will incorporate all cost for the development team, testers, product management, and also website integration for distribution.

Final Thank You

I feel so appreciative to everyone who has taken the time to read out campaign and for those who contributed what they could to make a difference and helping us spread the word.  I have spent the last few months working hard to bring this vision to life in this campaign and it was worth every minute thanks to all our generous supporters.  Please know your efforts, even the smallest, don’t go unnoticed.  We will continue to keep you posted on what your donation helped us achieve.  You are part of our “Live Stream Software” family.

If you cannot donate but you are interested in helping, please contact us so we can set you up with a referral program! You might even be able to earn perks, just by spreading the word!

story:
iSights is the first commercially available picatinny (MIL-STD-1913) rail mount for smart phones available to the civilian market.

iSights is the first commercially available picatinny (MIL-STD-1913) rail mount for smart phones available to the civilian market. The mounting system is specially designed for use on airsoft, paintball systems, and small caliber firearms. Apps for iSights Mount available on App Store(https://itunes.apple.com/us/app/isights-pro/id7...) and Google Play(https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=c...). Just let us know you're make and model/or case of your smartphone and we'll custom build a mount for you! YOU'LL STILL GET YOUR PERK EVEN IF WE DON'T REACH OUR FUNDING GOAL!!!

IT ALLOWS YOU TO...  

-Take video while in game or practices  

-Turn your smartphone into a red dot optic with the iSights app  

-Instant access to other apps like GPS navigation and flashlights

GO TO www.isightsmount.com


    Risks & Challenges

    Blood, Sweat, & Energy Drinks :-)

story:
Hello:

My name is Nina, I'm a System Analyst and 3D Animator based out of Vancouver, Canada. I have a vision that I'd like to share with you.

As a Netizen (citizen of the internet) I'm appalled at some of the things that are currently going on in regards to Net Neutrality and Internet freedom. Many countries, namely the US are trying to destroy the freedom of flow and the freedom of information of the internet. In essence, stifling innovation.

Using failed procedures such as unethical copyright laws and privatization tactics which are proven flawed concepts. Clearly, this approach has been demonstrated in many different examples of failure. For instance, privatized health care and privatized environmental protection.

The ISPs constantly use the excuse that they require privatization due to the cost of infrastructural updates in regards to their business model. Although they are already funded by tax payers and huge subsidies from the government. Therefore, it is necessary to create a parallel public infrastructure, which is exclusively non-profit. This is where my vision comes in. 

Technology is advancing every day. Because of the progress in graphics, VR gear and IEEE 802.22  we are now at a point where we can create a fully dynamic Virtual Operating System (VOS) running on its own public network. Therefore, evolving our current inefficient user interface model. It is time to take the next leap into computer technology and move beyond keyboards, mouses, monitors and cable provided internet. I've designed a concept for a new computing system called DiO Box (further details below)



What I'm proposing is a revolution in mind-set and in the way we approach our everyday computing needs. Imagine an alternative to all national level telecommunications without third party trolling fees. Although DiO Box will not be a complete replacement to the current internet; it will encourage competition, therefore increasing options at a consumer level.

DiO Box will be open source and freely upgraded. Networks can be created democratically, based on small scale or large scale needs. Since there will be no centralized servers to this network, there can be no monopolization by one party.

Your contribution will help the world step into the next phase of technology and true Net Neutrally. By helping to create DiO Box, you will help ensure internet freedoms for current and future generations. With DiO Box, there will be no subscription fees and no upgrade fees.This will allow the billions of people who are not currently connected to the internet an avenue to finally be able to connect.

Our current method of voicing our disapproval is  either physically protesting at certain venues and hold up signs. Or sending e-mails to big companies such as Verizon, Comcast and government entities like the FCC, showing them our disgust at the situation. But it most likely will not be heard, since these big companies are all in bed with each other. And only the rich can have a voice.

It's time to show Big Business, and Big Monopolies that we don't need them, they need us! Your contributions will help us achieve this and more...

What is DiO Box?

  • DiO Box is a new computing system using VOS.
  • DiO Box can connect with your smartphone and be utilised as a free phone network.
  • DiO Box will use a Linux based system with a full graphical front end, utilizing Unity 3D to create the VR environment.
  • Units will connect together using a cluster based network by implementing IEEE 802.22 (Super Wifi will utilize public airways for what they were intended for - public use.)
  • DiO Box will come with all the necessary connection ports for all major VR gear.
  • DiO Box will come with its own detachable laser projected keyboard and micro LED projector. It will also include retractable USB cables for wired solutions.  (The images below are examples and are subject to change.)

How Much Do We Need?

We are requesting a sum of $500,000 to complete the VOS code and to build the first DiO Box prototype.

Funding Breakdown:

At $10,000:

Non-functional demonstration of the VOS.

At $100,000:

Functional Alpha-stage demo of the VOS.

At $175,000:

Functional Bata-stage of the VOS.

At $250,000:

A fully functional VOS that can be installed on any PC.

At $350,000:

Development of the IEEE 802.22 for DiO Box.

At $500,000:

A fully operational DiO Box hardware and software unit prototype.

BONUS!

At $1,000,000:

A fully voice activated DiO Box. And color adjustable laser projected keyboard. Red is the default color, additional colors would be yellow, green, blue and pink!

Perks! Get Excited!

Every DiO Box will be shipped with a revolutionary 3D printer called the Peachy Printer. (Pictured below)

Although the final version of DiO Box will be blue, the first 250 units can be customizable colors with your name or initials engraved on the unit.

As demonstrated in the funding breakdown, funding would be utilized to the level indicated. Any finances in between stages, will be used for advertising costs for DiO Box and DiO-vR.

Net Neutrality T-Shirt & Hat

The T-Shirt is 100% Cotton (Fruit of the Loom)

The Hat is an adjustable baseball cap.


What Can I Do, if I Can't Afford to Donate?

If you can't afford to contribute to this project financially, please help us get the word out. Through social media and/or word of mouth, we want your help in any way possible!

Shout Outs:

Special thanks to DIVA for demonstrating a functional VR database management system.

Special thanks to the Peachy Printer team for creating an affordable and innovative 3D printer.

story:
The features mentioned above are just the basic features – stuff we know you want. The point of this IndieGogo campaign is not to raise money- it’s to get your feedback! Our full-time software development team will be updating the app based on the feedback we get from YOU. Help us design the perfect app!




      




      



Most bluetooth toys fall out of range within 1 or 3 feet... We’ve done extensive testing and fully optimized the hardware using the best antenna technology.






Developing sex tech is complicated. Traditional sex toys can go from design to production in as little as 8 weeks. Sex tech products take many months and sometimes years to develop.

Unlike most Indiegogo product launches, we have fully tested these products. We are not looking for money to complete the project- we are looking for early bird users to give us feedback and suggestions on our app. We have already paid for tooling and taken care of all other upfront costs in order to take this to the production phase.

We will be doing final quality control testing before sending out units to early birds. It is possible that a problem with the hardware may be found during this final testing period. In our project timeline, we’ve already taken into account that there may be adjustments. Adjustments may delay shipment, but the delays shouldn’t be very long. We have great relationships with our suppliers and shipping partners. We also take care of the majority of the manufacturing process ourselves- enabling us to allocate additional resources to speed things up if necessary!



Collectively, the Lovense team has spent a small fortune on wearable sex toys- only to be disappointed every time. We have experience developing sex tech products and knew we could create a better product.

We've already spent 10's of thousands of dollars (and countless hours) prototyping Lush. We’ve been through many re-designs and fully optimized it. Based on our internal testing and beta testers’ feedback we’re ready for launch! Now, we need a larger group of people to give us feedback on our app and suggest additional features before we ramp up production. 


Lovense is a leading sex tech company- pushing innovation in the sex toy industry for close to 6 years. The team behind Lovense launched one of the first teledildonic toys back in 2010. It used Skype to allow a user to control the toy from any distance.

In 2013, we launched an IndieGogo campaign- debuting the first two-way interactive long distance sex toys under the Lovense brand.

Lovense has been talked about in:


We hope to make waves in the media with our new products, too! After you get your toy, suggest innovative features that will get the press talking about Lush!

I live in a different state/country then my partner… will it work for us?

Yes, it will. As long as you and your partner both have internet access, you can message each other and give/receive control of your partner’s toy through our app.

Does it come with a remote?

No. Traditional remote controlled sex toy remotes don't provide the functionality necessary (in our opinion). They are typically made of cheap materials and don't provide the visual feedback necessary to truly be in control of someone's toy. 

We're using the technology in our pocket- your smartphone! Check the list below to ensure your smartphone works with our toys!.

What phones are supported?

iPhone 4S/5/5C/5S/6/6+ and later

iPad 3/4/Air and later

iPad Mini 1/2 and later

Android 4.3 and later devices with BLE (Bluetooth Low Energy) enabled.

(We have tested the Samsung Galaxy Line, Sony devices, and other Android devices!)

Do you support Windows phones?

Unfortunately, we don't support Windows phones.

Do you support Blackberry phones?

Some Blackberry phones support Android apps, but we have not tested if our apps will work as advertised on these models. We will be testing the compatibility with Blackberry phones throughout the next 2 months. Keep an eye out on our website to see the compatibility is confirmed.

Do you ship discreetly?

Yes, we do. All packages will arrive in a plain brown box. There will be no markings, at all, on the exterior box!

Can I be support anonymously?

Yes, you can! See the image below:

How else can I assist you?

Comment on this campaign, or use the social sharing buttons at the top. It would mean the world to us if you did this, even if you didn't support us financially. Every share helps!

(We have tested the Samsung Galaxy
Line, Sony devices, and other Android devices!)
Do you
support Windows phones?
Unfortunately, we don't support
Windows phones. 
Do you
support Blackberry phones?
Some Blackberry phones support
Android apps, but we have not tested if our apps will work as advertised on
these models. We will be testing the compatibility with Blackberry phones
throughout the next 2 months. Keep an eye out on our website to see the
compatibility is confirmed.
Do you ship discreetly?
Yes, we do. All packages will arrive
in a plain brown box. There will be no markings, at all, on the exterior box! 
Can I be
support anonymously?
Yes, you can! See the image below:





How else
can I assist you?
Comment on this campaign, or use the
social sharing buttons at the top. It would mean the world to us if you did
this, even if you didn't support us financially. Every share helps!

story:
Competitors: 

 

Who are we?

The Mauve Design is a pioneering innovation and product design company, we merged our experience in business with a team of innovators and product designers to bring a futuristic design with a reasonable and affordable cost.

With a long history of business and business management, we managed to source the best material with best cost, and combined that with an enthusiastic team of professionals to offer the customers the best without breaking the budget.

We are proud to introduce Alphasun project to our customers. Alphasun project purpose is to offer solutions to a demanding world on portable and reliable storage power devices.

Alphasun is a new design and concept to the portable power bank, it’s a high end power bank for the people always on the go, the businessmen who always wanted to be connected and want to enjoy the flexibility and the freedom of being on the move, but with no worries of being short of power, with Alphasun you can enjoy portable power all day long, and take with you everywhere, light, powerful, with huge storage capabilities, Alphasun has all the outputs you may need to power your devices, and the best of all, you can recharge it fully in less than 3 hours.

Alphasun this the first of a series of storage power devices, stay tuned for Alphasun 55, Alphasun 120, and Alphasun 220.

FAQ:

1) Why Should I buy Alphasun? What it can do for me?

Alphasun is the world most advanced, the largest, and the most practical portable power bank in the market. It produces power same as your utility power at home, for maximum safety for your electronic devices, it comes with huge capacity of 25600mAh, all the possible power outputs you may need,  AC output, DC output, USB, USB fast charging, USB type-C, and wireless charging, all in a curved device with only 3.1cm height, to slide inside your bag, all what you need to be mobile with a power plant in your hand.

Alphasun will give you the freedom to move around and power all your devices without the worry on going to run out of power, you can take it with you on a plane, train, camping, and any outdoor activities.

2) What makes Alphasun unique and unlike any other power bank?

Alphasun is a unique power bank, because it’s the largest power bank in the world, it has all the ports you may need to power anything, AC, USB, USB-C, Wireless, DC, and still legal to take it with you on board, all other power bank has small capacity,  limited power output, or too large and bulky to carry on with you. Alphasun has it all.

3) What is Alphasun current development stage?

Alphasun has passed the prototype and testing stage, we’re ready to take orders and start manufacturing.

4) Why do you need to sell Alphasun on crowdfunding platform?

Crowdfunding is a great start to market a new product, and an opportunity to sell our product with special price, so grab your Alphasun while it’s cheap, before going to the retailer.

5) What can i power with Alphasun?

Alphasun has all type of power output you possibly need, whether your device needs AC, DC, USB, USB-C, or Wireless you’ll find Alphasun ready for you. It can be a laptop, smartphone, tablets, fan, cameras etc..

6) How can Alphasun power my laptop?

Yes, you can power your laptop, with AC, DC, or USB-C, please check with your laptop manufacturer whether your laptop supports any of our power outputs.

7) Will i be able to charge my video games, such as Nintendo Switch?

Yes, we have multiple power outputs, to charge any possible device.

8) What cables come with Alphasun?

Alphasun comes with power cable capable of fast charging Alphasun within 3 hours. Alphasun has many different power outputs, you need to purchase the suitable cable for your device.

9) Can i travel with Alphasun?

Yes, Alphasun purposely built with 92W, which is within the aviation regulation to take with you onboard.

10) What is the life cycle of the Alphasun batteries?

Alphasun uses a premium cylinder 18650 type batteries, with 500-1000 lifecycle, after that, it will drop to 70% of the original capacity, it’s similar to Tesla cars, and Tesla Powerwall batteries.

11) Where do you ship to?

We ship to anywhere as long as it supported by the crowdfunding platform.

12) What does the shipping cost?

It depends on your location, please check IndieGoGo shipping information.

13) When will you ship my Alphasun?

Update 20 July 2018: we have started the manufacturing process, as this is our first batch to manufacture, we face unexpected manufacturing delay. We do appreciate your patience and support for understanding this is a new project. 

We already have started the manufacturing process soon after we received the fund from Indiegogo on the 20th June. 

Please rest assured we’ll deliver to you the ordered units. 

as mass production sometimes can face unexpected obstacles, such as obtaining raw materials etc… , these obstacles all can be managed, but our shipping might be delayed, we’ll keep you an update all the time, and make sure you receive your power bank on time, we have a long experience in business and manufacturing products, and we know how to handle it.

14) Will you keep me updated on the manufacturing and shipping stages?

Yes, we will keep a regular an update throughout the whole process till you confirm you received your Alphasun and happy with it.

15) Why you sell cheaper than our competitors?

We combine the knowledge of product design and innovation, with a long experience in the business. The core of being successful is the ability to source the best talent and material, and with the best possible cost. In The Mauve Design we endeavor to deliver the best products with the best possible price for our customers.

16) I’m a wholesaler, Can I buy a large quantity of Alphasun to re-sell?

Yes, you can, we offer attractive deals for wholesalers, for more than 10 Alphasun we consider as wholesale price, our deals allows you to make a healthy profit as a reseller.

17) What is your Return or Refund Policy?

As we offering the perks through IndieGoGo's, so we’re bound by IndieGoGo’s refund policy, please refer IndieGoGo’s refund policy for more details. but because we're in the business world for a long time, we will replace any faulty powerbank within 14 days of receiving the product, we are the only campany offering replacement of product after the raising fund. because we are confident we can deliver an amazing product, so no need to worry about loss of money, with us you're always safe.

story:
FAQs

1) Why should I donate?

So Katherine can get a good phone again.

2) What's your financial situation, are you unable to afford a new phone?

My money is tied up overseas.

3) What does that mean?

Don't worry about it.

4) What will you do with the new phone?

Call, text, play Solitaire for 30 seconds and get annoyed because the cards are too little, and maybe even download some news apps I never use.

5) What if I donate and you don't get the full $650 or if you over?

I will donate either to myself or to the Animal Protection Society of Durham.

6) Wouldn't my hard-earned money be better spent elsewhere?
Of course. But look at that face.

Thank you all and God Bless!

story:
With it’s industry-leading 6-inch screen, the Kung K1 can become your one-stop for all daily high-performance computing video and graphics. Enjoy 18:9 aspect ratios @ 2160x1080 resolution for enhanced HD viewing of all your favorite games, movies, and television!

The 6-inch screen in the Kung K1 provides 8% more viewing area than the iPhone 8. This allows for smartphone gaming which is truly an experience unlike any other – the things you’ll see, the things you’ll do – it will truly transport you to another world. The Kung K1 takes these experiences and launches them into the stratosphere – making them the de facto way to experience the best that gaming has to offer. Without this amazing screen, you are truly doing yourself, and the games that you’re playing, a major disservice.

The Kung K1 features the blazing Helio X30 by Mediatek: A unique 10-core design featuring the ARM Cortex-A73 (up to 2.6GHz). (For comparison: Apple’s latest A11 is a 6-core design with maximum clock speed of 2.39GHz.)

MediaTek’s Helio X30 is among the first wave of 10nm smartphone chipsets that will be available to the market, and the only smartphone SoC to use 10 nanometer (nm) fabrication in creation of 10 cored (Deca-core) smartphone with 4G LTE-Advanced WorldMode modem that uses 3x Carrier Aggregation with performance of 450MBit/s. Taken together, this technology triumvirate gives manufacturers greater flexibility in designing halo smartphones that provide an outstanding, high endurance user experience.

Featuring the ultra-powerful Sony IMX 386 dual-lens camera, even the most demanding photography situations can be tackled with ease.Using our special noise-reduction algorithms, the Kung K1 has the ability to shoot in low-light with the most pristine of results:

 

 

We wanted our users to have capabilities of a DSLR in their hand for easy access. We painstakingly created a “depth-of-field” mode which includes 85 different presets to help you get professional-grade portraits and close-ups that are photo-journal ready!

The 4500 mAh battery in the Kung K1 is 40% larger than the iPhone X. This allows you non-stop access during even your most high-performance computing needs.

These days, battery life is more important than ever, thanks to the big screens, super fast processors and demanding apps we find on the latest phones. After all, what good is that advanced camera or high-resolution display if your handset is dead before the sun goes down?

During our battery test, where we turn the screen up to full brightness and play a 90-minute Full HD video clip, the KUNG K1 only lost 10% of its charge. That's noticeably better than the Samsung Galaxy S8, which lost 19%.

There’s fast-charging tech here  which means you’ll be able to pump some juice into your phone very quickly if you need to.

 

The Kung K1 focuses on key performance metrics, whilst minimizing unneeded costs. Not only is its performance best-in-class, it achieve this at a fraction of the cost of other phones in the marketplace.

Technology always comes at a price, but the question is whether that price is going to be high or low. It’s easy to fall in love with the latest high-end smartphone, but sometimes our budgets demand a more prudent purchase. With the Kung K1, now you can enjoy the benefits of a premium smartphone and leave some cash in your wallet at the same time.

 

We are proud of what we have created to date but need your help to push it over the line. By supporting us, you will be part of reinventing the smartphone product category, which we feel is so lacking in the market at present. We would love you to join us on our journey to bring the product to life.

We aim to raise $10,000 through our crowd funding campaign. We have a fully functioning physical model of the device and have identified the mobile hardware platform that is based on the Mediatek Helio X30 processor.

Funds raised will go directly to funding the final QA process, manufacturing of the units ordered through the crowd fund, and marketing of our product. 

We are formerly designers and engineers from Shenzhen, China telecom company. It is with tremendous excitement that we unveil to you our flagship smartphone as our new startup company KUNG.

Because we are a smaller company, we are looking to the passionate crowdfunding community to help make this dream phone a reality! We so many successful technology initiatives coming through the crowdfunding ranks, we are excited to work with the smartphone community in delivering something truly innovative to the high-performance telecom market!

Q : What countries and mobile networks will support the Kung K1?

A : The Kung K1 is an open device, not locked to any particular network. It works in all countries that provide GSM/3G/LTE-based network services. It will also support the two LTE standards to provide 4G mobile broadband connectivity around the world (subject to network availability and data fees). Before launch we will conduct interoperability testing with networks in Europe, the US, South America, China, India, the Middle East and Africa. This is a normal step in the process of developing a mobile device.

 

Q : What if you fail to reach the funding target?

A : We appreciate every bit of support we receive during the 30 days, and every backer will be welcomed into the Kung K1 community. If we don’t reach our target then all contributions will be fully refunded via Indiegogo automatically.

 

Q : What warranties apply to the Kung K1?

A : A standard manufacturer warranty will apply. If you are not happy with the product, you may return it within 28 days of receiving it for a full refund. Please note, we can not cover the cost of the return postage and packaging.

Q : Most phone work with AT&T, Sprint and T-Mobile, but when it come to Verizon most phone don’t work. So does your phone work on the Verizon Wireless Network.

A : We already tested our model on Verizon wireless network and it works well. 

Q : What if my question isn’t answered here?

A : We’re happy to respond to any other queries you might have about the Kung K1, the Indiegogo campaign, and our company as a whole. Email us at kungsmartphone@126.com

story:
Ohsnap is a powerful grip, stand, and magnet wrapped inside a super-thin frame, now compatible with snapcharge: our magnetic wireless charger!

It makes life with your phone happy, productive, and care-free without the ugly bulk. Ohsnap works for all phones and finger sizes, and is easily adhered to the back of your phone in less than 20 seconds.

We have now shipped all products!

 

 

Secure, one-handed gripping is quick and easy with the ohsnap grip. Just slide your finger through the loop! It’s there when you need it,  and not when you don’t.

 

Ohsnap transforms into a multi-angle stand, so whether you’re on facetime with a friend or taking a break to watch some YouTube, this handy kickstand has you covered.

3-angle kickstand for comfortable streaming, anywhere

 

 

 

Ohsnap is magnetic, so now multitasking is easier than ever. Gym equipment, fridges, car mounts and more… it sticks to them like magic!

 

 

Not only did we take the phone grip to the next level, but we also added to it with the first ever magnetic wireless charger, Snapcharge. Snapcharge uses the Qi charging standard which works with almost all devices including wireless charging enabled phones, Airpods, and more.

 

With snapcharge, you can pick up and use your phone without interrupting the charging process! :)

 

Snapcharge sticks to your magnetic car mount for a quick and easy charge, on the go.

While snapcharge works with every phone that has wireless charging capabilities, we cannot guarantee wireless charging compatible with all cases. The ohsnap grip has worked with every wireless charger on which it's been tested, but we cannot guarantee compatibility with all wireless chargers. For 100% confidence in compatibility, opt for our magnetic wireless charger, snapcharge.

 

We meticulously engineered the grip to be incredibly thin, at only 3mm.

Won’t get caught on your pants!

 

 

It also fully rotates, so you can get the best possible angle that works for your unique gripping style.

 

The ohsnap grip is designed with ultra-strength, tear-resistant silicone that is guaranteed to last millions of cycles.

No matter what happens, your ohsnap grip is backed by our forever ohsnap guarantee.

If your ohsnap grip gets damaged or broken, we will replace it for free, no matter what.

Within 1 year: Free replacement, we cover shipping! After 1 year: Free replacement, just cover shipping! Exchanges & Returns Within 30 Days: No questions asked, exchange or refund upon return, just cover shipping and handling.

 

Installing ohsnap on your phone is simple and easy. In 3 steps, ohsnap is attached securely and you're ready to go.

 

        

SNAPSTAND - 

Snapstand is a magnetic mounting stand for convenient viewing & multitasking!

 

Effortless mounting with snapstand means no more picking up your phone to check notifications or send a quick text. It’s awesome at home or work!

It’s been meticulously engineered to work seamlessly with the ohsnap grip and/or snapcharge, so it’ll be the perfect add-on to your pledge. Increase your pledge amount by an additional $20 today to secure your snapstand!

 

 

  1. Below is our estimate for standard shipping charges. Because this estimate is based on our expected volume for this campaign, it could be subject to change depending on the final result. These charges may also change if you add additional products during the survey process. We want to keep this process as simple and accurate as possible, while avoiding any false promise or unexpected charges.
  2. Customs, Duty, and VAT charges: In some cases, international backers outside of the USA will be required to pay additional customs, duty, and/or VAT charges. We cannot control this additional charge, and it will be the backers responsibility to cover once they receive the selected reward. Any questions regarding this additional charge should be addressed directly with the backers customs office.

 

Because of our dedication to the vision of ohsnap, the ohsnap grip went through multiple iterations and 3D-printed prototypes every day. It constantly changed and improved on a daily basis to bring it to the slick and easy to handle grip that you see today.

Dimensions

Ohsnap is 61mm in diameter & 3mm thick

For 100% confidence in compatibility, opt for our magnetic wireless charger, snapcharge. We meticulously engineered the grip to be incredibly thin, at only 3mm.Won’t get caught on your pants!  It also fully rotates, so you can get the best possible angle that works for your unique gripping style. The ohsnap grip is designed with ultra-strength, tear-resistant silicone that is guaranteed to last millions of cycles.No matter what happens, your ohsnap grip is backed by our forever ohsnap guarantee.If your ohsnap grip gets damaged or broken, we will replace it for free, no matter what.Within 1 year: Free replacement, we cover shipping! After 1 year: Free replacement, just cover shipping! Exchanges & Returns Within 30 Days: No questions asked, exchange or refund upon return, just cover shipping and handling. Installing ohsnap on your phone is simple and easy. In 3 steps, ohsnap is attached securely and you're ready to go.         SNAPSTAND - Snapstand is a magnetic mounting stand for convenient viewing & multitasking! Effortless mounting with snapstand means no more picking up your phone to check notifications or send a quick text. It’s awesome at home or work!It’s been meticulously engineered to work seamlessly with the ohsnap grip and/or snapcharge, so it’ll be the perfect add-on to your pledge. Increase your pledge amount by an additional $20 today to secure your snapstand!  
Below is our estimate for standard shipping charges. Because this estimate is based on our expected volume for this campaign, it could be subject to change depending on the final result. These charges may also change if you add additional products during the survey process. We want to keep this process as simple and accurate as possible, while avoiding any false promise or unexpected charges.
Customs, Duty, and VAT charges: In some cases, international backers outside of the USA will be required to pay additional customs, duty, and/or VAT charges. We cannot control this additional charge, and it will be the backers responsibility to cover once they receive the selected reward. Any questions regarding this additional charge should be addressed directly with the backers customs office.
 Because of our dedication to the vision of ohsnap, the ohsnap grip went through multiple iterations and 3D-printed prototypes every day. It constantly changed and improved on a daily basis to bring it to the slick and easy to handle grip that you see today.DimensionsOhsnap is 61mm in diameter & 3mm thick

story:
Qsens Thermobaby is a gadget thought out for continuous monitoring of your baby's temperature during the difficult nights, when your baby's temperature suddenly goes up and down and it's difficult to control. This gadget is fixed on the baby's arm while he's sleeping and via bluetooth connects to your smartphone, warning you when the temperature exceeds the values previously set up in your App.

 

Quality: The gadget is made with the best material in the market, always thinking of reliability, precision and taking into account that the gadget is going to be in constant contact with the baby.

Technology: It uses the latest technology in wireless communication.

Easy: Use is extremely simple, being able to be used by any smartphone user.

Compatibility:  Iphone 4S and latest model. Select Android devices supporting BLE (the latest Android phones).

Novelty: Revolutionizes all classic methods of body temperature taking, equalizing the reliability but greatly improving the comfort of use.

Attractive design: Attractive design for the baby.

Made in Spain: Designed and made in Spain.

A baby's temperature usually goes up at night while the parents are sleeping, whereby, if the baby doesn't cry and wake up, his parents don't realize that the baby may have a temperature.

 Thermobaby is a small handy accessory which is placed under your baby's arm and will be vigilant for you, and all the better, will warn you the moment your baby has a temperature, therefore allowing you to administer the medication required quicker.

Qsens Thermobaby watches our baby's temperature for us, allowing us a relaxed sleep.

Qsens will develop its product Thermobaby following all the sanitary and security controls.

We are actually developing a conceptual prototype and promotional videos. We will use the funds raised as follows:

• 1st month: Electronic design of the circuit. Mechanical design for the production of the carcass in serie.

• 2nd month: Development of the App for Android and IOS.

• 3rd month: Testing of the first equipment produced and certification of the product.

• 4rth month: Sending the Qsens Thermobaby to our Backers.

- Schedule of execution phase is set with reserve, because we do not want to let down our backers and eliminate the possibility of delay at every stage.

- We expect to launch Qsens into mass production and our backers will be able to receive the new device well before and at a cheaper rate than those who will want to acquire it in the future.

Qsens is a company thought out by 2 valencian engineers with the object of designing and manufacturing products, which improves the quality of life.

Thermobaby is a product which is currently being developed by Qsens and will allow many parents a restful sleep.

Qsens Thermobaby combines the technology with the mobile gadgets to offer you the perfect guarantee for looking after your baby.

Qsens is made up of a team of professionals with more than 10 years experience in the manufacturing of electronic products sector.

Gabriel Lapuente is the CTO of Qsens and he is an industrial expert in the programming and the designing of electronic circuit. He has worked in sectors such as the motor industry, solar, investigation and industrial automatization.

Ricardo Silla is the CEO of Qsens and he specializes in the management of projects and design of machinery of different sectors. He has participated in projects of automatization, chemical plants, motor, machinery for solar sector and food.

Lorena Penella and Paco Pepe Monzonís, founders of Vandidoo, editorial company of design have collaborated in the formal development of Qsens Thermobaby.

Please check out our FAQ section or email us: support@qsenstech.com and a final THANK YOU to our current partners & contributers!

story:
Campaign Completed!
Thanks to all our generous contributors we completed our goal.

If you got here too late, don't worry, you can still order your CrystalCore TiltDock online with PayPal on our site:
www.icoregear.com/shop.html

Watch our presentation video clicking here

Publications

Great article about us! This writer met with us at the International CES show in Las Vegas and was able to test out the dock:
http://www.iphonelife.com/blog/2458/crystalcore-tiltdock-could-have-been-invented-apple-it-wasnt

http://en.akihabaranews.com/122517/accessories/crystalcore-tiltdock-for-iphone-and-ipad#comments

Product review and short video interview in Italian from CES 2013 in Las Vegas on the TiltDock: 
http://www.macitynet.it/macity/articolo/CES-201...


Video Interview from our stand at CES Las Vegas and other articles:
http://txtnation.tv/wordpress/2013/01/ces-2013-day-3-great-mobile-phone-docks/

http://appadvice.com/appnn/2013/01/introducing-the-crystalcore-tiltdock-for-every-mobile-device-in-your-life

http://www.mactrast.com/2013/02/indiegogo-project-ending-soon-crystalcore-tiltdock-a-dock-for-all-smartphones-and-devices/?utm_source=rss&utm_medium=rss&utm_campaign=indiegogo-project-ending-soon-crystalcore-tiltdock-a-dock-for-all-smartphones-and-devices


Who Are We?

I am a graphic designer by trade, and my uncle Randy is in the manufacturing business.  We have been interested in trying new business ideas using my talents for design together with Randy’s engineering team and manufacturing capabilities. I started a small company called iCoreGear because of my passion for Apple's products, and wanted to design my own equipment to complement its great devices. Smartphones are everywhere now, and an important part of our daily lives. The CrystalCore TiltDock is designed to serve as much more than a charging station, but also as a "home" for your smartphone, tablet or other device. Its features as described below are unique and groundbreaking, as there is no other dock out there as useful and sleek. 

Meet the manufacturer for our product: www.world-trading.com

The CrystalCore TiltDock

We have built 3 versions of the dock to satisfy users of all types of smartphones and devices.  Apple's 30-pin connector (compatible with the iPhone 4S and previous versions, the iPad and iPad 2, and all iPods with the same connector).  A Micro USB connector to make our dock work with many other smartphones and devices such as most Samsung, Nokia, Motorola, Sony Ericsson and LG products that use the micro USB connector at the center base of the phone or device, and lastly an 8-pin Lightning connector for the new generation of Apple products such as the iPhone 5, iPad Retina, iPad mini etc. but are awaiting for Apple’s MFI program to review and of course we are hoping for approval to make sure our product is legit and fully compatible.

Three Great Features

1: Tilting backrest.  You can ensure the angle of your phone is pefect for facetime, texting or playing. Tilt goes from upright to 45° angle.

2: Fit's your phone with 99% of any cover, bumper or case.  Our Patent Pending rotating connector fits them perfectly.  You no longer need to remove your protective covers to mount the dock.

3: Look Mom, One Hand!  With our Patent Pending base, our dock stays put on the table or desk so everything you need to do with your phone can be done with one hand.  Docking, undocking, typing/texting and adjusting the back rest.  In my opinion, this is the number one best feature!

Where We Are Today

This project started in March, 2012.  We have made countless sketches, several CAD designs,  and 5 hand-made prototypes.  We have built and tested all the tooling with fully finished production samples which have been tested and meet our quality requirements.  We are working on the packaging, manual and now will start the marketing.  If you’re a retailer or distributor, contact us directly for wholesale ordering. 

What I Need

My uncle has financed everything up to now.  I need to raise funds that will go towards manufacturing the docks and stocking our little warehouse with inventory to sell.  Every dock you buy will be the first to get shipped so you’ll be the first to start using them.  Each order includes shipping anywhere in the lower 48 states. (~$8 value) Shipping outside the country will cost an additonal $14.

This dock is one of a kind. Not only is it created to work with all kinds of devices, its features are new and not found in any other dock. Finally, instead of plugging your phone in to charge and setting next to your bed you can have a real "home" for it within your home or office. 

We will be presenting this project along with our new CableCore Hub for the iMac 21" (which you can see on our website) at the 2013 International CES show in Las Vegas, January 8th – 11th.  Booth #6224

Buying your dock today ensures you’ll be the first one to get our dock, and be helping me to get some extra units made for selling to others.  Your help is truly appreciated!

Other Ways You Can Help

Some of you just can’t contribute, but that doesn’t mean you can’t help!

Blog about us, share on the social media, let your friends know about this wonderful project and spread the word! We are confident in the innovation of this product, and we can make it big if you like our idea and help us let people know about it.

Thank you from all of us at Apple Core Gear, Company

story:
Version 1.1 Shipping in August in 4 Colors

Stronger cable to plug silicone cap (white) and 20% faster charging.

MAGiO one piece 2-in-1 charge and sync cable for Android and Apple devices can charge from the usual USB power sources AND have OTG functions to turn Android phones into backup chargers for Android and Apple devices. 

It is also the only 2-in-1 cable of any style that is Guaranteed iOS Compatibility Tested for over 1 Year. (iOS 9.3.2 update May 2016)

OTG Functions Demo

Eliminate Cable Clutter

Instead of separate cables or adapters, one MAGiO cable can charge or sync both Android or Apple phones and tablets.


The 3rd generation design mates an OEM connector that works with both micro USB and Lightning in one plug - no add-on adapters needed.

Other 2-in-1 cables have Lightning adapters that do not keep working with iOS updates 

MAGiO works with 2.4 A chargers, computers, battery packs, and car chargers - for fast charging and data transfers.

No Charger? No Problem!

MAGiO has OTG functions, which means that it can also plug into an Android phone or tablet and use it as a backup charger to charge iPhone, iPad, and most mobile devices when no other power source is around.  No other similar cable has kept up with iOS updates compatibility.

iPad Mini being charged by Nexus 6 phone via MAGiO

MAGiO turns Android phone or tablet into backup battery charger for other mobile devices

Apple iOS Compatible

We held off releasing MAGiO for a year until it has been tested with every version of Android and iOS updates to make sure that it will stay compatible in the future.  The exclusive trade secret is inside the plug housing.

Nexus 6 running Marshmallow and iPad Mini running iOS

MAGiO - the social cable designed for sharing power anywhere.

  • 1 meter (3 feet) long

  • Braided nylon cable

  • Solid copper wires

  • Micro USB + Lightning in 1 plug

  • USB + micro USB plug (OTG functions)

  • 4 colors available 

  • Shipping in 3rd week August



MAGiO Tech is based in New York, with offices in Hong Kong and China.  Our primary business has been contract designing mobile electronics for other companies.  Most of our recent designs were the so called 2-in-1 cables that were widely available in 2015.

This time, we held on to this cable design for ourselves and wanted to test it thoroughly before releasing it under our own brand.  We already have the mold and materials needed for an initial production run.  

It's common that once a design comes out, everyone in China copies it and cuts corners to get the price down as much as possible.  Our copper wires and connector are sourced from top component makers for better quality than the standard that you will find available elsewhere.  Plus MAGiO comes with the USB/micro USB converter that plugs into Android devices for backup power.

Older 2-in-1  cables have experienced iOS issues. We had this design for a year and what's inside is our trade secret and keeps it compatible with iOS updates.  We held onto releasing it until we tested it over a year with all updates (up to iOS 9.3.1) to confirm for ourselves.

Our Factory

Timeline

  • March 2015 - MAGiO 2 sided connector sourced

  • April 2015 - Cable Prototypes made, testing starts

  • May 2015 to April 2016 - Molds, materials prepared

  • May 2016 - Indiegogo campaign

  • July 2016 - Survey and production starts

  • August 2016 - Shipping starts Version 1.1

Risks & Challenges

All the hard work's been done, and paid for.  We tested MAGiO vigorously for over a year to make sure that it would stay compatible with iOS and Android updates.

The July shipping schedule has been changed to 3rd week in August because  we are going to ship an updated and upgraded cable.
