story:
WHITE HOT REPORT...A SLEEPING GIANT SUCCESS STORY ABOUT TO HAPPEN

 
What is WHITE HOT REPORT?
 
White Hot Report is a mobile software app that will tell users what is WHITE HOT, and the very best of anything, in about 10 seconds or less. It has been in development for over 1 year. The BIG IDEA is, to give smartphone users an app that offers ranking information, in "best-of" categories, as quickly as possible. Whether it's Make-Up Tips, Best Diapers or Safest Cars, WHITE HOT REPORT will rank it. We plan to make it for Android and iPhone mobile phone users, and hope to expand to other operating platforms as soon as possible. We are starting in the U.S. and hope to expand to Canada, Mexico and Great Britain within 9 months
 
 
 
This is our WHITE HOT logo! Wouldn't that look great on a T-Shirt or Polo??? See Perks details on how you can be sporting this in style!
 
Who is running WHITE HOT REPORT?
Actually some very talented people, some listed and others waiting in the wings.
  
WHITE HOT REPORT is owned and operated by PAMA AMERICAN, LLC, registered with the State of Wisconsin.
 
The talent??? Kevin and Billy have been in the digital conversion business for years and are excited to help out in getting data posted on the front-end. Greg is a management guy with lots of background in managing retail and online businesses. Greg and Paul worked together in an online business called Skye Club which was the largest in-world casino in the 3-D virtual world of Second Life. There, they were successful in starting and growing a gaming business that posted hundreds of thousands of real-money transactions. Paul has been involved with everything from laying grass sod at his home town library to working with a few Fortune 1000 companies. Paul thrives in Marketing in the online sector. You can see more specifics about all of us in our LinkedIn profiles.
 
Kevin Samuelson, Data Warrior
Billy Anacki, Data Ninja
Greg Vivirito, Commander of Chaos
Paul Martin, Director of Consumer Experience
 
Who will use WHITE HOT REPORT?
 
 
 
The beautiful thing about WHITE HOT REPORT, it is intended to be used world-wide. Any country, culture, ethnic group, racial group, age group, gender orientation, or language group will reap the rewards of our mobile app. It is universal in it's appeal, in that anyone on earth could benefit by using it on a regular basis.
 

STRETCH GOAL $80,000

 
 
 
 
STRETCH GOAL $80,000 Achieving total success will allow us to develop the app for use on all major mobile platforms--Facebook, Blackberry, iPad, iPod, Nokia, Windows, etc. It will also afford us the opportunity to enter foreign markets. Plus, it will broaden our paid-version offering by allowing us to develop a database intensive website to support the app.
 
In addition, we can improve existing, and implement new, operational, financial and management controls, reporting systems and procedures; install enhanced management information systems. Our future success and our ability to expand our operations will also depend in large part on our ability to attract and retain qualified engineers, graphic designers, computer scientists, sales, marketing and senior management personnel. Competition for these types of employees is intense due to the high demand for them.
 
 
 
 
 
What else will WHITE HOT REPORT tell you?
 
The number of topical informational categories for WHITE HOT REPORT is limitless and could literally hit the millions mark within 1 or 2 years. Our users may wish to know, among other things...
 
  • Best Veterinarians in Lawrence KS.
  • The Day's Top News Stories.
  • Top Women Executives in the Advertising Sector.
  • Best Family Doctors in your city.
  • Best Plumbers in Syracuse, New York.
  • Best Refrigerators for under $1,000.
  • Most Effective Weight-Loss Diets.
  • Best Colleges/Universities in the World.
  • Safest cars rated by the NHTSA crash tests.
  • Best NFL Quarterbacks.
  • Best Divorce Attorneys in Tampa.
 
Why is WHITE HOT REPORT ideal for a mobile App?
 
On a smartphone, users don't have the time or physical screen space to be reading long paragraphs of text. WHITE HOT REPORT is short, bullet point information that you can get in about 10 seconds.
 
How will the money you pledge be used?
 
100% of it will go to build the WHITE HOT REPORT mobile application and design the graphic interface. Any additional money raised above and beyond the goal will be used to introduce the app for new operating platforms. This will require even more extensive programming so that it can be launched onto Facebook, Blackberry, Nokia, Windows and iPad.
 
Please pledge now.
 
 
$25, $50 or $100 will really help!
 
Your support is greatly appreciated. Please help us get the word our and tell your friends about out campaign. THANK YOU!
 
What does the Global App Market Look Like?
 
It's exploding with a lot of upward growth momentum. Here are a few startling facts. In this year, 2013, Mobile Phone use will overtake PCs as the way to access the Internet. According to the Financial web site Motley Fool, the total global mobile applications market is expected to be worth $25 billion by 2015 (up from about $6.8 billion in 2010).
 
 
 
 
Source: SOURCE: World Mobile Applications Market - Advanced Technologies, Global Forecast (2010 - 2015) By: marketsandmarkets.com
 
The other big takeaway, is that spending on mobile phones is exploding. According to Information Age, Information Age says spending on mobile enterprise business apps will more than double from $26 billion in 2012 to $53 billion in 2017.
 
 
 
Source: Mobile business apps market to reach $53bn in 2017 – Strategy Analytics--Information Age, 15 JANUARY 2013.
 
The Wall Street Journal, ABC News, Forbes and numerous other well known media firms all have the app market exploding, both in terms of growth and revenues.
 

And revenue sources are not just limited to consumer spending, Big Business is investing heavily in Mobile Advertising.


Mobile app and advertising revenue

Source: MyBroadBand, "Mobile Mojo" January 17, 2013 http://mybroadband.co.za/news/internet/66162-mobile-mojo.html

 
Goals and Tracking Our Performance
 
Our company is committed to achieving at a high level and ascertaining our performance by tracking several Key Performance Indicators (KPIs). KPIs are quantifiable measurements that help define and measure our progress and reflect the critical success factors of our company. Some of the KPIs we will regularly monitor include, but are not limited to:
 
  • Number of active users (per day, week, month, …)
  • How long users spend in the app,
  • Which icons, buttons are clicked (or any other custom event),
  • Record device info, operating system,
  • How often is the app opened? When and how long is the app opened?
  • Number of new users, active users, total users,
  • Record errors or exception thrown.
 
Please pledge.
 
 
Whether you give $50 or $500, it all helps!
 
This will be a better world with WHITE HOT REPORT. Please help us get the word out by telling your friends. THANK YOU!
 
 
What operating systems will WHITE HOT REPORT work on?
 
 

                 &      

 
Our app will work on Apple's iOS system and Google's Android operating system.
 
The Role of Trust in Our Business
 
 
 
Trust is not given, it has to be earned. Trust is the primary goal of WHITE HOT REPORT  We will earn our user's trust by offering credible content, providing clean design in an easy to use mobile format, yielding a good user experience. We will highlight any affiliations with particular entities organizations or individuals we are rating and feature heavy user involvement in the review process to give everyone a voice.
 
Please follow us, like us, and pin with us.
 
 
 
 

Detailed Product/Service Description

 
Our project on Kickstarter is for building a mobile app, so it is important for us to define what that means and what is entailed.
 
 
 
What is a Mobile app?
I think our friends at Wikipedia have defined it best: A mobile application (or mobile app) is a software application designed to run on smartphones, tablet computers and other mobile devices. They are usually available through application distribution platforms, which are typically operated by the owner of the mobile operating system, such as the Apple App Store, Google Play, Windows Phone Store and BlackBerry App World. Some apps are free, while others must be bought. Usually, they are downloaded from the platform to a target device, such as an iPhone, BlackBerry, Android phone or Windows Phone, but sometimes they can be downloaded to laptops or desktops. --From Wikipedia
 
Making a Great App is Like Making Great Chocolate Cake
Think of our app as a sumptuous Chocolate Cake.
 
 
 
Most anybody can bake a chocolate cake, but it takes some serious baking skills to produce a cake that is worthy of being judged in a competition. A  truly great chocolate cake will be judged on...
 
 
 
Appearance, Presentation, Texture, Flavor, Technique, etc.
 
The same is true with a mobile app. We are not going to try and "bake that cake" ourselves. Our "bakery chefs" are extremely talented software developers from Certatim in Miami Beach, who have a lot of experience in developing apps that have launched on Apple's App Store. They know about building great apps, and appealing to the targeted audience by incorporating sleek interface, value and utility, innovation and uniqueness, simplicity, quality of experience, and much more--all in developing an app that really resonates and appeals to users.
 
Certatim will do the app design work and updating software work, which involves a significant amount of programming and database design. Certatim is responsible for making all of the back-end work and service that helps to make the app a success.
 
The mobile app as has been described, is actually a combination of 4 separate apps with one universal theme.
 
They are:.
 
A free, no-pay mobile app for Apple's app store.
A pay-version app for Apple's app store.
A free, no-pay app for Google's Google Play.
A pay-version app for Google's Google Play.
 
This process will take approximately 4 months. We hope to launch the WHITE HOT REPORT app towards the end of this summer.
 
We, at PAMA AMERICAN LLC, the company that owns and runs WHITE HOT REPORT, will provide all of the front-end content that users will see. We have been doing that for months now, as of this writing. That means updating information on an hourly, daily, weekly, monthly and annual basis depending on the topic of concern. 
 
For example, WHITE HOT stocks are so volatile, they require hourly updates. WHITE HOT NHL Goalies would change on a weekly basis, where other things like WHITE HOT Fashion and WHITE HOT Celebrities would change less often.
 
 
 
Blue skies up on the horizon.
 
Please pledge. Let's get it going!
 
 
Thanks for visiting our project. If you have any questions, ask, ask, ask.
Don't forget to tell your friends about us. Thank you for your pledge.
 
Risk Transparency
Though we are not a publicly traded company listed on the equity markets, we still adhere to full disclosure practices set forth by GAAP (Generally Accepted Accounting Principals), the FASB (Financial Accounting Standards Board) and the SEC (Securities and Exchange Commission). Thus, the following full disclosures of risk are declared.
 
 
 
Risk Assessment
PAMA AMERICAN, the parent company of WhiteHotReport, was incorporated in the state of Wisconson in January of 2013. Because our operating company has a limited operating history, you should consider and evaluate our operating prospects in light of the risks and uncertainties frequently encountered by early-stage companies in rapidly evolving markets.
 
We operate in the mobile applications sector, through which we will derive substantially all of our revenue. The mobile applications business is a new and rapidly evolving industry. The growth of the mobile app industry and the level of demand and market acceptance of our offering is subject to a high degree of uncertainty.
 
Many of the threats and challenges faced by mobile application companies are similar to those faced by other software and entertainment industries. They include competition, changes to consumer tastes, maintaining healthy financial ratios in compliance with banking covenants and loss of key personnel. Our future operating results will depend on numerous factors affecting the mobile app industry including:
 
• Changes in consumer demographics and public tastes and preferences;
• Difficulties we may encounter managing our growth could adversely affect our
operations.
• The availability and popularity of other forms of entertainment;
• The worldwide growth of personal computer, broadband Internet and mobile
device users, and the rate of any such growth;
• General economic conditions, particularly economic conditions adversely
affecting discretionary consumer spending.
• Because we have a new business model and a short operating history, this makes it difficult to evaluate our prospects and our future financial results and may increase the risk that we will not be successful.
• Any failure or significant interruption in our computer network could impact our operations and harm our business. Some elements of this system are operated by third parties that we do not control and which would require significant time to replace.
• Security breaches, computer viruses and computer hacking attacks could harm our business and results of operations.
• Eventually, if we are unable to attract and retain highly qualified employees, we may not be able to grow effectively, successfully manage our business and achieve our objectives.
• Expansion into international markets is important for our growth, and as we expand internationally, we will face additional business, political, regulatory, operational, financial and economic risks, any of which could increase our costs and hinder such growth.
• Competition within the broader entertainment industry is intense and our potential users may be attracted to competing forms of entertainment such as offline and traditional online games, television, movies and sports, as well as other entertainment options on the Internet.
• In the future, we may be subject to intellectual property disputes, which are costly to defend and could require us to pay significant damages and could limit our ability to use certain technologies in the future.
• Evolving regulations concerning data privacy may result in increased regulation and different industry standards, which could prevent us from providing our mobile applications to our users, or require us to modify our mobile applications, thereby harming our business.
• We will process, store and use personal information and other data, which subjects us to governmental regulation and other legal obligations related to privacy, and our actual or perceived failure to comply with such obligations could harm our business.
• In the event our app proves successful, and demand exceeds our ability to scale quickly, we may be under capitalized in order to adjust to the internal growth necessary to handle the demand, thereby causing a potential degradation in service. Outside capital may need to be injected and thus causing influence from investors that may not be healthy for the long-term best interest of the offering. Attempts at raising outside capital may fail.
 
Paul Martin,
President
01 March, 2013
 
Paul Martin

WHITE HOT REPORT...A SLEEPING GIANT SUCCESS STORY ABOUT TO HAPPEN
 
What is WHITE HOT REPORT?
 
White Hot Report is a mobile software app that will tell users what is WHITE HOT, and the very best of anything, in about 10 seconds or less. It has been in development for over 1 year. The BIG IDEA is, to give smartphone users an app that offers ranking information, in "best-of" categories, as quickly as possible. Whether it's Make-Up Tips, Best Diapers or Safest Cars, WHITE HOT REPORT will rank it. We plan to make it for Android and iPhone mobile phone users, and hope to expand to other operating platforms as soon as possible. We are starting in the U.S. and hope to expand to Canada, Mexico and Great Britain within 9 months
 

 
 
This is our WHITE HOT logo! Wouldn't that look great on a T-Shirt or Polo??? See Perks details on how you can be sporting this in style!
 
Who is running WHITE HOT REPORT?
Actually some very talented people, some listed and others waiting in the wings.
  
WHITE HOT REPORT is owned and operated by PAMA AMERICAN, LLC, registered with the State of Wisconsin.
 
The talent??? Kevin and Billy have been in the digital conversion business for years and are excited to help out in getting data posted on the front-end. Greg is a management guy with lots of background in managing retail and online businesses. Greg and Paul worked together in an online business called Skye Club which was the largest in-world casino in the 3-D virtual world of Second Life. There, they were successful in starting and growing a gaming business that posted hundreds of thousands of real-money transactions. Paul has been involved with everything from laying grass sod at his home town library to working with a few Fortune 1000 companies. Paul thrives in Marketing in the online sector. You can see more specifics about all of us in our LinkedIn profiles.
 
Kevin Samuelson, Data Warrior
Billy Anacki, Data Ninja
Greg Vivirito, Commander of Chaos
Paul Martin, Director of Consumer Experience
 
Who will use WHITE HOT REPORT?
 
 

 
The beautiful thing about WHITE HOT REPORT, it is intended to be used world-wide. Any country, culture, ethnic group, racial group, age group, gender orientation, or language group will reap the rewards of our mobile app. It is universal in it's appeal, in that anyone on earth could benefit by using it on a regular basis.
 
STRETCH GOAL $80,000

Plus, it will broaden our paid-version offering by allowing us to develop a database intensive website to support the app.
 
In addition, we can improve existing, and implement new, operational, financial and management controls, reporting systems and procedures; install enhanced management information systems. Our future success and our ability to expand our operations will also depend in large part on our ability to attract and retain qualified engineers, graphic designers, computer scientists, sales, marketing and senior management personnel. Competition for these types of employees is intense due to the high demand for them.
 
 

 
 
 
What else will WHITE HOT REPORT tell you?
 
The number of topical informational categories for WHITE HOT REPORT is limitless and could literally hit the millions mark within 1 or 2 years. Our users may wish to know, among other things...
 

Best Veterinarians in Lawrence KS.
The Day's Top News Stories.
Top Women Executives in the Advertising Sector.
Best Family Doctors in your city.
Best Plumbers in Syracuse, New York.
Best Refrigerators for under $1,000.
Most Effective Weight-Loss Diets.
Best Colleges/Universities in the World.
Safest cars rated by the NHTSA crash tests.

Best Divorce Attorneys in Tampa.

story:
iGab brings your mobile messages to life.

Many of us like to text, right? But texting these days just isn’t as fun as it used to be. We use texts to communicate daily with our friends and family, and get tired of tapping out tedious messages. Not to mention those embarrassing autocorrect mistakes.

With iGab, you can select a 3D animated “Gabber” to send a personalized video message recorded in your voice. Your Gabber can also deliver your message with emotion - happy, sad or angry! It’s easy and fast. Let’s save the world from boring text messages.

iGab is here to make your mobile texts, and your life, FUN!

 

Meet GoGekko, the creators of iGab

Kathryn, Claudia and Sabine, two Americans and one German, are the founders of GoGekko GbR.

GoGekko GbR is a woman-owned mobile app development company based in Hamburg, Germany. iGab, GoGekko’s first 3D voice messenger iOS app available on iTunes, was created to provide a fun and personalized way to send mobile messages, without being manually typed. iGab combines the user's voice with a video animated 3D character to create a one-of-a-kind visual message.

iGab brings mobile messages to life. 

 

Why iGab was created

Over a leisurely Sunday brunch, three women began discussing the volume of text messages used in their daily lives, and how tedious it is to manually type out all those texts. Not to mention the lack of emotion in this form of communication. Could there be a way to make sending those reminders to get milk or asking friends out for drinks just a little more fun?

These three women went on to create a 3D voice messenger mobile app providing an animated way of communicating with friends and family, and saving the world from boring messages.

 

Send an iGab message in 4 easy steps.

 

 

 

 

 

With iGab, communication has never been so much fun!

  • Save the world from boring messages- send your reminders, invitations, or short requests with video animated characters and emotions recorded in your voice
  • Can be downloaded on iTunes for only $0.99 / €0.89
  • Instead of greeting cards, surprise your friends and family with a personalized iGab message
  • Forward your iGab with email, Twitter, Facebook and other messaging methods
  • No more embarrassing autocorrect mistakes
  • There are currently five Gabbers: Ruby the Dragon, Jaz the Grasshopper, Tucker the Turtle, Mack the Shark and I.G. the Alien with more on the way. Get to know them here!
  • Messages are only saved on your device. No copies are made on an external server.
  • Allow us to custom-design a personalized Gabber for yourself or your company. Click here to find out how Mobile Software AG did just that.
  • There is no age limit...anyone can have fun with iGab!

 

How You Can Help iGab grow.

Most people just follow trends. You have the chance to help start one.

Response since the iGab release in March of this year on iTunes has been very positive, in terms of the number of downloads in Europe and North America and feedback from iGab users.

Developed and launched on private funding only, we are now seeking contributions from outside sources, including individual and corporation funding.

Our plan is to take iGab to the next level on a global scale. Your contribution can help us reach this goal, and will be used in the following ways:

  • Develop an Android version of iGab to make the app accessible to more users (estimated cost: 15K)
  • Create additional iGab avatars (estimated cost: 6K)
  • Legal costs, including the securement of the iGab trademark in Europe and the US (estimated cost: 5K)
  • Implement a continuous global marketing program (estimated cost: 30K)  

 

Spread the word about iGab

iGab has received great coverage from the following sources:

  • TheAppleGoogle
  • Mobile App Chat
  • WSLS10(Southwest Virginia's NBC affiliate and the choice for local news and sports television)

You too can help spread the word! Tell your friends and family about iGab and be sure to follow us on Facebook, Twitter and YouTube.

 

Let’s bring mobile messages to life.

story:
Don’t Leave the House Without Your Todo!

All in One MP3 Player, Portable Powerbank, 3 Hard Disk Drives and Flashlight.

Are you in need of an audiophile-grade MP3 player to take with you on your holidays, camping and all outdoor adventures?

What if you could pair that MP3 player with a powerful powerbank that could charge your mobile phones anytime and a handy flashlight to light up your way in the night?  

Well, now you can!  

Take Your Music On the Go

Store Photos, Files and More in 3 USBs!​

  Juice Up Your Mobile Phone Anytime, Anywhere!​

 Light Up Your Nights​

USB Or Bluetooth Connection With Any Device​

Specifications:​

 

Share on Facebook or Tweet about this project and get for free

*Cables *Earphones

 

 Durable & Water resistant cover​

PERKS

 

Support TODO Today and Save Up to 60%!

Made with top quality materials and careful design, TODO guarantees to last for a really long time. Comparable to famous brands that normally cost around $400, this gadget will cost you up to 5 times less, without compromising quality or performance.

So wait no more!

Pledge, Support and Save Tons of Money Today!

 

Risks and challenges

We spent more than a few months, bringing TODO to its final form. We had to use our own personal money and time to make it work. This is because all of the materials that were used for this project were top quality.

We have also spent many hours thinking, designing and building internal parts and we have tested them all just to make sure what is best for you!

Apart from the high end technology used for this project we also used experienced people from different educational backgrounds such as mechanical and electronic Engineers and product designers.

Lastly we carefully set our funding goal just to make sure that all backers of this project will get their product without delay.

We are happy to bring TODO to life with your help and make your life easier.

Thank you,

The TodoTechnology Team

story:
What is the Solacket?

Solacket is the world's first Pocket Sized Solar Charger that can be used to charge any electronic gadget that falls in the power wattage range of 4 watts to 12 watts. Almost all of the smart phones, digital music players, digital cameras etc, fall in this range of power wattage.

Solacket charges your devices not just when there is light, but when it is dark too. It is equipped with an internal battery that can be used to charge your device when there is no sun or in the night. When you just keep Solacket out in the sun, it charges its internal batter, when any device is connected to it to charge, it

We created this great concept keeping in mind that the new generation have huge concern on our environment, they really want to make use of renewable energy and green energy but they cannot afford the devices because they are freaking costly. Even if they do, they cannot carry them, because they are freaking heavy.

We had lots of designs in our mind, but we chose the one design that is cost effective and portable, we built that on a bread board with separate components. All our test cases proved the functionality, this smaller device can be made and this great concept can be seen in reality soon.

We have come to Indiegogo because we cannot afford to build the tools for manufacturing even after putting all our hard earned money cutting down all our expenses, week end movies, vacation trips, fancy dresses etc.

We believe this idea is unique and worth supporting. Please do support us and help us contribute to the green energy innovation.

How different is our design?

  • Fold-able!
  • Internal Battery!
  • USB Supported!
  • Light Weight!
  • Stylish and Compact!
  • Portable and Handy!
  • Energy Efficient! & Eco Friendly!
  • Available with all universal pins + Adapters too!
  • Can be used anywhere in the world!
  • Can be used for wide range of electronic gadgets!


USB Supported!


Intelligent and Smart - Charges Phone First and then Itself!

Solacket first charges the devices that are connected and then charges its internal battery. Internal battery can be used to charge your phone/camera/tablets anytime and anywhere later!


Simply unfold and keep it anywhere there is some light.

_________________________________________________________________________

You may ask what difference it makes because my phone just uses 6 watts of power.

Well, according to the data evaluated in 2013, 97% of the people use mobile phones in the world. One phone uses 4 to 8 watts of power but there are 11 billion devices such as phones, music players and digital cameras which use the same 4 to 8 watts of power. The average power consumed by all of them put together is approximately 66 billion watts. It’s freaking 66 billon watts folks.

That’s like one month of power used by any large city in the world. Almost all of it is from Coal, Oil, Natural Gas, Nuclear etc that are hazardous to the environment. Imagine if all of it was green energy - we could have saved the earth from getting even dirtier!

Better late than never, let’s contribute to this green energy innovation; let’s make the Mother Nature fresher, and cleaner!

It's possible when you support us to bring this concept into reality!

_________________________________________________________________________

What you charge and where you charge is your choice!

Specifications

Capacity: up to 14000mAh
Power: Max 12 watts *
Size: 3X4 inches when folded
Battery: Lithium Polymer
Indicators: 3 LEDs
      Red – Charging Device
     Amber – Charging Internal Battery
     Green – Solar Charging
Over charging protection!
Body Material: Fibre
*tests have proved to support up to 32 watts however to make it smaller; wattage is reduced to max 12 watts however we are regularly improving our device to support 32 watts at no cost of size.

_________________________________________________________________________

Why we need your support!

We have been working on Solar Chargers for the past one year using our personal funds to get to this point. We have come up with a unique design that suites everyone and every smart phone / digital camera. Currently we have individual components solar cells, Li-ion batteries, Bread-boards, cables that prove our design. We have done lots of iterative testing and refining for over a year. We are now working hard on building our first fully complete pre-production unit. Your support will make us bring this concept into reality.
You are no just contributing for this project, you are contributing for making use of renewable energy that largely helps in reducing pollution and saving the environment.
Please check our survey to know how much positive impact this project makes on environment.


Manufacturing Process Timelines

Other Ways You Can Help!

If it's difficult for you to contribute money, we truly understand. Still you can contribute by making some noise about this campaign.

Please share this campaign with as many people as you can, each share counts and means alot to us.

Please use the Indiegogo share tools!

Thank you very much! All your contributions are highly appreciated!

FAQ

Can I choose the color and design? when?

You can choose. We will update each and every stage of our project. All the availble colors will be updated to you by October. We will provide you the link to a website where you can choose color and design.

What about shipping cost?

Shipping cost is included in the perks.

When are you going to send my perk?

Estimated is by end of Feb-2015 however we will work hard to get your perks delivered sooner than Feb-2015.

How long does battery last?

If you do not use it to charge, it lasts for 4 weeks.

Can I charge my laptop?

No, however we are working on to develop a compact model for Laptops as well.

What are the risks and challenges in making these solar chargers?

There are minimal risks, we are overcoming by working hard to make it a success. We are trying to make these chargers as light as possible by removing our original metallic covers to corbon fiber covers.

What if we don't reach our goal?
Many of you might be wondering, What if we don't reach our goal? Where will the funds go? No need to worry folks! we will keep our promise to deliver your perks in time. All the funds we raise will go in setting up the tools and manufacturing the chargers for the perks we have promised. If the total funds we raise are not enough, we will create quality product with the funds we get and deliver you a quality perk for your money.

story:
Be a part of the creation of the first apple whisky – And let’s take Pommeau outside of france!

All natural ingredients. Nothing else!
Our award winning Pommeau is comprised of a blend of our apple brandy (calvados) and fresh apple juice, then aged in oak barrels for at least one year. 
The award winning Apple Brandy is made the traditional way Calvados is made, but only with Swedish apples, which brings out more apple flavor to the drink. To top this off, we have used doublewood to age the apple brandy. 
Then we have a completely unique Apple whisky. You know what Whisky tastes like; imagine that we distilled it in our pot still right after the apple brandy and then put the whisky to age in a used apple brandy cask.  It is smooth and soft and full of flavor from the raw material, just like all our products. 


In Sweden, apples matures slowly, becomes firmer and get a richer flavor. XO Spirits makes Pommeau and Apple Brandy ​​solely from apples from southern Sweden (Österlen), and a Whisky which is made of Swedish malt, nothing else. 


Without any artificial, unnatural ingredients, this is made with a straightforward production process that emphasizes the raw materials own taste - without superfluous efforts, complications or manipulations.  It is handcrafted!    

We distill everything in our Pot Still which captures the flavor from the raw material in a quite unique way.The apple whisky undergoes the same unique process as the apple brandy and that is why its natural flavors are smooth, soft and upfront. The apple whisky is one of a kind and is not released yet, so this is world premiere!!!                                                                                    


Why are we doing this?

We learned the trade of making wine and spirits from Moët Hennessy a few years back and discovered when we came back to Sweden that we probably have the best apples in the world to make good beverages from. 


What We Need & What You Get

We need funds to expand outside Sweden and grow our production capacity.  You will decide which countries we will expand to by contributing. Each perk gives you a number of votes to a country. This will be tracked on our homepage and the top two countries will be conquered by XO Spirits next year.

  • For each market we estimate we need $50 000. This will allow us to participate in the most important spirits exhibition in that market; plus fund the necessary compliance adjustments to get started.

We are moving to a new production facility this fall which allows us to ramp up production capacity to about 50 000 bottles per year.  It is 1200sq meters and located in Österlen, Southern Sweden. Österlen is like the Swedish version of Napa Valley, Bordeaux, Tuscany, Yarra Valley, etc (I think you got it!). 

  • The building and the land costs $133 000.
We offer perks from owning your own barrel to joining us at the distillery to distill your own favorite booze. 

      Perks for our Indiegogo contributors

      Here's a breakdown of the perks you can choose from when you support this campaign (select your perk from the sidebar at the top of this page). All our contributors are welcome to visit us at the distillery



        Our markets

        We sell solely to the Swedish market today.  Restaurants replace their global brands products with ours one after the other. We will expand into other markets and we also ask for you direction here. Check out the perk "Expansion"!


        We believe it is important to be transparent to our customer, consumers and you who supports us. When we sell our products we explain the procedures how we make the products. We communicate the ingredients on the label together with the person who has made it. This means that you can directly contact the person who made your bottle for questions or comments.  No fuzz!!

         When shall I drink it?

        Our products are especially good when you just want to enjoy a moment because it is smooth and soft with flavors of the natural raw materials and authenticity. Pommeau is an Aperitif with 18% alcohol but also perfect after dinner with a dessert or by itself with ice on the veranda with a good friend. The Apple Brandy and Whisky hold about 40% alcohol and is perfect to enjoy with a good friend or a cigarr. 


        Risk & Challenges

        We have signed a rental agreement with the seller of the property until we have received the funding to purchase it. This reduces the risk of losing the property to another party in the meantime.  

        Will put your name on the label, great isn't it? 


        -------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

        You've heard from us and now we'd love to hear from you. 


        Please let us know if you have any questions, comments or suggestions!

        Email us at Support

        Please note that our team will try as hard as possible to answer any and all questions and comments that you have.

        Don't forget to like and follow us for the latest information on facebook

        XO Spirits Facebook

        What happens now?

        You order and pay now, and then we work together until your spirit is ready. All products will be stored in new french oak barrels and then in a used barrels for doublewood effect. The delivery of the finished product will be in about 1-3 years depending on your choice of product. If you do not want to wait that long, we can customize any of our standard range of products already on the barrel, and therefore can be bottled earlier. Let us know. 

        1. You pay a fee for your reservation and storage of spirits here on the indiegogo website.
        2. When You paid the money we will register you reservation. Congratulations! We will send proof of ownership for your reservation.
        3. We start preparing your particular spirit in the distillery and fill up the barrel. We will keep you posted on the activity.  
        4. All barrels are stored in our warehouse. You may sample each year and follow the development and maturation.
        5. We consult with you about when it is time to bottle the spirits. Tell us what you want to have on the label. Up to 30 characters.
        6. When we have bottled Your spirit. We will send it to an approved outlet for you to pick up and pay the remains of the bottles.
        7. At the outlet, they will charge current alcohol tax, VAT and outlet's margin will be added when you pick up the bottled spirits.
        8. Time to enjoy your own unique spirit.


        QUESTIONS YOU MIGHT ASK

        How old must I be to purchase a spirits?

        You must of legal drinking age in your country on the day of contributing in this campaign. Do not be creative

        Can I buy spirits now if I’m not at legel age now but will be by 2015?

        Again, you must be of legal drinking age AT THE TIME OF PURCHASE.

        Can I buy spirits now if I’m not at legal age but am giving it as a gift to someone who is?

        No.

        When will the spirits be made?

        Most of it is already prepared and is waiting for you in the barrels. Since barrel aging takes some time, we thought about this three years ago and now want to share this with you. We are promising a set of unique drinks. 

        Just how rare are these products?

        Pretty damn rare! The apple whisky does not exists anywhere, the apple brandy aged in sherry cask likewise - completely unique. The pommeau made from Swedish apples, nowhere. So take this opportunity and be the first!

        Are you shipping your products direct in Europe?

        It’s pretty much legal to ship alcohol direct to consumers in Europe, so yes. When the spirit is ready, you’ll be notified and asked where you want us to ship this to. There will be a charge to cover shipping and handling. If you live in the certain states in the US or another country where liquor laws are.. hmm restricted. You need to allow us some time to find a good partner where you can collect your products. 

        What if I want to switch the product I purchased to another product in the series?

        We understand being selective. We were VERY specific in our choices, too. We don’t well up with glee in making this decree, but NO CHANGES will be allowed. Once a decision is made, the die is cast.

        What if I have a change of heart and no longer want the products I purchased?

        Sorry, but all sales are final. Choose wisely and be at peace with your decision before clicking CONTRIBUTE.

        Will any of these products be available for retail purchase later on?

        Anyone, including distributing companies and retail operations, can purchase the products during the campaign at the same price as the general public. There is no way for us to police who purchases the products via this platform. However, if it should end up being resold at a retail establishment, it will have traveled from Distributor to Retailer and gotten marked up along the way, thus the Retailer will be selling it at a substantially higher price (that’s how the spirts biz generally works). 

        Remember, noone have the very same label as you do!

        How much may I purchase?

        First off, we LOVE your attitude and are glad to say you can purchase as many as you like. The Apple Whisky and Apple Brandy is unfortunately limited. First come, first served. But because you’re buying “spirits-futures”, we will do our best to accommodate all of you.

        Let's innovate the spirits market together!

We understand being selective. We were VERY specific in our choices, too. We don’t well up with glee in making this decree, but NO CHANGES will be allowed. Once a decision is made, the die is cast.
What if I have a change of heart and no longer want the products I purchased?
Sorry, but all sales are final. Choose wisely and be at peace with your decision before clicking CONTRIBUTE.
Will any of these products be available for retail purchase later on?
Anyone, including distributing companies and retail operations, can purchase the products during the campaign at the same price as the general public. There is no way for us to police who purchases the products via this platform. However, if it should end up being resold at a retail establishment, it will have traveled from Distributor to Retailer and gotten marked up along the way, thus the Retailer will be selling it at a substantially higher price (that’s how the spirts biz generally works). 
Remember, noone have the very same label as you do!
How much may I purchase?
First off, we LOVE your attitude and are glad to say you can purchase as many as you like. The Apple Whisky and Apple Brandy is unfortunately limited. First come, first served. But because you’re buying “spirits-futures”, we will do our best to accommodate all of you.
Let's innovate the spirits market together!

story:
EbuGamer has given away $30,000 worth of pc games, consoles and Pc hardware to kids and families that don't get a chance to play them. I Have recently been interviewed by the Australian Times mag for my contributions to the comminuty. So I'm in need of a new chair and I don't ask for much but I really need a chair, I'm still using a wooden dinning room chair. 

Here is my Facebook page and my interview is on the page

story:
What is iEAR? 

iEAR headset adopts bluetooth4.0 Low Energy and Bone Conductive technology. To enjoy music, you can hear the ambient sounds (car horn sound, doorbell sound, someone call you…) as well while you are driving, biking, excising, cooking, playing game…..etc, iEAR can ensure you in safety to response various situation and don’t miss important message you shall be aware of.The iEAR can be connected to a compatible mobile phone / devices (iPhone, iPod Touch, iPad, and Android smart phone) and computer that support Bluetooth wireless technology. In a Bluetooth connection, the headset and the other device should be within 10 meter (33 feet) of each other.


What is Bone Conduction Technology? 

Bone conduction technology allows you to listen to the music and answering the phone through your cheekbones vibration and deliver the sounds to your inner ear straightly. You can hear the ambient sound when listen music or talk someone on the phone at the same time.

Bone Conduction definition by wiki  :http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Bone_conduction


iEAR Features:

*transmits sounds through your cheekbones to inner ears

*comfortable fit and wearing to let your ears freedom

*hearing ambient sounds to let you having awareness to response various situation

*Multitask to remain connection with targets, such as listen music, take care of kids,  ring bell or answering phone call…

*sweat proof

*built-in rechargeable Lithium-ion Polymer Battery, you may recharge iEAR through USB to MicroUSB cable by the computer, power bank and USB AC adaptor.


iEAR Specification:

*Bluetooth Compatible Version: 4.0 / 2.0+EDR / 2.1+EDR / 2.2+EDR

* Supported Bluetooth Profiles: A2DP v1.2, AVRCP v1.4, HFP v1.6 wideband speech (HD voice ready), HSP v1.2. Also support: aptX codec

* Transmission Range*: 10 meters (33 feet)

-- Actual transmission range may differ according to real environmental interference. 

*Battery Type: Rechargeable Lithium-ion Polymer Battery 200mAh

*Fast charge in 2 hours

*Microphone Type: Dual Electret condenser microphone -40dB +-3dB

*Speaker Type：Dual suspension bone conduction

*Frequency response:300Hz - 20KHz

* Connector of charger: Micro USB type B.

*Playback Time: Up to 5 hours with normal volume

*Bluetooth connecting time: 20 hours



iEAR Timeframe:


Why do I need iEAR? Is it better than common bluetooh / wi-fi headset?

Anyone who wants their ears get freedom and comfortable when listen music and talk on the phone for the hours ; Wearing iEAR, you may not only enjoy music but also can ensure your safety and let your hands free even while doing an activity that requires your ears, eyes and hands to be available

You may have different type Bluetooth headset for the activities, one for listening music, one for driving to answer the phone, one for sport activities. Now, iEAR can satisfy all these demands.

iEAR is designed for:

*people cannot live without music 

*PC gamer

*driving

*sport activity

*housekeeper

*kids & teenager

*elder people

*commuter

*people who cannot wear earbuds (in-ear headphones) perfectly fit due to the natural physical of their ears.


What We Need & What You Get

Every dollar from you is precious and meaningful for us, we regard your supports as your trust to us. Only we can do is we concentrate to approach our goal, then we deliver the iEAR to you on time. We don’t expect this campaign not reach goal……

    We provide the unique perks to you, the pre-order price US$74.00 to the Indiegogo contributors, the first 300 early bird contributors can get most special price : one iEAR US$69.00, two iEARs US$128.00 in total (average is US$64.00 each).

      Don’t miss this opportunity to get iEAR in Indiegogo, you could receive iEAR in the beginning of Oct. One month early than our official launching will be in the beginning of Nov. and with market price US$99.90 per each.


      If you not yet have bluetooth headset,iEAR will be good choice! Share this campaign link to your friends.


      About iTOMO

      iTOMO’s design team and manufacture are in Taiwan. iTOMO indicates to provide the fabulous wireless gadget and accessory by Bluetooth4.0 technology to make your life smart, simple and convenient.

story:
Introduction:

My name is Lyman Connor. In October 2013 I was involved in a near fatal bicycle accident. The days that I spent in the Neuro ICU left me with plenty to think about. Would I be able to go forth with my career? How would I handle the stigma of not being considered "normal" as I had scars across my face and had lost the use of an eye? I knew that It would take a long time to recover from the physical and psychological injuries but I was determined. All of my strife and self pity were put into perspective and blown away the day that I was discharged. I had occasion to share an elevator ride to the lobby with a young family whose son was missing his right hand and that chance encounter led to the creation of the "Mano-Matic". Find the entire story and genealogy here.

3ders Article      Gizmag

Ge Reports


I am going to design and make a  suite of low cost, high tech enabling devices that can be purchased for pennies on the dollar. The Mano-Matic is the first product in this suite. The hand has established provisional patents and is 90% complete cosmetically. The control hardware and software are 100% complete. This product will be manufactured in Roanoke, Va utilizing a local machine shop and the rest of the parts will be 3D printed in my home workshop.

 I have been 100% self financed to date and have absolutely run out of funds. The funding will be used to purchase a professional grade 3D printer as my other printer failed and provide funding to pass final patent licensing. The initial hand will be released October 3 , 2014, rain or shine and if the child in question does not come forward a new candidate will be chosen and the finished hand fitted by a local prosthetics provider. Two additional hands will be produced and recipients chosen before December 2014.

 All of the initial hands will be donated to children at no cost. My goal is reasonable and achievable and I am committed to seeing it through to fruition. Please help me achieve this goal and help others.

Support and Rewards

I need financial help to purchase a new printer and to finalize the outer skin of the hand. The financial support will also go towards purchasing the drive mechanisms and electronics hardware to support building 3 hands for delivery to candidates before the end of 2014. All of the initial  recipients will be children. Hopefully one of which I met in a  hospital elevator on October 8, 2013.

The rewards are that we help out three children and empower them and sustain development of more devices that impact other physical challenges. 

    The Impact

    You are helping to pay for three Mano-Matic bionic prosthetic hands that were manufactured with attention to engineering rigor, quality and durability. I made a hand that I would choose as my own and built in all of those items that are critical to quality to ensure that the product is robust and functional. To get a similar product from a medical provider would cost in excess of $30~50,000.00 USD. This product is priced such that the out of pocket medical deductible required to purchase the similar products can easily pay for the cost of a Mano-Matic in full, ~$4000.00 USD!

    The result of my mission is to mitigate the practice of charging exorbitant prices for  enabling devices and remove the "value pricing"  proposition associated with devices. "Need an Arm? How much money do you have !" Is going to go away!

      Risks & Challenges

      We're almost there! I've ran the marathon and I need people to help me across the finish line. People can visualize the determination in my face and decide to help me accomplish something that was only a vision 10 months ago. There are no challenges that would impact this project in such a way that would cause me to abandon it. I have over $10,000 invested from my own retirement fund which is risky at 54 years of age with kids in college. The fruits of my determination and dedication is to be shared by all that I am able to help. I would do the same thing over again from scratch if need be as It was very revealing of me as an individual and humanity as a whole.

        Other Ways You Can Help

        Spread the word about this project and the associated links. It may impact someone thatyou know. GE Reports

story:
Siberia is the wildest and the frostiest place in the world.

Siberia is a vast territory, wild and sparsely populated. There is nothing more than endless taiga, frost and wild bears. No one can hear you, whatever you do.

But interestingly Siberia has the highest scientific and technical potential. Today there function Siberian Branches of the Russian Academy of Sciences(SB RAS) within the territory of Siberian Federal District, as well as highly successful technology parks, which are engaged in development in the field of high technology.

Surely many have heard of Akademgorodok (also known as Silicon Taiga), established by Mikhail Alekseevich Lavrentyev, an outstanding academician of the USSR. Divisions of Intel and Schlumberger have recently been opened in Akademgorodok. Unique developments of Institute of Nuclear Physics and Institute of Theoretical and Applied Mechanics of the Siberian Branch of the RAS (all of these are based in Akademgorodok) are used in airports and astronautics these days.

So at the premises of Siberian techparks there was developed a new technology called...

The service is easy because it provides you with online access to all the relevantspecial offers, discounts and promotions, not only within the city, but also around the world.

The application is free and is available for download on two operating systems :
Android and iOs
You can easily download it to your smartphone from the market, be it PlayGoogle or AppStore, and use discounts with the help of your smartphone , while traveling to Russia , Europe or any other country where we will implement the technology.

Why do we need facilities?

We have already started implementing the technology in Siberia and we are already approaching the level of the whole country. Moreover, during the process of negotiations there has been reached an agreement that would ensure the development of the project within the territory of Europe and Asia in 2014.


Some interesting facts:

According to a research company Gartner:

• 79 % of people prefer those goods which are participating in promotions.
• 87 % of customers do not know about current promotions before going shopping
• 43% of failed shopping arises from the absence of instant communication channel between customers and retailers

In July 1959 the 36-37 U.S. President Richard Nixon visited Akademgorodok, which then was under construction.
Quotation: "Now I see the technical progress of your great country, and I understand why it was able to create the first artificial satellite of the Earth ... "

In 2012 Ernst & Young estimated that the Russian venture market is the fifth largest in the world and the second in Europe.

In 2012, there are 267 venture deals for $ 1.213 billion closed in Russia, according to a study of Russian and global venture capital market in 2007-2013. The survey was conducted by Ernst & Young (EY) by order of the Russian Venture Company (RVC). Russia became the fifth venture market in the world after the United States ($ 32.1 billion), China ($ 4.9 billion), the UK ($ 1.8 billion) and India ($ 1.6 billion). At the same time it surpassed such successful venture capital markets as Germany ($ 1.1 billion) and Israel ($ 1 billion).

story:
What is Closure ?


Tired of having tangles every time you leave your earphones for one second?
We present to you, the Closure.
The perfect solution for tangle earphones.
The main advantage of this product is that it can stay on
your earphones in any time


                                                                                          
What is it made of?
Closure is made of rubber, and weights less than 3g,
it is elastic and can be suitable for various kinds of earphones
there are two slots in each side, which through them
Closure can connect easily to your earphone.
We added a plastic white cover to each Closure - so you can
stick your own special sticker (see more information about this below)

 

 


Design Process

When we first thought about the idea, we tested it using a rubber band,
just to make sure the cables will not tangle when connecting all the ends together.

Then we drew some sketches to see how it will look like.


Then we move to Illustrations - to see how the product will look like.

                      

For our prototype, we printed our model using a 3D printer,
and after a few weeks  (maybe more than few...) we got the perfect model.

Before mass production we verified that the sizes are right.

Neon Green !

Awesome Cyan !

     

Classic Gray !

      

                                                                                     
Closure 101 - How to use

Using Closure is simple and easy - it takes only 3 steps
to set up your earphones to be tangled free


The 3 basic steps:
1. Connect the Closure using the two slots.
2. Slide it up - there is no problem if you are having a
    microphone in the middle, just unplug the cable from one
    of the slots and connect it again right after the microphone connector.
3. Insert both of the earphones into the socket, then plug the
  audio plug into its socket and now your earphones are ready to store!

Special Features:

You probably noticed that there's a white plastic cover on each of our closures,
This plastic can be used in several ways:
1. Draw a nice painting and show it to your friends.
2. Stick a sticker or a funny meme you like.
3. For company use, you can add your company logo.

 

 

Shipment Information:

 


Supported earphones: 

 Basically, any earphone with this:

 

And this:


About us:

We are 25 years old entrepreneurs, we know each other since high
school. In these days we are both working in high tech companies.
We love to think about new ideas that could help other people.
Our dream is to quit our jobs and start a business of our own.


                                                                                      
Risks and Challenges:
Like every project, we had challenges during the design process,
first we printed it using a 3D printer, just to see if it will
fit to the earphones cables, we repeated this process several
times until we got a good prototype. Then we moved to a rubber prototype,
at first we got a model that was too elastic so the earphones cables just
slipped from it, after several tests we increased the rubber strength
and got a model that can keep the cables in the right position.


Warning: Not for children under 3 yrs - small parts
Thank you so much for checking out our project!!!

And Remember, Closure is for everyone ! :)

story:
After years of research, and inspired by the Switch handheld -easy to carry, the GameSir X2 Bluetooth Mobile Gaming Controller is coming. It is specially built for unprecedented gaming performance and unrivaled reliability. The next-generation mobile controller criteria are refreshed by GameSir.

✅ 2 in 1, compatible with Google Play games and MFi games. 

✅ Compatible with cloud gaming, support multiple popular cloud gaming platforms such as Microsoft's xCloud, Google's stadia, and Vortex, etc.

✅ Compatible with Apple arcade.

✅ Support most mobile devices. its capacity is up to 173 mm in length.

✅ Support customizable keymapping.

✅ One-click screenshot.

✅ Soft rubber grips: cozy handheld feelings.

 

We are proud of what we have created to date but need your help to push it over the limit. By supporting us, you will witness the birth of GameSir X2 Bluetooth Mobile Gaming Controller. We have a fully functional physical model of the device now and all funds raised will go directly to funding the final mass production. We would like you to join us on our journey to bring the product to life.
As early backers, we are keen on rewarding you with some unique perks. All GameSir X2 Bluetooth Mobile Gaming Controller perks up to 34% off from the planned retail price-   
buy one, $49 / PCS, 17% off; buy two, $45 / PCS, 25% off; buy 10 PCS, $40 / PCS, 34% off.
The first deliveries will begin in April 2021 - only for early backers.

What prizes will the lucky backers receive?

The 1st Prize, one GameSir X2 Bluetooth Mobile Gaming Controller for FREE, 3 lucky backers.

The 2nd Prize, one GameSir F4 Falcon Mobile Controller for FREE, 5 lucky backers.

The 3rd Prize, one GameSir F2 Grip for FREE, 10 lucky backers.

We will post the list of lucky backers on our Facebook.

The prizes will be sent together with GameSir X2 ordered on Indiegogo in Apr 2021.

As always, we will provide free shipping.

 

 

 

 

Note：Before you pledge, please make sure that your delivery destination is listed as followed, otherwise, we cannot deliver your items.

（1）Europe: Germany, Britain, France, Spain, Italy

（2）North America: United States, Canada

（3）South America: Brazil

（4）Asia: Japan

（5）Australia: Australia, New Zealand

（6）Middle East: Saudi Arabia, United Arab Emirates 

Free shipping for all.

In order to make more gamers can enjoy the sheer joy brought by our product, GameSir is striving to cooperate with the global well-renowned logistics companies. However, allowing for complicated and uncontrolled factors, some countries and regions are still out of reach, we are sorry to those gamers, but we are working on expanding our delivery range. We believe that in the near future, you shall experience our products crafted by passion and out-of-state technology. Thank you for your attention to this campaign.

 

 

 

 

1. Can I use it to play CODM，Fortnite, PUBG Moblie?

For CODM, you can plug & play in iOS, and for playing in Android you need to key mapping through GameSir App. For Fortnite, you can Plug & Play in both android & iOS. For PUBG Mobile it needs GameSir App for key mapping.

2. What cloud gaming platforms does it support?

Xcloud, Stadia, Vortex, Parsec, Liquidsky, Shadow, and so on.

3. What games does it support?

Google play games. All games on cloud gaming platforms.

iOS games (MFi and Apple Arcade): https://www.gamesir.hk/pages/mfi-games-list

Android games: https://www.gamesir.hk/blogs/supported-games-list

4. Does it support Android Tablets and iPad?

Yes, it does, but we don't recommend it. Because it supports devices up to a maximum of 173 mm in length.

5. What are the differences between X2 BT and Razer Kishi controller?

Kishi has two versions, wired connection, the retail price is 99USD, X2 Bluetooth is for both Android phone and iPhone, the retail price is 59USD.

6. What are the differences between X2 BT and Samsung glap controller?

The Samsung glap controller only supports Android phones, retail price is 99USD, X2 Bluetooth is for both Android phones and iPhones, the retail price is 59USD.

7. What are the differences between X2 BT and backbone controller?

The backbone controller only supports iOS, retail price is 99USD, X2 Bluetooth is for both Android phone and iPhone, the retail price is 59USD.

8. Does it support Egg NS Emulator?

No, it doesn’t.

9. What are the differences between X2 BT and X2 type C?

X2 Bluetooth mobile controller is a wireless controller, supports Android phone and iPhone, the layout of ABXY buttons is the same as the Xbox controller. The X2 Type-C controller is a wired controller, supports only Android phone, the layout of ABXY buttons is the same as the Nintendo Switch.

10. How is it latency?

10 milliseconds.

11. What phones does it support? Does it support foldable phones? Does it support tablet?

It supports phones up to 173mm in length, and for G-touch mode, it supports snapdragon CPU Android phones and iOS version 13.4 and lower version Apple phones.

12. When do you ship the controller? Do you ship globally? Do I need to pay the freight?

In Apr. Yes, but we can only ship to the following countries: Europe: Germany, United Kingdom, France, Spain, Italy North America: United States, Canada South America: Brazil Asia: Japan Australia: Australia, New Zealand Middle East: Saudi Arabia, United Arab Emirates Free shipping for all.

13. Does it support customizable key mapping?

Yes, you can use the GameSir App to customize the buttons for both iOS and Android phones. But it supports snapdragon CPU Android phones and iOS version 13.4 and lower version Apple phones.

14. Does it still use the Nintendo ABXY layout?

No, Now it's in the Xbox controller layout.

15. Does it support phone with case?

Yes, but only thin case.

16. Does it have L3 and R3 buttons?

Yes.

18.How to use headphones with it?

It doesn’t support headphones.

19.Can it be used with PC?

NO

20. How to update firmware?

Use GameSir app to update the firmware. Currently, The GameSir App in the google play store does not support firmware updates for X2. Please use the official channel to upgrade it.

story:
Price informative application with a virtual cart. Users receive coupons & promotional offers. A new targeted platform for advertisers!

The App Color & Logo

"Bajar" means marketplace in Bangladesh. Therefore eBajar means electronic marketplace. Bangladesh is home to 170 million people. It is the world's most densely populated country. Traffic congestion is an everyday problem in major cities. People do not have the time to visit different marketplaces and find the best price, best promotion, best deals. And that is where "eBajar" comes into play.

There will be both website (static & dynamic) as well as mobile application for eBajar. There are 3 (three) benefits to the user of this app:

(i) The user gets the latest price of (a) groceries (b) electronics (c) automobiles (d) real-estate (e) events: concert, art exhibition, sports, etc. (f) services: hotels, air, bus, train, etc.

The Interface

By saying the latest price, our team updates the current market price of literally everything you find at a grocery stores, electronics store, automobiles as well as events that are taking place in the city.

(ii) Benefit#2: The user not only gets the current market price BUT also gets a virtual cart (wish list) where he/she can add the products and services they need. In other words the user benefits from NOT having to write down the grocery list or type it down in their notes anymore. They can add the products in their wish list and get to see the total budget. The users get an idea how much money to take out (from home or ATM) before they go out for shopping. Users can even forward the cart(wish list) to another person to carry out the shopping.

The Virtual Cart (Wish-List)

(iii) And the best part: Benefit#3: The user gets coupons, promotional offers, discounts and many exciting offers based on what they have in their cart. The users get to see the nearest seller from the maps. The user gets all the information of sellers including current promotions. The user gets notification if prices of a product/service changes that is already in their cart. Users also get notified if the date/time/venue of an event changes that is already in their cart.

Exciting Coupons!

Its not the end of benefits, the user can follow their favorite stores and get updates of their current offers, coupons, promotions. The users can share the coupons or exciting offers with their friends. The app allows to invite and add friends for exchanging coupons. It will be the Facebook and Twitter of marketplaces!

It is difficult to go for window shopping and hop 5 different stores to get the best deal due to traffic congestion and time constraint. It is also difficult to call a friend and get his/her advice or reviews on a particular product/service. Those days are over! The "eBajar" app is the solution.

The Usual Dhaka Traffic!

The funds that we will raise from indiegogo is just enough for covering the development costs (we are using JAVA for the project) and promoting the brand "eBajar" in Dhaka. With successful launch we will replicate the same model for North America, South America, Europe and Asia with regional content of course.

Even a killer app may not do well for poor marketing. With proper funding we can overcome that hurdle too. Keep the faith in our project and we will make it. We believe in luck (labor under correct knowledge). If so many people's (backers) luck is associated with the project then chances for success is definitely high.

Good luck backers and thanks for your support.

Team eBajar!

story:
I'm an advice columnist and part time drag queen in my sixties. I don't mind looking rediculous if it helps me continue to live indoors, so I have created "Darika's Tasteless Virtual Greeting Card App." No kitties, illustrations of snowy scenes or birthday cakes. Just pictures of me doing what I do best--looking rediculous. The iOS version was just finished. My first programmer burned my entire budget to produced a piece of garbage, so I had to start all over again. Now I have no money left for an Android version, which means many millions will not have a chance to experience tastelessness. If I raise more than I need I will use it for a pilot for my TV cooking show "Cooking with Darika." She cooks in the garage so the house won't smell bad. But that's another story.

My Facebook page: www.facebook.com/darlingdarika  Pleeeeeze like me!

My website, Ask Darika: www.askdarika.com

story:
Tired of charging your smartphone during the day?


Presenting The Quantum Rabbbit, the fastest rechargeable battery for smartphones and other digital products.  Be the first to pre-order a fast charging battery. Get the fastest battery before all ! Less than one minute to charge from 1% to 100%.

The Quantum Rabbbit  was started by three chemists in Switzerland with an idea. An idea for a really fast rechargeable battery for smartphones or other digital products. We found finally the solution in stable nano crystals, that we use in our batteries instead of lithium ion. This batterie is patent pending.


Charge your Quantum Rabbbit  in less than a minute!





For smartphones and most digital products


For your Apple

Charge your iPad




For your Samsung

Charge your Galaxy





For your Apple

Charge your iPhone




For everything

Charge your gadgets




Small

Fits in your pocket (95x56x20mm)


Lightweight

Weight: just 80g 


Technical 

Application: Smartphone and all the digital products
Material: PC and ABS
Battery nano crystal (patent pend.)
Capacity: 3000 mAh
Output: USB
Power:
 AC adaptor (included)
Protection: Overcharge protection
over-discharge protection
short circuit protection
Dimension:   
Weight:		 95x25X25 mm
80g


What are Nano Crystals?

A nano crystal is made of materials that are small enough to exhibit quantum mechanical properties. The first commercial release was the Sony flat panel television in 2013. Self-assembled nano crystals are typically between 5 and 50 nm in size, and small enough to exhibit quantum confinement effects. There are different chemical and physical solutions for the nano crystal growth. The idea, to use nano crystals in batteries is not new. The challenge is to manipulate the chemistry of this nano crystals and to fine-tune the self-assambly.



What We Need & What You Get

Why we need you? Why Indiegogo? Because we want to stay independent minded. And financially independent. Help us make these into a reality. Help us make these into a reality by donating to our campaign. We need your support. Without you, none of this would be possible.

With your help, we'll be able to make these batteries in highest quality. In return, you will get the fastest rechargeable battery for your smartphone or iPad or iPod. We need at least $ 100,000 to pay for the cost for the patent and of everything that's needed to produce these batteries in series. The donations you give us will be used for making these batteries reality. We need your help to get out of the lab.

In return, you will get the fastest rechargeable battery for your smartphone or iPad or iPod . First, and for a special price for backers.


Who we are

Quantum Rabbbit is created by three chemist, work since many years in switzerland. Our group perform research in the fields of materials chemistry, polymers, biomaterials, organic and inorganic self-assembly, electronic materials photonics and quantum dots. Over the last year we have work many nights to make this prototype reality. The next steps are of course to make it smaller, and more powerful. With your support and your donations also this next step becomes reality. 


Perks

This is a limited edition Indiegogo discount price, included free shipping.
Get one, two or three Quantum Rabbbit ultra fast charging batteries and the adaptor for your digital products like smartphones or pads, now. 
Stable over multiple cycles of charging.


  • Production timeline

    NOVEMBER 2014

    Indiegogo Campagne ends, patent application 

    DECEMBER 2014

    Engineering Samples

    JANUARY 2015

    Pre Production Samples

    FEBRUARY 2015

    Production Samples

    MARCH 2015
    Production
    APRIL/May 2015
    Delivery to Backers


Risks and Challenge 

We are an amazing team, but there is always the potential  of problems that may alter our plans. Changes in the design maybe have to been  made, suppliers have to be in time, and quality have to be checked. We have seen many stones on our way till now, and we know, we will see more, but till now none have stopped us. And with your support everything will be possible. The highest hurdle, making the prototype work, is already behind us.

Thank you so much for your support!
