story:
Tech Crunch "...gives your smartphone a dedicated panic button."

The Next Web "...secretly send out an emergency alert."

CNET "....I'd like to deploy Lifesaver Cases to my wife, daughter, and aging parents."

App Advice "...does a lot more than just protect an iPhone from daily wear and tear."

Macgasm "The Lifesaver iPhone Case Could, Well, Save Your Life"

Cult of Mac "The case is called the Lifesaver, and that’s just what it does."

Ubergizmo "...what if there are things that you are unable to tell 911 or describe to them due to a factor of reasons? What if you are lost and can’t tell them where exactly you are? Enter the Lifesaver Case."

TUAW "...looks like a great idea to me."

Help is always at your fingertips. 

Here's how it works:

It's that easy. Help is on the way with the flick of a switch. 


Is this really necessary?

The Lifesaver Case is a great product for especially for women, elderly and teens of all ages. The harsh reality is that there are countless situations in which your life may be in danger, but often times you may not be able to make a call or speak to an emergency dispatcher.

Whether it's child abduction, domestic violence, assault, robbery, a medical emergency, or a home invasion the Lifesaver Case is ready to immediately send help without alerting the aggressor(s).

It takes 5-6 steps to dial 911 from an iPhone if the keypad is locked. That's just to get the dispatcher on the line. After that you still have to describe the emergency and give your location. We created the Lifesaver Case to solve these problems.

Founder, came up the Lifesaver Case following a terrifying personal experience:

"A few years ago, a man accosted my 12 year old daughter on her way to school and tried to get her into his vehicle. It truly is a parent's worst nightmare and even though we hear stories on the news constantly, it's one of those things you think will never happen to you. I was equally as horrified when I started to research the statistics on violent crimes - particularly those against women, children and the elderly. When I realized there was nothing on the market to address the issue - I went to work. $100,000, and 2 years later, the Lifesaver Case is ready to do just that."

These are just a few of the sobering statistics uncovered:

FBI, National Crime Information Center & US Justice Department 

Now for the fun part!

The Lifesaver Case was designed to save lives but we truly hope you never have the need for this feature. 

That's why we made the case stylish and functional for everyday use. 

The Lifesaver Case is proudly endorsed by the following organizations:

N.C.A.D.V. (National Coalition Against Domestic Violence)

“Having immediate access to discreetly contacting emergency services can potentially mean the difference between life and death for a victim of domestic violence or other crimes. The Lifesaver Case is a fantastic new tool that will help enable victims of violence to access safety quickly and effectively in a way that may prevent them from experiencing further harm.” 

The National Network to End Domestic Violence

"The National Network to End Domestic Violence (NNEDV) appreciates innovations that are meant to empower survivors of abuse and provide them with tools to help maintain their safety. The Lifesaver Case is a unique product that may offer that. We are pleased to be working with this company to incorporate our safety & technology expertise. Their focus on safety and privacy for survivors is a critical factor that will make this product helpful."

Veteran's for Missing and Exploited Children

"We here at Veterans For Missing And Exploited Children believe the Lifesaver Case will indeed do just that. As the abduction rate is climbing, so are the number of children with cell phones. It only makes sense to arm these children with the Lifesaver Case."

...We are proudly supported by:

  • Domestic Violence Crime Watch 
  • Empowered & Beautiful
  • Help Stop Abuse on Women 
  • Break The Silence on Domestic Violence 
  • Tabitha Brock Foundation 
  • We Are Survivors 
  • Abuse No More 
  • HobNobLocal.com


Where we are at:

We have already invested over $100k and 2 years into the design and development of the patent-pending Lifesaver Case and we are committed to this project.

The additional $100,000 we are seeking will allow us to bring the case into production. How will we spend the money?

  • Convert our prototype to production-ready models 
  • Tooling and costs for the final molds for mass production
  • Large component order... we are working with a United States manufacturing firm with direct experience in building products like the Lifesaver Case
  • Regulatory certification and approval costs (These are required to sell them)

Technical Specifications:

Material: 

Polycarbonate high impact resistant plastic

Product dimensions:  

iPhone 4, 4s: 4.96 x 2.59 x .50 in                                                                                         iPhone 5, 5s: 5.29 x 2.59 x .43 in                                                                                         iPhone 5c: 5.32 x 2.61 x .55 in

Operating environment: 

0 C to 50 C at a relative humidity of 5% to 100%

Weight: 

0.98 oz. (28g)

Power consumption: 

Operates in Standby Mode at all times resulting in very little draw power.

Risks and Challenges:

From day one we recognized the inherent risks and challenges associated with designing, engineering and manufacturing Apple accessories. That's why we went out and hired an approved top rated Apple product design firm capable of delivering a certified MFi (Made For iPhone) product according to our specifications. Two years later we have a functional prototype. As with any new product design, there are potential delays as a result of final testing, acquiring the proper certifications and manufacturing. We're working with a top notch manufacturer here in the United States to mitigate as much risk as possible.  

Frequently Asked Questions:

Q. What happens if this project does not meet it's funding goal since it is a flexible funding campaign? Will I lose the money that I contributed if you do not hit your goal?

A. We appreciate and want to thank every contributor for supporting this campaign. We are committed to manufacturing the Lifesaver Case in the event we do not hit our funding goal, however, there may be further delays if we do not hit our funding goal. We will give all contributors the option to request a refund or to keep your order in place and we will deliver the Lifesaver Case as soon as it is manufactured. So with that said please spread the word, share the campaign to your friends and family asking for their support and let's get the word out to make this campaign successful! 

Q: Is the Lifesaver Case available outside the United States? 

A: For the purposes of this campaign, the cases will only be available to buyers in the United States. 

Q. What models will the Lifesaver Case work with?

A. iPhone 4, 4s, 5, 5s and 5c

Q. How do you activate the Lifesaver Case?

A. The case is activated by pushing down and sliding the activation switch. You must push down first to unlock the switch before it will slide. This prevents you from accidentally alerting e911.

Q. Does the Lifesaver Case call 911?

A. The Lifesaver Case does not call 911 nor does the user ever have to speak to a 911 operator. Instead, it contacts law enforcement electronically without ever alerting an attacker that a call for help has been made and streams your vital information along with your exact location to authorities by using the phones built-in GPS location services.

Q. Will a perpetrator know that law enforcement has been contacted once I activate the switch?

A. No. The Lifesaver Case contacts law enforcement silently and discreetly without ever alerting an attacker that units have been dispatched to your current location. 

Q: Is it difficult to set up the Lifesaver Case? 

A: Not at all.. Simply attach the case, download the app and enter your information. That's it!

Q. Will the Lifesaver Case drain my battery?

A. No. It operates in standby mode at all times which requires very little battery power. 

Q. Once I purchase the Lifesaver Case is there a charge to download the companion App and is there a monthly charge for service?

A. The app is completely free! No charge to download and no monthly fees.

Q. How does the case communicate with the app? Bluetooth?

A. The case is hardwired to the iPhone and connects through the dock connector located at the bottom of your device. It does not use Bluetooth to communicate with the application.

Q. How do I charge my phone with the Lifesaver Case installed?

A. The case has a micro usb port located at the bottom right side and it also comes with a USB charging cable so you never have to remove the case to charge your phone.

Q. When will my Lifesaver Case arrive?

A. We feel comfortable targeting August 2014 for our first full-production shipments.

Q. What will the retail price be for the Lifesaver Case?

A. The estimated retail price for the Lifesaver Case will be $99.00.

Q. Do you have any plans to manufacture the Lifesaver Case for Android devices?

A. Yes. If this campaign is successful, we plan to manufacture the Lifesaver Case for top selling Android devices as well.

Q. Is there a warranty?

A. We will provide a one year warranty from the date we ship your Lifesaver Case.

Q. Is it water proof?

A. The Lifesaver Case is not currently water resistant but we have plans for deluxe models to be manufactured in the future.
story_txt:
Tech Crunch "...gives your smartphone a dedicated panic button."The Next Web "...secretly send out an emergency alert."CNET "....I'd like to deploy Lifesaver Cases to my wife, daughter, and aging parents."App Advice "...does a lot more than just protect an iPhone from daily wear and tear."Macgasm "The Lifesaver iPhone Case Could, Well, Save Your Life"Cult of Mac "The case is called the Lifesaver, and that’s just what it does."Ubergizmo "...what if there are things that you are unable to tell 911 or describe to them due to a factor of reasons? What if you are lost and can’t tell them where exactly you are? Enter the Lifesaver Case."TUAW "...looks like a great idea to me."Help is always at your fingertips. Here's how it works:It's that easy. Help is on the way with the flick of a switch. Is this really necessary?The Lifesaver Case is a great product for especially for women, elderly and teens of all ages. The harsh reality is that there are countless situations in which your life may be in danger, but often times you may not be able to make a call or speak to an emergency dispatcher.Whether it's child abduction, domestic violence, assault, robbery, a medical emergency, or a home invasion the Lifesaver Case is ready to immediately send help without alerting the aggressor(s).It takes 5-6 steps to dial 911 from an iPhone if the keypad is locked. That's just to get the dispatcher on the line. After that you still have to describe the emergency and give your location. We created the Lifesaver Case to solve these problems.Founder, came up the Lifesaver Case following a terrifying personal experience:"A few years ago, a man accosted my 12 year old daughter on her way to school and tried to get her into his vehicle. It truly is a parent's worst nightmare and even though we hear stories on the news constantly, it's one of those things you think will never happen to you. I was equally as horrified when I started to research the statistics on violent crimes - particularly those against women, children and the elderly. When I realized there was nothing on the market to address the issue - I went to work. $100,000, and 2 years later, the Lifesaver Case is ready to do just that."These are just a few of the sobering statistics uncovered:FBI, National Crime Information Center & US Justice Department Now for the fun part!The Lifesaver Case was designed to save lives but we truly hope you never have the need for this feature. That's why we made the case stylish and functional for everyday use. The Lifesaver Case is proudly endorsed by the following organizations:N.C.A.D.V. (National Coalition Against Domestic Violence)“Having immediate access to discreetly contacting emergency services can potentially mean the difference between life and death for a victim of domestic violence or other crimes. The Lifesaver Case is a fantastic new tool that will help enable victims of violence to access safety quickly and effectively in a way that may prevent them from experiencing further harm.” 
The National Network to End Domestic Violence

"The National Network to End Domestic Violence (NNEDV) appreciates innovations that are meant to empower survivors of abuse and provide them with tools to help maintain their safety. The Lifesaver Case is a unique product that may offer that. We are pleased to be working with this company to incorporate our safety & technology expertise. Their focus on safety and privacy for survivors is a critical factor that will make this product helpful."Veteran's for Missing and Exploited Children"We here at Veterans For Missing And Exploited Children believe the Lifesaver Case will indeed do just that.  As the abduction rate is  climbing, so are the number of children with cell phones.  It only makes sense to arm these children with the Lifesaver Case."...We are proudly supported by:
Domestic Violence Crime Watch 
Empowered & Beautiful
Help Stop Abuse on Women 
Break The Silence on Domestic Violence 
Tabitha Brock Foundation 
We Are Survivors 
Abuse No More 
HobNobLocal.com

Where we are at:
We have already invested over $100k and 2 years into the design and development of the patent-pending Lifesaver Case and we are committed to this project.The additional $100,000 we are seeking will allow us to bring the case into production. How will we spend the money?
Convert our prototype to production-ready models 

Tooling and costs for the final molds for mass production
Large component order... we are working with a United States manufacturing firm with direct experience in building products like the Lifesaver Case
Regulatory certification and approval costs (These are required to sell them)

story:
Hello, I’m Branden Parker and I've been in the IT industry for over 12 years. I started with building systems in the late 90’s for a small custom computer shop and worked my way through a help-desk all the way to network administrator. I've been with both small companies as well as multi-million dollar companies. I truly believe that access to information is the key to the future. But many areas of the world are still without decent access or have no access to the world via the internet. This is simply due to the very high cost of having internet in their home.

Our idea is simple, if they can’t have it in their home; bring it to them in mass. In many areas there are already places where the people can use a computer and access the internet. But most of them are very small, only 3-5 computers with very slow internet access. These places are often times very run down, unsanitary buildings yet have customers 24 hours of the day and all the systems are in use at virtually all times. 


In addition they cannot be upgraded to handle to requirements of a full scale internet café operation. Their rates are high and they offer nothing but an old computer. We intend to change all that by either utilizing an existing structure than can handle the power load, or build one of our own, we also intend on offering a full service location. By offering not just access to a better internet experience but also food, drink and games consoles.

The plan itself is also pretty simple. Before I leave, I’ll have all of the computers, networking equipment and other hardware shipped to a local warehouse at the nearest port. I will then fly to the destination that has yet to be finalized as we are still working with a number of local governments about the requirements needed in the more rural areas. Once there, a location will be found and remodeled to handle the power consumption needed for the project.

During this time, all employees will be found and hired to help complete the renovations and begin training for the food service portion of the project. Once complete I will then go and pick up all the equipment previously shipped and set up the systems. Training the employees will then continue as they will need to know how to operate the systems. This will provide much needed jobs in the area as well as the location will then sustain itself with low cost fees for internet use and food service items. Once the location is open, I will then head back to the US to begin setting up the next location.

 As stated previously, this is a not-for-profit entity and will be applying for non-profit status as well. With this, the prices will remain low enough to make the entire system affordable to all residents.  Each location will be open 24 hours and will employ on average 20 people. For these rural areas that is a lot of jobs that are not available at this time. Thus improving the local economy in the area as well as providing much needed internet access.

Because of the software that will operate the entire location, it can be operated remotely from the program’s main office in the US.  This software will be provided by Antamedia. The computers will be used systems acquired via government entities at ultra low costs. They will then be refurbished as needed and prepared for shipping.

We here in the US enjoy many amenities and one of which is access to high speed internet. It has become part of our daily lives just as it can and will be for those in areas that currently don’t. If we can easily access this luxury, shouldn't everyone!

Our goals are very modest, a little goes a long way!

We are currently looking to open 2-3 locations across southern and central Mexico. Each location will cost between $3,000 and $5,000 to open. The American dollar goes a long way in this region of the world. Initially we are looking for this funding but any additional funding will be used to open more locations throughout the area. The funds obtained by the cafe's operations will be used to open more cafe's across the rural areas of Mexico and then progress to other Latin American countries as well.

The Perks we are offering at this time, albeit modest, will assist us in showing the world how generous and caring the American people really are. With your support we will be able to obtain the computers, servers, and networking equipment needed from various government entities at very low costs. We will then configure all of the systems and servers that will go into each location and ship them with a small envoy of our team to finalize the location and setup. They will then hire and train from within the local community to operate the systems. We already have the software used for controlling all of the systems internet access.

If the full initial funding is not obtained then it will be used in a way to attempt other types of funding opportunities. These will include obtaining 501(c)3 status and become a fully non-profit organization and professional production of a video to aid us in showing the current facilities available in these areas. Once completed we will again work with crowd funding programs to reach our goal.

This is a real opportunity to show the world who we really are!

Providing this type of service to those who need it the most can make a major impact on their lives. For instance, with proper access to the internet many of these people, especially children, will have access to online education. We will be working with other organizations to help us achieve the goal of better and higher education as well. This education can assist them in obtaining a brighter future through this education and provide a greater opportunity to enhance their live by obtaining better employment. That is just one simple example. As we all know here, having access to the world greatly enhances our lives and ability to not only keep informed but enriches our understanding of the world.

During my time in the IT industry I've helped many people take advantage of opportunities they would not have otherwise had without the power of the computer as well as the internet. It’s time we bring these same opportunities to others.


My wife is from Latin America, she grew up without access to the internet as well as basic understanding of computers. By happenstance she was able to come to the united states and obtain and education she would not otherwise have had available to her. She furthered that education by going to college and earning a degree in Business Administration.  After hearing many of her experiences I believe it is not only necessary for those without these opportunities to receive them, it should be supported by all people to enhance the lives of others. Even if it is just a small contribution, when enough of them are combined, they can have an enormous impact on the lives of others.

You can help us in other ways as well!

We understand that not every person in the world can contribute to this cause, but by getting the word out to as many people as you can, you can make an impact by helping us spread our idea to those who can help.

We will also be looking for volunteers to assist us with training the local people who are given this opportunity. Many may not have a full understanding of how to use the internet and take advantage of all it has to offer.

Indiegogo has many tools built in to assist everyone in getting the word out. By liking our offering on Facebook, twitter and other forms of social media, many more people will be able to see what we will be doing and have the opportunity to make a contribution. They as well can share this with others and further assist us in this endeavor.

story:
Inskrīb is the easiest LED sign to use in the world

Just turn it on, start up the Inskrīb App, and you're ready to start sending messages from up to 30 feet away! 

  • You already have your bluetooth speakers and bluetooth headphones.  Now you can show off visually with a bluetooth LED sign at your business, your man cave, your dorm room, car or anywhere since it is so portable. 
  • LED signs have gotten ubiquitous but are still expensive and hard to change. We have taken a huge step forward in simplicity and price with our App and sign.  There is nothing like this in the market.
  • However, we are just beginning the journey.  We know when you mix hardware with software you can really elevate a product.  We want to continue to enhance the App, we have a number of ideas already but we need your input, thoughts and suggestions.

Let's take a look at the free App that simplifies the work of changing the sign

These 3 screens are your primary access.  The screen on the left comes up after registration and is the main message screen used to send whatever message or messages you want to the sign.  The menu screen in the middle gives you options to add a new message, add a clock or add a count-up or count-down timer to your list of messages, change the sign brightness or turn it off remotely.  The screen on the right is where you enter your new message or change an existing message then set the time, speed, effect and frame (more about these later).

When the App connects to the sign for the first time you will be asked to register using an email address.  At that point we capture the date, time, email and unique ID of your sign for warranty purposes only.  The one year warranty starts when you first connect to the sign.  We do not use your email for any marketing purpose and we protect it from unauthorized use.  Each sign you buy will require registration only once when you initially connect.  After that you should be able to use all the signs you buy with just one App.

The Emoji message is included to show you which Emoji's the sign currently displays, here are examples: There are others, mostly numbers and arrows.  You can copy one or more and paste them into a new message or add them to an existing message to give it extra interest.

Currently you can add up to 99 messages.   You can easily re-order the messages by tapping the message number.

There are 3 Styles: normal, bold and small.  These give you some flexibility when styling your message.

Time is used when you don't want a continuous scrolling message.  Time can be adjusted to provide a delay between rotation of the message or messages.

Speed can be adjusted to display the effect from very slow to very fast.

There are 20 different Effects that you can choose to customize and draw attention to your message.  The "Blink" and the "Snow" are especially effective.  Select "Random" and you get a new effect each time the message is displayed.  Remember, Effects are per message.  If you display more than one message each can have their own effect in the rotation.

Frame is exactly like it sounds, it outlines the entire message to really make it stand out.  Several different frame options are available.

Other features included now

On the left you can add current Time in two different formats.

In the middle you can create a Count-Down or Count-Up Timer up to 24 hours.

You can send multiple messages in sequence.  From the main message screen, upper right corner tap Sync.  As shown on the screen to the right, highlight the dot with the messages you want to include in the sequence.  Tapping the Send key will send all the selected messages to the sign and each message selected will be displayed in numerical sequence.
For example, imagine the following messages:

Test in progress 
   Do not enter
Remaining time:
     00:48:54

You then use Sync and Send to select all 4 messages then mount the sign on the glass door entry.  A big improvement over the do not disturb sign.  As the messages rotate the count-down will continue to decrease. 

Where else can I use this?


Real.Estate     Retailers     Store.Fronts      Kids.Events     Little League   Tailgating    Countdowns   Limo.Drivers     Bars & Restaurants      DJ's   Dorm.Rooms     Recording.Studios      Vehicle.Messages    Healthcare  Offices   Advertising

It is up to your imagination!  Use this sign anyplace where you can enhance a persons experience by adding a visual message.  Did you know that a third of the brain is devoted exclusively to visual processing?  LED signs have been proven to boost sales.  Some retailers have seen up to a 150% increase in sales of certain items when they advertise using signage.  

Email us your thoughts or ideas: suggestions@inskrib.com

Can I really use this in my car?

We believe you have the right to use this in your personal vehicle or work vehicle. However, we recommend understanding local laws before using the product while driving.  Our rationale for use involves the following US rights:

1.  Insrkib fully believes in a persons right to free speech

2.  Insrkib does not believe in demeaning, caustic, sexual or bullying speech, please use care.

3.  Use of the product in a vehicle or home would constitute use in one’s personal property.

4.  While Inskrib is not aware of prohibitions related to displaying these types of signs in your vehicles or homes there may be interpretations or local restrictions.  Inskrib is not responsible for these interpretations or local restrictions and it is up to each user to understand what is permissible in their location. 



Who is on team Inskrīb?

We have over 30 years of combined experience working with LED signs.  

Inskrīb is a new product to the market, utilizing bluetooth 4.0 and the internet.  This team is handling the launch and will get the final product to you as soon as possible.  The iPhone App is nearly complete, we have the roadmap for the Android App, and we are very close to FCC/IC approval.  Production can begin once the final product design is complete.

While the product is new we are experienced in business and know how to solve any issues that arise.  The user will be surprised at the quality and ease of use for the value.  We are not selling a one trick pony, your product will continue to improve as we make future App enhancements.

How soon will my product be obsolete? 

Hopefully never!  We do not build products just to replace them in a year.  We will continue to build the App, adding foreign languages, logos, news feeds, etc.  All of this should work with your sign.  When we develop a new sign it will have multiple colors with increased options in the App and more user selections but we will continue to support our first product.  We also want to find expanded ways to use the product with new Apps specifically targeted to certain businesses or events, these Apps will also work with your sign.

What will I get?

Inskrīb MSRP will be around $159 for the red/yellow signs.  But Indiegogo participants such as yourself will get a great deal at over 40% off as an early adopter!  We are also giving you access to a limited number of attractive perks.  

But it gets even better—the sign, which measures 22" x 4.33" x 1",  comes with a one year warranty, cables and connectors to power it or charge it by AC or DC power, an internal battery lasting over 6 hours and suction cups for mounting to glass.


Let's Work Together!

With your support, you can help us increase the quantity of product we order from the factory, as well as accelerate the speed with which we can get it into your hands and enhance the App.  Your support is a vital spark to this new and growing company who wants to enhance visual communication for everyone with easy to use tools and equipment that make it fun and practical.
story_txt:
Inskrīb is the easiest LED sign to use in the world
Just turn it on, start up the Inskrīb App, and you're ready to start sending messages from up to 30 feet away!   You already have your bluetooth speakers and bluetooth headphones.  Now you can show off visually with a bluetooth LED sign at your business, your man cave, your dorm room, car or anywhere since it is so portable.  LED signs have gotten ubiquitous but are still expensive and hard to change. We have taken a huge step forward in simplicity and price with our App and sign.  There is nothing like this in the market. However, we are just beginning the journey.  We know when you mix hardware with software you can really elevate a product.  We want to continue to enhance the App, we have a number of ideas already but we need your input, thoughts and suggestions.  
  Let's take a look at the free App that simplifies the work of changing the sign


These 3 screens are your primary access.  The screen on the left comes up after registration and is the main message screen used to send whatever message or messages you want to the sign.  The menu screen in the middle gives you options to add a new message, add a clock or add a count-up or count-down timer to your list of messages, change the sign brightness or turn it off remotely.  The screen on the right is where you enter your new message or change an existing message then set the time, speed, effect and frame (more about these later).
When the App connects to the sign for the first time you will be asked to register using an email address.  At that point we capture the date, time, email and unique ID of your sign for warranty purposes only.  The one year warranty starts when you first connect to the sign.  We do not use your email for any marketing purpose and we protect it from unauthorized use.  Each sign you buy will require registration only once when you initially connect.  After that you should be able to use all the signs you buy with just one App.
The Emoji message is included to show you which Emoji's the sign currently displays, here are examples: There are others, mostly numbers and arrows.  You can copy one or more and paste them into a new message or add them to an existing message to give it extra interest.

Currently you can add up to 99 messages.   You can easily re-order the messages by tapping the message number.
There are 3 Styles: normal, bold and small.  These give you some flexibility when styling your message.
Time is used when you don't want a continuous scrolling message.  Time can be adjusted to provide a delay between rotation of the message or messages.
Speed can be adjusted to display the effect from very slow to very fast.
There are 20 different Effects that you can choose to customize and draw attention to your message.  The "Blink" and the "Snow" are especially effective.  Select "Random" and you get a new effect each time the message is displayed.  Remember, Effects are per message.  If you display more than one message each can have their own effect in the rotation.

Frame is exactly like it sounds, it outlines the entire message to really make it stand out.  Several different frame options are available.
Other features included now


On the left you can add current Time in two different formats.In the middle you can create a Count-Down or Count-Up Timer up to 24 hours.You can send multiple messages in sequence.  From the main message screen, upper right corner tap Sync.  As shown on the screen to the right, highlight the dot with the messages you want to include in the sequence.  Tapping the Send key will send all the selected messages to the sign and each message selected will be displayed in numerical sequence.
For example, imagine the following messages:
Test in progress    Do not enterRemaining time:     00:48:54
You then use Sync and Send to select all 4 messages then mount the sign on the glass door entry.  A big improvement over the do not disturb sign.  As the messages rotate the count-down will continue to decrease. 
Where else can I use this?





Real.Estate     Retailers     Store.Fronts      Kids.Events     Little League 
 Tailgating    Countdowns   Limo.Drivers     Bars & Restaurants      DJ's   Dorm.Rooms

   Vehicle.Messages    Healthcare  Offices   Advertising

story:
iCamba shares the tastes in design, creativity, individuality and requirement with its customers. All products they offer stand for these values. iCamba offers a tailor made service and productline which includes a broad range of Apple* and Android* products to meet your personal needs.

Both the private and business sides of people lives are being increasingly shaped by products from the digital world. Modern designs and simple operability are replacing the old incomprehensible technologies. Also, new devices are merging ever more functions with one another. Every brand that can be combined with an Android or Apple product to make your everyday life easier and more comfortable you will find all under one roof at iCamba. No matter whether you’re a novice or professional, student or manager, musician or designer – iCamba will find the optimal solution for you.

The Story behind...

iCamba was founded in 2012 in Munich Germany and Hong Kong.  
From the first draft to a full functional prototype, we create our products with maximum attention. The iCamba design is all about functionality, minimalism and style.

The front of your iCamba product will be dedicated to viewing what’s on
screen, without any design distractions. Our product is all about logic, consistency and understanding intuitive movement and the fun factor.

The beer mug powerbank is a stylish compact beer mug with an integrated battery pack that can charge small USB powered devices. The beer mug with unique design makes it extremely portable, fun to use, and the perfect accessory for any occasion.

With its 2800 mAh capacity, the beer bank can provide ample amount of power to a smartphone as well as many other USB powered devices such as a smartphone, tablet, speaker, or even a motorized fan!

Not only is the beer bank an essential companion for your handbag, it is the perfect holiday gift for anyone who loves beer and the octoberfest in munich! More then 5 million people visit the beerfestival every year. And many visitors makes photos and videos. But, try to charge a empty device on the Octoberfest! Good luck! So the idea was born for the Octoberfest beer mug power bank.


Why another Powerbank? And why Beer?

Many reasons and we make it short:

  • Beer is cool, Smartphones are cool, and we live in Munich..that´s it.
  • Powerbanks are not new, but you need it, everybody need it...
  • there are many powerbanks on the market,  just useful and no design
  • we will change this with your help



Now, lets talk about the specifications:

What material we use for the production:

  • High quality acryl glas
  • High quality Samsung battery - 2800 mAh
  • charge up to 600 times
  • blue LED controll lamp and overload protection
  • cables  are included for Apple and Android devices
  • CE, FCC, RoHS certification
  • 1 USB port that charges Apple, Android or any USB powered device 
  • 1 mini USB port to charge the beer bank



    No project is without their risk and challenges but we try to do our absolute best to minimize them. We felt that we have done all the necessary preliminary work prior to coming to Indiegogo. We are no strangers to battery packs or mobile accessories. That said, we identify the following as our risks, challenges:


    • Android is a trademark of Google Inc.



      The Team

      In addition to our core team, we have 34 passionate people in our offices in Munich,  Hong Kong and soon USA, to build a more designed future.


                 Where i can find more about iCamba?

                         
                        facebook           twitter          Google+        YOUTUBE          Homepage
                                        

            

                 Where i can read more about iCamba?


      Other way to help to start the beer mug power bank

      Maybe, you did not have a Smartphone devices, or don´t like beer, or what ever:

      • talk with your friends about the campaign in Facebook, twitter, and, and, and...
      • try to get one with our Perks offer and it´s a nice gift!!!
      • use the amazing tools from INDIEGOGO!!!


      FAQ
      General

      What is the iCamba beer power bank?

      The iCamba beer power bank project kicked off on the 25th of November with the launch of an Indiegogo crowdfunding campaign, and taken that the campaign reaches its goals, we aim at shipping the beer power bank to the first contributors in December 2014.
      The Octoberfest beer mug power bank is iCamba's second custom product.

      What’s cool about the iCamba beer power bank? Why should I get it?

      There are many powerbanks on the market, but the design is another question. Our Beer bank is built to give you Lifestyle and a new feeling, it is fast and easy to use with minimal effort just plug and charge and worldwide unique!!!
       
      How can I take part in the campaign? How can I get the beer bank?  

      After December 19, 2014 you can check this page, read more about the offering,
      and take part in the campaign here. Assuming the campaign reaches its target,
      we aim to ship the beer mug power bank in December 2014 to the first contributors.

      Why is iCamba doing a crowdfunding campaign?

      Crowdfunding has been the foundation of so many amazing, inspiring and independent products, and what it stands for taps directly into iCamba’s ethos. We have a strong worldwide community supporting us, and we want to give people the opportunity to contribute early and take part in the iCamba campaign. By contributing you also have the opportunity to have your say in the actual development of the product.

      In your marketing material you say that the beer mug is "the world's first crowdsourced beer mug power bank". What does that mean?

      The iCamba beer mug will not only be crowdfunded, but it will also be developed together with our community, this is why we refer to "crowdsourcing" here. According to our knowledge there haven't been other power banks like this.

      How can I influence the development of the beer bank?

      We aim to take all ideas into consideration, and we’re thankful for all input you give us! We also aim to notify and respond to all request or idea threads on together.
      More information will be available soon and we will keep the community updated.

      How many beer mug power banks are available in the campaign?

      There is a limited batch of 2000 power banks available. Should demand prove to be higher, we may consider adding more batches.


      Contributions & Payment

      How do I purchase a Perk so that I get a beer power bank and pay for shipping?

      If you wish to contribute to get a beer bank and pay for shipping, please follow the instructions in this article

      Why is the early-bird price cheaper?

      This is how crowdfunding campaigns work! The earlier in the campaign you hop on board and show your support, the better price you'll get. Simple as that! You can get on board here.

      Will you keep me updated with the progress of the campaign if I contribute?

      Yes! When you contribute to the beer bank campaign we will ensure that you receive all the latest information about the beer mug power bank project as it progresses.

      Are shipping costs included in the Perk price in Indiegogo?

      No, the price is excluding delivery. Please add the 10 USD perk for shipping after you have selected the Early bird -I- Perk. For example, if you have selected the beer bank Perk for 25 USD, increase the sum to 35 USD. Please go here to contribute to the campaign

      Does the Perk price include VAT or other taxes?

      No, contributors must pay any taxes and duties related to his/her shipping country. Tax, customs fees and other applicable customs charges are not included in the price of the tablet. Once we get close to the delivery date, we will ask you to confirm your shipping address and we will instruct you on VAT payment (if you live in Europe).

      I had problems making a contribution on Indiegogo, please help?

      If you faced problems when making a contribution, please check the Indiegogo Helpcenter here.

      I did not choose a Perk when contributing, but I paid the whole sum for the beer bank - do I get it?

      If you made a contribution for the beer bank, but forgot to add a Perk, please contact service@icamba.com

      I made a contribution, but now I've changed my mind. Can I have my money back?

      Contributions on Indiegogo are non refundable according to the IndieGoGo Terms of Use.  A contribution is a transaction that takes place purely between the contributor, campaign owner and payment processor. iCamba does not refund any contributions made. However, if you are not happy with the product we deliver, you may return the beer bank within 14 days of receiving it. Read more in the Indiegogo Helpcenter.

      I am not happy with the beer power bank, can I return it?

      You may return the beer power bank delivered to you within 14 days of receiving it.
      Please note that return shipping, including any customs or other charges - as applicable - will be borne by the sender. Keep in mind that we only accept returns from ship-to countries supported by the beer mug power bank campaign.

      To request a return please submit a ticket here. Please indicate clearly in the subject and body of the message “RETURN”, providing any relevant information including order number, contribution date and payment method utilized.

      Keep in mind that we accept returns only from the ship-to countries supported by the iCamba beer power bank campaign. Once we receive your request, we will then provide you with further instructions on how to proceed.

      I accidentally made a duplicate contribution - what should I do?

      If you accidentally submitted your contribution twice, please contact Indiegogo at support@indiegogo.com with the name of the campaign (world’s first beer mug power bank) you contributed to, your contribution amount, your name and the email address you provided during the contribution process.
      Please note that Indiegogo will not be able to refund your contribution if the amount has already been sent to the campaign owner. This means that Indiegogo can only refund your contribution if it was made via direct credit card to a campaign that has not yet ended.

      Please read more in the Indiegogo Helpcenter

      What Payment methods can I use?  
         
      You can pay directly with credit card or using a PayPal account.
      You can also transfer money from your own online bank to your PayPal account and then use it for payment.

      Please contact PayPal support if you are facing problems setting up your PayPal account

       
      Availability & delivery

      I forgot to add shipping to my perk - what should I do?

      If you forgot to add shipping costs when purchaising the iCamba beer bank Perk,
      please check these instructions

      I forgot to add shipping to my perk and contributed 10 USD - have I now paid for shipping?

      If you have already purchased the beer power bank Perk, but did not contribute the 10 USD extra needed for shipping at the same time, we would advise you to buy the shipping perk separately. However, if you did not buy the shipping perk separately, but made a contribution of 10 USD, we will match this contribution with your beer mug power bank.
      This means that if you have made an additional contribution of 10 USD
      (in addition to your beer bank Perk) this counts as the shipping cost.


      Please add this $10 as an “additional gift” during the payment process, or purchase the $10 Shipping Perk separately from the campaign page
      (using the same name, email and shipping destination information used in purchasing the beer bank).

      If I purchase more than one iCamba beer power bank Perk, what should I pay for shipping?

      If you purchase EARLY BIRD BEER SPECIAL -II- Perks, the total shipping cost is $0.

      If you purchase 4 or more beer bank Perks, the shipping cost will be the actual shipping rate from our logistics provider. The total sum will be confirmed to you upon confirming your delivery address closer to the delivery date.

      In what countries will the beer bank be available?

      The regions and countries where the campaign is applicable are: EU, Switzerland,
      United States, India, China, Hong Kong, Russia, Australia, and Canada.

      Will the beer power bank be available in my country?

      The regions and countries where the campaign is applicable are: EU, Switzerland,
      United States, India, China, Hong Kong, Russia, Australia, and Canada. If you want your own country to be added, please send us a mail to country@icamba.com.

      We'll look into the most voted countries and see if we can add those countries to the applicable countries list.

      When will you ship the beer bank?   

      Assuming the Indiegogo campaign reaches its goals, we aim to ship the first power banks in end of December 2014. Please note that the delivery date is subject to change. In any event, we will keep you updated on the schedule in our update emails.

      If I take part in the beer bank crowdfunding campaign on Indiegogo, will I get the beer bank before others?
       
      You will be among the first ones to get the first Octoberfest beer mug power bank. We'll ship the banks in the order of contributions made through Indiegogo.
       
      Will the beer bank be available also for general sale or only through this campaign on Indiegogo?  
       
      If there is demand, we'll consider all options. In any case, the Indiegogo contributors will get the beer bank first and with the lowest price at the time of delivery. The retail price is expected to be 34,95 USD.

      After contributing to the campaign, what happens next?

      We will keep you updated frequently on the progress of the beer mug project by email. Once we get close to the delivery date, we will ask you to confirm your shipping address and we will instruct you on VAT payment (if you live in Europe). In the meantime you will have the possibility to take part in our development project through icamba.com. We will send you more information about this via email.

      Can the beer bank features or specifications change before delivery?
       
      As in any crowdfunding campaign, changes are possible. We reserve the right to
      make changes in described features, specifications, and delivery date estimations
      and functionality at a later date. But at the moment we will not made changes.

      How do I know that my idea for the beer bank has been considered?

      We aim to take all ideas into consideration, and we’re thankful for all
      input you give us! We also aim to notify and respond to all request or idea
      threads on icamba.com tagged "beer mug power bank" and "feature-request".
      Of course we can't guarantee real-time updates to all posts, so please bear
      with us! More information will be available soon as we will keep the community updated

will be ready around Dez 01.  We might  be able to meet the early bird Christmas

not.





Shipment: We try to ship out the product in December, 
delivering the early bird products in the US before Christmas is a small

The goods will be delivered via US Postal Service and the deadline for

SHIPPING TO INTERNATIONAL FUNDERS: We have been shipping batteries 
internationally, as well as domestically, for several years. There have 
been recent changes in shipping regulations surrounding lithium cell 
batteries. We will work closely with our 
shipping provider to ensure that all our funders receive their beer bank in a

In order to live up to the expectations that we have set for the beer powerbank, 
we have implemented a strict timeline with our manufacturer. We 
understand that Indiegogo funders want their beer power bank as soon as possible, 
but we also want the beer bank to be of highest quality and up to our 
desired specifications.  
We are dedicated to our project timeline and will keep you informed 
on the status of our progress on a regular basis via updates

By contributing you also have the opportunity to have your say in the actual development of the product.In your marketing material you say that the beer mug is "the world's first crowdsourced beer mug power bank". What does that mean?The iCamba beer mug will not only be crowdfunded, but it will also be developed together with our community, this is why we refer to "crowdsourcing" here. According to our knowledge there haven't been other power banks like this.How can I influence the development of the beer bank? We aim to take all ideas into consideration, and we’re thankful for all input you give us! We also aim to notify and respond to all request or idea threads on together.More information will be available soon and we will keep the community updated. How many beer mug power banks are available in the campaign?There is a limited batch of 2000 power banks available. Should demand prove to be higher, we may consider adding more batches.Contributions & PaymentHow do I purchase a Perk so that I get a beer power bank and pay for shipping?If you wish to contribute to get a beer bank and pay for shipping, please follow the instructions in this articleWhy is the early-bird price cheaper?This is how crowdfunding campaigns work! The earlier in the campaign you hop on board and show your support, the better price you'll get. Simple as that! You can get on board here.Will you keep me updated with the progress of the campaign if I contribute?Yes! When you contribute to the beer bank campaign we will ensure that you receive all the latest information about the beer mug power bank project as it progresses.Are shipping costs included in the Perk price in Indiegogo?No, the price is excluding delivery. Please add the 10 USD perk for shipping after you have selected the Early bird -I- Perk. For example, if you have selected the beer bank Perk for 25 USD, increase the sum to 35 USD. Please go here to contribute to the campaignDoes the Perk price include VAT or other taxes?No, contributors must pay any taxes and duties related to his/her shipping country. Tax, customs fees and other applicable customs charges are not included in the price of the tablet. Once we get close to the delivery date, we will ask you to confirm your shipping address and we will instruct you on VAT payment (if you live in Europe). I had problems making a contribution on Indiegogo, please help? If you faced problems when making a contribution, please check the Indiegogo Helpcenter here.I did not choose a Perk when contributing, but I paid the whole sum for the beer bank - do I get it? If you made a contribution for the beer bank, but forgot to add a Perk, please contact service@icamba.com I made a contribution, but now I've changed my mind. Can I have my money back?Contributions on Indiegogo are non refundable according to the IndieGoGo Terms of Use.  A contribution is a transaction that takes place purely between the contributor, campaign owner and payment processor. iCamba does not refund any contributions made. However, if you are not happy with the product we deliver, you may return the beer bank within 14 days of receiving it. Read more in the Indiegogo Helpcenter.I am not happy with the beer power bank, can I return it?You may return the beer power bank delivered to you within 14 days of receiving it. Please note that return shipping, including any customs or other charges - as applicable - will be borne by the sender. Keep in mind that we only accept returns from ship-to countries supported by the beer mug power bank campaign. 
To request a return please submit a ticket here. Please indicate clearly in the subject and body of the message “RETURN”, providing any relevant information including order number, contribution date and payment method utilized.
Keep in mind that we accept returns only from the ship-to countries supported by the iCamba beer power bank campaign. Once we receive your request, we will then provide you with further instructions on how to proceed.I accidentally made a duplicate contribution - what should I do?If you accidentally submitted your contribution twice, please contact Indiegogo at support@indiegogo.com with the name of the campaign (world’s first beer mug power bank) you contributed to, your contribution amount, your name and the email address you provided during the contribution process. Please note that Indiegogo will not be able to refund your contribution if the amount has already been sent to the campaign owner. This means that Indiegogo can only refund your contribution if it was made via direct credit card to a campaign that has not yet ended.Please read more in the Indiegogo HelpcenterWhat Payment methods can I use?     You can pay directly with credit card or using a PayPal account.You can also transfer money from your own online bank to your PayPal account and then use it for payment.Please contact PayPal support if you are facing problems setting up your PayPal account Availability & deliveryI forgot to add shipping to my perk - what should I do?If you forgot to add shipping costs when purchaising the iCamba beer bank Perk, please check these instructionsI forgot to add shipping to my perk and contributed 10 USD - have I now paid for shipping?If you have already purchased the beer power bank Perk, but did not contribute the 10 USD extra needed for shipping at the same time, we would advise you to buy the shipping perk separately. However, if you did not buy the shipping perk separately, but made a contribution of 10 USD, we will match this contribution with your beer mug power bank.This means that if you have made an additional contribution of 10 USD (in addition to your beer bank Perk) this counts as the shipping cost.
Please add this $10 as an “additional gift” during the payment process, or purchase the $10 Shipping Perk separately from the campaign page (using the same name, email and shipping destination information used in purchasing the beer bank). If I purchase more than one iCamba beer power bank Perk, what should I pay for shipping?If you purchase EARLY BIRD BEER SPECIAL -II- Perks, the total shipping cost is $0.If you purchase 4 or more beer bank Perks, the shipping cost will be the actual shipping rate from our logistics provider. The total sum will be confirmed to you upon confirming your delivery address closer to the delivery date.In what countries will the beer bank be available? The regions and countries where the campaign is applicable are: EU, Switzerland, United States, India, China, Hong Kong, Russia, Australia, and Canada.Will the beer power bank be available in my country?The regions and countries where the campaign is applicable are: EU, Switzerland, United States, India, China, Hong Kong, Russia, Australia, and Canada. If you want your own country to be added, please send us a mail to country@icamba.com.
We'll look into the most voted countries and see if we can add those countries to the applicable countries list.When will you ship the beer bank?   Assuming the Indiegogo campaign reaches its goals, we aim to ship the first power banks in end of December 2014. Please note that the delivery date is subject to change. In any event, we will keep you updated on the schedule in our update emails.If I take part in the beer bank crowdfunding campaign on Indiegogo, will I get the beer bank before others? You will be among the first ones to get the first Octoberfest beer mug power bank. We'll ship the banks in the order of contributions made through Indiegogo.  Will the beer bank be available also for general sale or only through this campaign on Indiegogo?   If there is demand, we'll consider all options. In any case, the Indiegogo contributors will get the beer bank first and with the lowest price at the time of delivery. The retail price is expected to be 34,95 USD. After contributing to the campaign, what happens next? We will keep you updated frequently on the progress of the beer mug project by email. Once we get close to the delivery date, we will ask you to confirm your shipping address and we will instruct you on VAT payment (if you live in Europe). In the meantime you will have the possibility to take part in our development project through icamba.com. We will send you more information about this via email.Can the beer bank features or specifications change before delivery? As in any crowdfunding campaign, changes are possible. We reserve the right to make changes in described features, specifications, and delivery date estimations and functionality at a later date. But at the moment we will not made changes.How do I know that my idea for the beer bank has been considered? We aim to take all ideas into consideration, and we’re thankful for all input you give us! We also aim to notify and respond to all request or idea threads on icamba.com tagged "beer mug power bank" and "feature-request". Of course we can't guarantee real-time updates to all posts, so please bear with us! More information will be available soon as we will keep the community updated

story:
Our Story

Smart phones are common on the average citizen's desk in their cubicle, office or workstation.  It's not so common to have them aesthetically aimed at the person with family photos, Pandora, or the occasional Facebook alert.  

Also, smart phones are becoming comparable to point-and-shoot cameras, and with more functionality, such as time-lapse apps, motion sensors and more.

For these reasons, we created "the Pocket Clutch".


It is a fold-able phone stand and tripod mount and is designed for use on windshields for GPS, straps for creative uses on common structures such as bars & clamps and especially tripods... and we're experimenting with more options.

It is designed to fit many phones and has a flexible grip for wide phones like the Samsung Charge yet rigid enough to hold narrower phones, such as the iPhone 4, in it's neutral position.

The Impact
Our smart phones can do more than what the average user currently uses them for.  Although many apps are available in on iTunes and the Android Market, the Pocket Clutch can extended the functionality and features for movie-making, photography, and random shenanigans.

PERKS!

Take a look at the Perks and if you don't see a package you don't like, post your suggestion in the Comments section.  Chances are that others might share your interest and if there is a demand, I'll create another "Perk".


What We Need

We are aiming at $25,000, but setting our goal on IndieGoGo at $15,000 with the rest of funding through other sources.  The cost of manufacturing is estimated at $20,000.  This means we need to pre-order at least 800 units at $25. Shipping and other costs will be about $5 per unit.


What if we do not reach our goal?

Those that pre-order the Pocket Clutch Basic Pack (and above) will receive the prototype demonstrated in our commercial video instead of the manufactured version as well as the other items with each package (suction mount & cable organizer).

Other Ways You Can Help
Be sure to share this site with others so that they can help bring the Pocket Clutch to fruition or so they can see a way to bring their ideas to reality through IndieGoGo.com!

story:
RMDK Dad App

Raising a Modern-Day Knight's NEW Dad App is a one-of-a-kind App for dads whose passion is to help fathers win with their sons.

  • Based on the best-selling book from Focus on the Family.
  • The need for dads to raise sons to manhood is great. This simple App will give dads practical ideas and simple how to's to connect with their sons on a heart-to-heart level.
  • Our Big Hairy Audacious Goal is to reach every dad with the message of RMDK! Imagine if every father proactively (rather than reactively) raised his son to authentic manhood - our world would be a much different place.

 

What We Need & What You Get

We've recently developed and launched the RMDK Dad App for iPhone and iPad. We need marketing dollars and seed money to create the Android version of the App. The campaign is for $2,500 so that we can reach an acheivable goal, but in order to create the App for Android and market it well we need $50,000. 

You can be a part of something amazing - something that can have a multi-generational impact by helping us with our goal.

If our entire goal is not reached, money raised will go to the continued production of the monthly videos of the RMDK Dad App.

Here's a sample monthly RMDK "Dad Challenge" video delivered via the RMDK Dad App: http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=spxHJEBBjhY&feature=plcp

 

The Impact

The book Raising a Modern-Day Knight has literally impacted ten's of thousands of dads. By creating (and marketing) this new Dad App we are reaching a new generation of fathers and encouraging them in their journey of fatherhood.

Your financial contribution will have a lasting impact in the lives of fathers and sons.

The RMDK Dad App for iPhone and iPad is THE BEST App for dads  - help us bring it to those fathers with Android phones.

 

Other Ways You Can Help

If you are unable to help finacially:

  • Please help us get the word out through your social media outlets.
  • Use the Indiegogo share tools to spread the word.
  • PRAY! The ministry of RMDK can always use faithful prayer warriors!!

story:
Redefining Fitness Tracking:

At Amiigo we wanted to create something that would allow people to track the details of an exercise routine & how it affects the body. We wanted to allow users to track specific things like; exercise type, reps, sets, duration, speed, and intensity. Amiigo also tracks heart rate, blood oxygen levels, skin temperature, overall activity level, and calories burned. 

 

How is Amiigo different?

Activity Recognition & Physiological Data. Amiigo provides a more personalized fitness tracking experience because we can detect exactly what you are doing and how your body is responding. For example, Amiigo can determine whether you're using the elliptical, running, swimming, doing bicep curls, squats, etc. Amiigo can track & identify different activities and then correlate these activities with physiological information such as heart rate and blood oxygen saturation.

Create and Record. Users can create and record new exericises that might be unique, abstract or specific to them. After a user records an exercise, it will be recognized in future workouts!


(More product photos in Gallery)

The Wrist Bracelet & The Shoe Clip

Two devices, one purpose = unlimited tracking potential. The bracelet captures the movement of your upper body, and the shoe clip captures the movement of your lower body. The shoe clip enables detailed tracking for cycling, certain leg exercises, and other activities where arm movement is not present. For the most ideal tracking experience use both devices. But, they can function independently, for times when you're not wearing shoes or can't have anything on your wrist.

The bracelet is micro-adjustable allowing for a perfect fit on even the most unique wrist sizes. The shoe clip slides onto any shoe lace and even some shoe straps. Working alone, both devices can track overall activity level and calories burned. For storage and simple portability, attach the shoe clip directly to the bracelet. Both the bracelet and shoe clip are completely waterproof.

Wireless Connectivity 

Using Bluetooth 4.0, the bracelet and shoe clip connect to iOS and Android phones. Amiigo has memory and can store data for hours. A constant Bluetooth connection is not required.

Amiigo allows you to compete with friends, share on social networks, achieve your goals and earn points. So whether you’re a runner, swimmer, cyclist, weight lifter, crossfitter, golfer, out-door enthusiast or just an active person... Amiigo has something for you. Our goal is to make fitness more fun, simple and social. 

Ideal For:

  • The Gym: Weight Equipment, Cardio Equipment, Free Weights, Crossfit
  • Cycling: Road and Mountain Biking 
  • The Water: Swimming and Water Sports
  • Outdoors: Hiking, Walking, Jogging
  • Sports: Basketball, Soccer, Baseball, Tennis, Golf, Football, Rugby
  • You: Create and Record your Unique Exercises

Hacker & Makers Welcome | Open-source SDK

We wanted to create a platform that people would love building on. Hackers and makers will love playing around with Amiigo. Using our proprietary discrimination algorithms and various sensor data, the options... are endless. 

Why Indiegogo?

We've been working on our hardware and software applications for over a year. We're very proud of the work we've done so far, but we need one more push to get it in production. 

Through Indiegogo you're ORDERING the Amiigo wristband & shoe clip. With your support, we will put Amiigo onto wrists worldwide and start inspiring healthy habits for millions of people. While we're super close to entering production, your contribution will help fund:

  • Tooling and manufacturing setup.
  • Our first production run.
  • Final touches on the iOS and Android applications.

Rewards / Pricing

Sharing your experience

When you do something great, you want the world to know about it! With your permission, Amiigo shares your fitness activities in real-time. You can earn points for exercising, create challenges, and even wager your points in friendly challenges. Since Amiigo knows what exercises you perform, the system generates tailored exercise recommendations allowing for more personal, enjoyable and successful workouts.

How does Amiigo work?

To make all of this possible Amiigo uses gesture recognition, the latest sensors and machine-learning algorithms. The Amiigo devices connect wirelessly to your smartphone where the data is processed and activities are recognized and stored. The data is then displayed in the mobile user interface.

Specs

  • Quality: Composed of thermoplastic elastomers. Amiigo is built to last.
  • Compatibility: iPhone 4S and newer. Select Android devices supporting BLE (most newer Android phones).
  • Connection: Bluetooth Low Energy
  • Size/Fit: Micro adjustable. Amiigo will fit perfectly on just about any wrist.

More Press

(Press: Please download our Media Kit here)

          

NEW - VentureBeat: Finally! A fitness tracker that actually knows what you’re doing

NEW - Greatist: “Smart” Fitness Bracelet Analyzes Your Whole Workout

NEW - Ubergizmo: Fitness Bracelet Offers A More Personalized Fitness Tracking Experience

NEW - GigaOM: The fitness-tracking incumbents might want to pay attention.

NEW - Spot Me Bro: Amiigo also allows users to create and record their own unique movements.

CNN: Amiigo is clocking the motions they’re making and how often they’re making them.

Mashable: Amiigo will also be able to differentiate more than 100 exercises.

Forbes: Amiigo bracelet detects detailed activity.

CNET: We've seen fitness trackers before, but here's one with impressive smarts.

TechCrunch: Has the ability to discriminate “very subtle differences”

SlashGear: The bracelet has gesture recognition technology.

AOL: Amiigo Fitness Band Tracks Specific Exercises

Android Police: The Amiigo bracelet and shoe clip may be one of the coolest projects.

Digital Trends: Tell if jogging, cycling, swimming or on an elliptical machine in the gym.

FastCompany: Imagine a list of every exercise you completed at the gym.

Design Milk: Perfect for the hardcore athlete in you.

Popular Science: The Amiigo recognizes more than 100 exercises.

Gizmag: Amiigo smart fitness bracelet identifies more than 100 exercises

Medgadget: Here’s a cool new fitness tracker for you to consider for the new year.

PandoDaily: This one is gym rat approved

Tech Cocktail: Amiigo will track specific exercises NOT just “activity”

TechCrunch: Amiigo’s algorithms identify the different types of exercises you’re engaged in.

Wired: Tell the difference between things like running, cycling, lifting weights, and swimming.

Entrepreneur: 10 Tech Startup that can improve your life

Comments, Questions, Partnerships?

WIN AMIIGOS AND EXCITING GIFTS!

Please check out our FAQ section, chat with us online, or email us: hi@amiigo.co  And a final THANK YOU to our current partners & contributers!

story:
The Problem

Many hand held products beside cell phones run on batteries, but replacing batteries in these products can be expensive, not to mention the waste of recycling them. Re-chargeable batteries are available, but they require a separate charger. How many different Docking Stations do you currently have? Or are you just looking for a way to reduce USB connectors in your life. 

The Solution

Products with Nantronics's built-in “FlexGrid-Charger” would give the user the option of re-charging their devices batteries using an induction plate from many brand-names, such as PowerMat, Energizer, or LG. The charger would provide the same wireless hook-up when recharging batteries only available for a limited number of cell phones. Therefore reducing the number of Docking Stations you currently own or will own. Your life with less USB connectors!

Where we're at

Nantronics started in 2008 as a Business Plan at SJSU. We’ve been working the company's first product, FlexGrid-Charger, for over 3 years now. From the video you can see we have several working prototype of all products list on this campaign. The campaign drive is to raise money in order to bring to market Nantronics’s first products with built-in induction charging.

From the Industrial Designer, "To give you a brief explanation, the design direction took inspiration from TRON and the "GRID". Since Nantronics is a flex grid induction charging technology line, the design evokes a sense of sleek modern technology, while implying the cool feature: induction charging. Thus, all the designs include some form of lighting that when placed on the charging mat, will glow and indicate charge power. I thought this would be a great subtle feature to set your brand apart from a lot of the other electronic brands out there.The designs are unique, without being foreign."

Products Available During This Campaign

MICE

"The mice family includes 3 variations"

 

REMOTES

"The Remotes form language is meant to relate to the mice in such a way, that the viewer would be able to make the product bloodline relation."

 

 

eREADER

"The E reader is simple, yet has a unique light line feature, that when placed on the charging mat, runs around the track of the front of the reader., Similar to the light features of the mice. It is underneath white on white though, to give it a ghost feel."

 

FLASHLIGHT

"The flashlight is a play around the component of the bar light you provided, but integrates some nice subtle texture on the grip areas to give visual interest, as well as tactile feedback when gripping the light."

 

How will the funds be used?

$100,000 is the minimum to break-even on producing the products mix listed.
$70,000 will go to two multi-cavity tools to mold the different plastic cases.
$30,000 will go to circuit boards, misc. electrical components, Lithium batteries, and assembly.
If less is rasied this will only reduce product selection.

FAQ

What kind of warranty will you offer?

Warrant will be for one year on the product, three years on the battery.

How long will it take to recharge the battery?

Currently the recharging current flow is 100milAmps, very similar to typical USB charging rates. As you can see most device will have charge level indicating. So depending on the device anywhere from 1-2 hours depending on the level of discharge.
story_txt:
The Problem
Many hand held products beside cell phones run on batteries, but replacing batteries in these products can be expensive, not to mention the waste of recycling them. Re-chargeable batteries are available, but they require a separate charger. How many different Docking Stations do you currently have? Or are you just looking for a way to reduce USB connectors in your life. 
The Solution
Products with Nantronics's built-in “FlexGrid-Charger” would give the user the option of re-charging their devices batteries using an induction plate from many brand-names, such as PowerMat, Energizer, or LG. The charger would provide the same wireless hook-up when recharging batteries only available for a limited number of cell phones. Therefore reducing the number of Docking Stations you currently own or will own. Your life with less USB connectors!
Where we're at 
Nantronics started in 2008 as a Business Plan at SJSU. We’ve been working the company's first product, FlexGrid-Charger, for over 3 years now. From the video you can see we have several working prototype of all products list on this campaign. The campaign drive is to raise money in order to bring to market Nantronics’s first products with built-in induction charging.
From the Industrial Designer, "To give you a brief explanation, the design direction took inspiration from TRON and the "GRID". Since Nantronics is a flex grid induction charging technology line, the design evokes a sense of sleek modern technology, while implying the cool feature: induction charging. Thus, all the designs include some form of lighting that when placed on the charging mat, will glow and indicate charge power. I thought this would be a great subtle feature to set your brand apart from a lot of the other electronic brands out there.The designs are unique, without being foreign."
Products Available During This Campaign 
MICE
"The mice family includes 3 variations"

 
REMOTES
"The Remotes form language is meant to relate to the mice in such a way, that the viewer would be able to make the product bloodline relation."
 
 
eREADER
"The E reader is simple, yet has a unique light line feature, that when placed on the charging mat, runs around the track of the front of the reader., Similar to the light features of the mice. It is underneath white on white though, to give it a ghost feel."

 
FLASHLIGHT
"The flashlight is a play around the component of the bar light you provided, but integrates some nice subtle texture on the grip areas to give visual interest, as well as tactile feedback when gripping the light."

 
How will the funds be used? 
$100,000 is the minimum to break-even on producing the products mix listed. $70,000 will go to two multi-cavity tools to mold the different plastic cases.  $30,000 will go to circuit boards, misc. electrical components, Lithium batteries, and assembly. If less is rasied this will only reduce product selection.
FAQ
What kind of warranty will you offer?
Warrant will be for one year on the product, three years on the battery.
How long will it take to recharge the battery?
Currently the recharging current flow is 100milAmps, very similar to typical USB charging rates. As you can see most device will have charge level indicating. So depending on the device anywhere from 1-2 hours depending on the level of discharge.

story:
Meet the 3P Smart Plug

The 3P Smart Plug is a wifi enabled smart plug with temperature and humidity sensors. It allows you to monitor and control any of the appliances, lights and environment in your home from anywhere in the world, using either your smartphone or voice commands.

Your entire home is at your command

 Finally, making coffee is as easy as saying "3P, Coffee ON" right from your bedroom. 

Available commands:

"3P, Light ON/OFF"

"3P, Table Lamp ON/OFF"

"3P, Floor Lamp ON/OFF"

"3P, Coffee ON/OFF"

3P, TV ON/OFF"

"3P, Radio ON/OFF"

"3P, Away"

Future commands:

"3P, Report"

"3P, Room Report"

"3P, Light ON Low"

"3P, Light ON Medium"


Now your light doesn't just help you see, it listens and obeys.

The 3P Smart Plug App

A simple new way to monitor and control all your devices and environment from anywhere in the world right from your smartphone

Easy Scheduling

The free 3P App will be available on the App Store and Google Play and we also have plans for Windows, and Mac. If we achieve our goal we'll fast track the development of these apps across each platform.

App Interaction Demo


IFTTT coming in 2015

IFTTT (If This, Then That) allows you to connect different web-services and gadgets to each other over the web.

 Go ahead, plug it in. Set up in just seconds, not minutes

Technical Specifications

Sensors:

  • Temperature sensor
  • Humidity Sensor

Wifi Standard:

  • 802.11B/G/N

Proximity Sensor:

  • Bluetooth 4.0

Input Voltage:

  • AC90-265V 50/60HZ

Maximum Power:

  • 2200W

L x W x T:

  • 55mm x 55mm x 28mm

Development stages

In past years, we have completed multiple prototypes, ranging from a very basic concept all the way up to the fully functioning prototype. Now we are finalizing the electronic design and getting ready for mass production.

 The 3P Smart Beacon
