story:
Introducing Z-nergy

Hi everyone!

We are highly excited to introduce Z-nergy to you.

Z-nergy is the first world portable, slim and light smart mobile charger that is aesthetically designed. Z-nergy eliminates your fear of your phone running out of battery and the hassle of carrying extra battery around. All you need to do is to plug Z-nergy to your Iphone, Ipad, Ipod and other mobile devices anywhere anytime. Z-nergy stores enormous amount of energy and gives your mobile devices constant charging while continue to do whatever you are doing. With 6000m AH capacity, Z-nergy ensures that your mobile devices never run out of power. It gives your device at least 5 days of charging for moderate users.



Smart charger for all your mobile devices

Z-nergy is a contemporary smart mobile charger at best. It is designed to ensure that you enjoy your phone to the fullest.  It also displays the amount of energy usage while giving your mobile devices necessary power on the go – a true mobile devices companion. You no longer need to be looking for charging outlet for your dying phones. Just plug Z-nergy to your phone. The body is covered in sleek aluminum which comes in variety of colours to match your phone. Z-nergy will be available with both lightning connector and microUSB to ensure it is compatible with most mobile devices out there. Z-nergy (lightning connector) charges new generation of Iphones, Ipads and Ipods with lightning connector while Z-nergy (microUSB) charges smartphones and tablets with standard microUSB.


With 6000m AH, Z-nergy is designed to power your phones for days

Z-nergy charges Iphones, Ipads and Ipods with lightning connector.

Z-nergy charges android phones and all mobile devices with standard microUSB.



How to charge Z-nergy

Plug Z-nergy to a nearby socket or laptop to store energy that can be used for days.


Z-nergy is so light and portable that it can charge your phone while you are using it.

Z-nergy charging Iphone.



Z-nergy charging Samsung phone.


Complete set of Z-nergy contain Z-nergy, charging cable and plug.


Z-nergy in a pack.


Z-nergy is aesthetically designed in beautiful colors to match your phone.


Birth of Z-nergy

Z-nergy was born out of the need to address the plight of every phone users. We (Hameed and Olalekan) are two childhood friends that are very passionate about technology. Often times, we meet family, friends and colleagues who always complain about their phones’ batteries. Everyone wishes to have a phone whose battery power is not depletable. But that is not the reality today. So, we decided to create a mobile charger that’s so powerful that it can sustain your phone efficiency for days. To many of us, it is like our phones constantly drain the battery when we need them most. Hence, Z-nergy was created to allay your fears of your dying phone. We are so passionate about this device that we believe everybody should own one.


Features of Z-nergy




We need your help

We believe Z-nergy will be a great mobile charger that everyone should have. Please support us to help bring this amazing device to fruition. We will give you Z-nergy at a great discounted price as our supporter. You will get a great value for money. Please remember to order for your friends and family so that they can also be among the first set of people to enjoy this amazing device. We look forward to your help. Thank you very much!


Perks / Contribution

Perks

Description

Amount

Early bird (first  500 units)

One Z-nergy (either lightning or microUSB)

$35

Standard deal

One Z-nergy (either lightning or microUSB)

$40

Double deal

Two Z-nergy (either 2 lightning or 2 microUSB)

$85

Mixed deal

Two Z-nergy (1 lightning and 1 microUSB)

$85

Tripple deal

Three Z-nergy (Mix of any type)

$110

Family deal

Five Z-nergy (mix of any type)

$185

Mega deal

Ten Z-nergy (mix of any type)

$380



Z-nergy compared with other mobile chargers



Frequently Ask Questions (FAQs)

If you have any question or query, kindly contact us at info.znergy@gmail.com. We will respond promptly.


The team

Hameed Jogunola (co-founder)

Olalekan Abiona (co-founder)

Markus Rosendahl (Technical adviser)


Timeline

We are confident that we will start shipping out Z-nergy to you by June 2015. Thank you very much for your support.

Where do the funds go?



$0 Contribution

Every effort counts. We are grateful that you show interest in our project. If you like Z-nergy but can’t contribute, help us spread the world by liking our Facebook page (https://www.facebook.com/znergyworld?ref=aymt_homepage_panel).


We will keep you inform of the progress of the campaign.


Thank you all for making this campaign a success!

story:
Again, we sincerly appreiciate your great support to make EZtalk Plus happen.

We are now 120% working on mass production to have all of you this great product.
Trust us, You won't be disappointed:)


Noted: Shipment Date will be Postponed (9/24/2015 Updated)

Due to the unexpected manufacturing situation, we are truly apologized of telling we will postpone shipment date from September to October 24th.

We hereby promise all of you will receive the goods from us not late than October 24th!

Thank you all for kind understanding.

Best Wishes,

SNAILINK


Before EZtalk, it comes Snailink

Snailink is a high-quality mobile accessory brand created for iPhone.  At Snailnk we LOVE creating cool innovational products for people who live and breathe technology just like we do. 



While we are enjoying what iPhone brings to our life, it always seems to run out of battery in no time due to our apps, videos and music, which makes us go in  panic as to where or when we can find next power source, or makes us carry additional accessories such as charging USB cables or power banks. 

Also, we thought about music lovers that sometimes forget, lose or even break their earphones when they are on the go.  From all that Snailink was inspired by an idea of creating products make live simpler. 

That's why we designed an innovational iPhone battery case with built-in auto-retractable earphone that lets users enjoy their music or personal calls anywhere, and always have it with them, while it retracts back to its case when users are done.   We called it: EZtalk Battery Case for iPhone 6.



EZtalk Battery Case also made charging becomes so much easier by a simple push of a button, which allows users to choose whether to charge or save some energy for when they need it most. 


Why You Should Try EZtalk

Upon creating EZtalk Battery Case it allows users to avoid cellular radiation because of our auto-retractable earphone.  We knew that we had something special on our hands, something we must share with the world.  The one and only iPhone case which combines power bank and auto-retractable earphone, also protection for the iPhone from bumps and buries! How awesome is that!

From EZtalk to EZtalk Plus

And For those who use iPhone 6 Plus, instead of iPhone 6, we have heard your voice.  Snailink team are now proudly introducing  EZtalk Plus, which is even more amazing than EZtalk Battery Case.



Features of EZtalk Plus

  • Made of industry leading polycarbonate materials, providing protection surrounding the iPhone while guarding it against everyday accidents. And it is still slim and light, so it's easy to hold on the palm while the back of the case provides protection for lens from scratches.  Furthermore, we designed a leather cover on EZtalk Plus, so it's now even more protective for your phone. 

  • The LED indicator displays the battery level and charging status while doubles your battery life with a simple push.

  • Pulling out the built-in earphone, the audio port at the bottom of the case will immediately redirect and amplify sound from the native phone speaker to the earphone, which means that you can answer calls by simply pulling out the earphone. Of course, you can still use your personal audio devices by removing the audio switch and plugging them in.

  • The custom earphone provides Hi-Fi audio experiences. EZtalk tangle-free cable integrates an in-line microphone providing a friendly hands-free user experience for private calls, and its detachable function for music and movies.  Pull the earphone out to any convenient length where they'll lock into place. When finished, push the button on the earphone to retract it neatly back into the slot at the bottom of the case.  Once the earphone being retracted, the audio switch will deactivate it, so that you won't miss any notification from native phone speaker.
  • For travelers and business users, it provides them slots for their ejector pin and SIM card where ever they go.  What's more,  we designed space for cards on EZtalk Plus with leather cover. 



Specification  of EZtalk Plus

Input: DC 5V 1A
Output: DC 5V 1A
Battery Capacity: 2650 mAh (Rated Capacity: 1800 mAh)
Type of Battery: Li-Polymer
Dimensions:(L) 172.3 x (W) 79.4 x (H) 18.4 mm
Weight: 135 g
Color: Black Gold/ Rose Gold


Fantastic Experience Is Always Ready

EZtalk Plus is designed with auto-retractable earphone and integrated power bank always ready when you need it.   Just charge your iPhone on the go, there's no more hassle searching for power source.  it will all be on your EZtalk Plus.  Most importantly, it will allow you to enjoy music, video and personal call anywhere.




Timeline of this Campaign




Helps Us Get EZtalk into Your Hands

Testing the prototype we realized how useful this innovational case will be; we use them all the time and our friends and families wanted one, too.  Now we want to get EZtalk Plus into the hands of Apple users around the world.  Support the campaign and you will be one of the first people to get your hands on this innovational product!


Other Ways You Can Help Us

If EZtalk Plus is not for you, maybe you have family and friends who can make a good use of it? Please share on your Facebook or tweet on Twitter, every share is appreciated!  You can share through links at the top of this page.  You will be helping them avoid getting frustrated again when the tangled earphone and running out of  power!


Legal Disclaimer

Delivery of perks are subject to best efforts and not guaranteed.

We sincerely appreciate your supporting of our campaign!

story:
What Is It?

The H3J C series control surfaces are physical control surfaces that work like and resemble traditional broadcast switcher control surfaces.  Where we differ is we can control more than one manufacturer at the same time.  We also allow you to completely configure every button on the control surface.

And our most important feature, we can control software based video switchers like Wirecast and vMix.  We are the first purpose built video switching device that works out of the box with software based switchers.


The Story

Here's a story....  Our background is in video production and up until over a year ago everything we did was done with physical devices like Grass Valley or Black Magic Design switchers.

Over a year ago we decided to start a Video Podcasting network.  When we started to look at how to improve our production and streaming we learned about software based switchers.  We settled in on Wirecast as the solution.

However, we still maintained the physical ATEM switcher.  This created a complex workflow and 2 different video switchers to control for our production.

Plus, if you have used a software based switcher, it is not the same as pressing a physical button, the tactile feedback is missing and it requires some attention to what you are doing.

That started the quest to piece together a tool that could control both switchers from a single interface and it be a physical control surface.  We found lots of tools that use things like a midi control surface.  We even adapted them so they could control both the ATEM and Wirecast.

Sounds like we found a solution, right?  Well, it worked but not very well and was still not the same as the broadcast control surfaces we like so much.

So, as the story goes, we developed our own physical platform that uses the broadcast quality buttons and is much more reliable than the midi controllers that are frequently used.

And the story continues because we had now developed a physical solution to one of the most common complaints about software-based switchers.  And in the process we created a multi-vendor solution that can control multiple vendors simultaneously from the same control surface.

And that is just the beginning of the story.


Features

Here are the features of each model broken down separately.

C100

  • 20 Broadcast Quality Buttons, each are 2 color (red/green) 15mm caps.  The caps are easily removed so you can label the buttons whatever you want.
  • 2 Bus 8 Channel Layout, familiar layout for most video switchers
  • 4 Custom User Buttons, for whatever you want them to do.
  • Easily Customization, all done from an easy to use web interface.
  • Controls BlackMagic Design's ATEM
  • Controls Telestream's Wirecast software switcher
  • Controls vMix software switcher
  • Can control more than one switcher simultaneously
  • Easily Hackable

C200

  • 33 Broadcast Quality Buttons, each are 3 color (rgb) 17mm caps.  The caps are easily removed so you can label the buttons whatever you want.
  • 2 Bus 8 Channel Layout, familiar layout for most video switchers
  • Extra Row Of Buttons, for you to do with as you want
  • 9 Custom User Buttons, for whatever you want them to do.
  • Smooth Operating T-Bar Control
  • LCD Display with 2 rotary encoders
  • MIDI Output
  • Serial Output
  • 3 GPIO Ports
  • Easily Customization, all done from an easy to use web interface.
  • Controls BlackMagic Design's ATEM
  • Controls Telestream's Wirecast software switcher
  • Controls vMix software switcher
  • Can control more than one switcher simultaneously
  • Easily Hackable

Software Switchers

So why have we singled out software switchers here?  Unlike the hardware switchers that have the nice control surfaces, software switchers have never had anything like a physical control surface before.

With the video streaming or video podcasting taking off in the last few years there are lots of people that are using a software based switcher and wondering if there is not a better way.

We feel this is a market in need of something amazing to help with the software based switchers and lack of physical control.  With a physical controller you do not need to look at the software or even the screen.  The control surface is a familiar feel and it has a visual feedback as to the state of the switcher without the need of a monitor.

We currently can work with:



How Can You Help?

This is where you come in.  We already have the prototypes done and working, we use them live in our shows daily.  So we are not in need of any funding for more development for the initial release.

What we are in need of is some automation tools that will allow us to produce the units quick and more accurately.

For now we have been manually placing solder on the board and placing parts.  Then we cook the boards in a reflow oven to mount all the tiny surface mount parts.

As part of this campaign we are going to purchase a machine called a pick and place machine that will place the parts much more accurately and much faster than we can.

We also want to do a bulk purchase of some of the parts.  The buttons we are using take 6 - 8 weeks from the time we order them to get to us.  We want to order in bulk more than what we really need so we can build up an inventory.

There are other things we need to do as well like build up a support infrastructure so that we can support the users of our products.

So by getting a perk you are helping us get things started up for production and support.

And as a thank you, we are going to offer great discounts to you our supporters.


The models

For this campaign we have 2 models.  Both models can control all 3 of the video switchers.  These are the first 2 models in our C line of control surfaces.  By the way, the "C" stands for console.  See below for the details on each. 


C100


The C100 is our entry level in the console series of video control surfaces.  It still has the exact same "guts" as the C200 so all of the features like the multiple video switchers and the complex workflow still work perfectly.

The C100 is geared more toward the software based switcher user that is budget conscious.

The C100 has 20 broadcast quality dual color (red/green) buttons.  The buttons are designed to resemble a traditional program / preview switcher.  You can change how and what those buttons do in the web configuration.

There are 4 buttons outside of the program / preview area that would typically be something like take and/or auto.  You can make them whatever you want.


C200

The C200 is the next step up from the C100.  The C200 adds some additional functionality to the C100 and adds in some more buttons and a T-bar.

The C200 also upgrades the buttons to what we like to call the "premium" broadcast buttons.  These buttons are full color RGB and are 17mm in size vs the 15mm of the C100.

The C200 has 33 of the premium buttons.  They are arranged in the same program / preview design with an extra row above the program bus.  We also added some user buttons to the right of the T-bar.

Beyond the program/preview there are 17 additional buttons that you can setup to do just about anything.

The C200 has a T-bar controller that uses a Hall Effect sensor to make it smooth.

We also added an LCD to the C200 so that you can make changes during a show without having to go to the web interface.  There are 2 rotary encoders that you use to navigate the menus.

When not in the menus, the rotary encoders can be used to make adjusts to things like fade time, etc.  This is of course dependent on which switcher you are using and if it supports it.

And there is still more, the C200 also has some additional I/O that the C100 does not have.

The C200 has a MIDI out that can be used for just about anything.  We plan on even more MIDI features in future releases too.  It also has a serial output that can be connected to things like an Arduino, Raspberry Pi, Beaglebone, etc.  You can use your imagination on all of the things that can be done with that.

And lastly, we also added 3 GPIO ports to the C200 that can be used to perform functions on your switcher when there is a contact closure.


It's All About The Buttons

People put a lot of emphasis on how buttons feel.  We looked long and hard for the ones we really liked.


A Little About The Design

So let's talk about some of the things we decided when we were designing these devices.

First, we wanted it to be modular.  Each button board was designed so that it can be used in any location just by setting the board address.  We also designed the boards so they can handle different layouts without any problem.

By making the boards modular, we can create custom designs based on requests, we can re-use the same parts in our future designs as well.

We wanted to use designs that are well known and common.  This allows for finding parts that are common and also allows our designs to be "hackable".  And yes we are happy that the design is hackable, that was part of the goal as well.

For the C100 and C200 designs we used an Arduino Mega.  We did this because it allows us the ability to make changes and custom solutions quickly.  It is also a common off the shelf piece of hardware that can be replaced quickly at those inopportune moments when something fails.

The Arduino Mega is plenty powerful enough to handle all of the functions nicely.



Our Timeline


Here is a summary of our planned timeline.

The campaign starts on February 7th.  The campaign is set to run for 45 days.

We are working on creating some testing jigs that will speed up our testing of the boards once they are made.  We have some custom designed PC Boards being made and think we will have them by early March to assemble.

The campaign ends on March 24th.  When the campaign ends we will know how many of each unit we will need to manufacture.  We will put together the parts list and place the orders for the parts on March 25th.

On the 26th, we will place the order for the pick and place machine.  We are still unsure of the speed of delivery of this machine.

Our typical delivery time on PC boards is 2 - 3 weeks; we expect we would have them back by the 21st of April.  Assuming we have the pick and place machine, we can start assembling the surface mount parts onto the PC boards.  Once the surface mount parts are on the board, we can use the testing jigs to make sure all the parts are properly placed.  The PC boards are then ready and waiting for when the buttons arrive.

If the buttons take the entire 8 weeks to arrive, that places us into the May 26th time frame.  At that point we will solder the buttons onto the PC boards and test them again.

The next step is assembling all parts into the chassis and do some more testing.

Last step is sending the perks out to our backers.

There is the possibility depending on the number of perks that are taken that we could do a mid campaign order of parts.  As long as we reach the quantity that gets us the best deal we may do that in trying to get your perks to you quicker.

That means that the early bird perks would be first on the list to get those, hint hint.


Risks And Challenges

With any project there are risks and challenges, in the case of the C100 and C200 the designs are done and they are being used in production environments every day.

We do not expect and hardware changes on these 2 models before production. 

We are still working on the Wirecast client for the Mac.  We expect that to be completed before the end of the funding campaign.  The Wirecast client for Windows is done and is what we use daily.

The largest challenge we have is the time in sourcing the buttons themselves.  They are basically manufactured for use when we order them.  Our last order of buttons took almost 7 weeks and we were told between 6 and 8 weeks for both of our previous orders.



Frequently Asked Questions

What do you mean by easily hackable?

This hackable term scares people these days with all of the problems around computer security.  However, we are not referring to that kind of hacking.

In the maker community the hackable means you can make changes easily to a product.  For example, we produce a show called Let's Make It on the tech-zen.tv network where we make things with Arduinos and other small CPUs.

With our design, if you are a tinkerer that is familiar with Arduino you could make our control surface do all kinds of things that we did not build in.

That is how we are using the term hackable.  It is a good thing.


Is there a rack mount version?

We have been surprised how many people have asked us this. The answer is we will. We have designs for rack mount solutions (R series), desktop solutions (D Series) and even a small version we are calling the mini internally. Keep an eye out for new stuff.


Can I get a customized version?

Absolutely, we are designers and makers and can design something just for your needs. We work with a local provider for our chassis and the PC boards are all modular. If you can dream, we can make it. 

However, that being said, it is beyond the scope of the Indiegogo campaign for custom designs.  You would need to contact us directly at h3j.com.


Do you take resellers?

We will, absolutely.  We are not taking them until the end of the Indiegogo campaign for a couple of reasons.  We did not feel it would be fair to a reseller if we were offering the consoles at close to what they would get them for.  There is no incentive for a reseller until after the campaign completes.

That is also an indication at how good of a discount we are offering on the perks for the early bird buyers.


Can it control more than one switcher at once?

Absolutely, it can communicate with all compatible switchers at one time. In the configuration you need to setup which switcher is the priority for tally on a per button basis. It works great in complex workflow environments. Look at the complex workflow examples under solutions.


Can you control.... ?

This is a very popular question since we announced the control surfaces. The simple answer is probably yes, as long as there is an API or MIDI interface. We are currently working with 2 other software providers and have a couple more we would love to work with.


How do you connect to Wirecast?

All of the current vendors are controlled via Ethernet. For Wirecast we have a small program that runs on the same machine as Wirecast that interfaces with our hardware. This small piece of software also has lots of additional features we have added to enhance the experience.


What is this Wirecast Remote software?

Because Wirecast does not have a built in network based API we had to develop a small application that bridges the Ethernet network that are control surface uses to the Wirecast API.

We currently have the Windows version completed and in beta and are creating the version for Mac OSX now.

We have also added some additional functionality to this small application that makes it useful for even those that do not have our hardware solutions.

Here is a video that shows what all this software can do:



How much does Wirecast Remote cost?

Zero, Nada, $0, you get the idea. The software can be downloaded for FREE. It has features that can be used with Wirecast even without our hardware interfaces.


What about Tally?

The C100 and C200 report back tally information via the LED indicators on each button.

If you are referring to an external tally to the C100 and C200, someone must have been giving some secrets about what we are testing.  All we can say is keep an ear to the ground and visit the h3j.com site often.


What do you mean by a complex workflow?

This is an excellent question.  Below is an image of how our workflow is configured.  It is a great example of a complex workflow.  Our control surfaces can control this complex switching environment from a single control surface.  There is no need to control each switcher individually.


Learn More

If you want to learn more go to h3j.com.  We are working on new videos and content all the time.  We are also setting up a forum for the community surrounding the h3j.com products.

You can also find the Wirecast Remote software.  It is free to download.  Just remember it is still in beta so you can expect problems every now and then.

Here are some videos that show the control surface in action in different situations.

The C200 controlling Wirecast


The C200 Controlling an ATEM


The C200 in a Complex Workflow



Configuring a C200 Via The Web Interface



The Perks

We have created a wide range of perks for those that want to support us.

$25

  • Hoorah Supporter - This is for those that just want to show that they support us.

$50

  • International Shipping - If you ordered a perk that includes a C100 or C200 and you live outside of the United States, this perk is for you.

$100

  • You will be listed on our contributor wall.  We are going to create a page on the h3j.com site just for this group of people, for those want to support us at a level above the $25 amount.

$697

  • C100 Early bird.  This perk is limited to the first 5 people that grab the perk.  This is our best perk for the C100 because the price is lowered 30% below the list price.

$797

  • C100 Not So Early bird - So you missed out on the 30% discount, you can still get in with one of the five 20% discount perks, if you hurry.

$897

  • The C100 in all of its glory, you might have missed out on the big discounts but you can still get a 10% discount for the entire length of the campaign.

$1697

  • C200 Early bird - This perk is limited to 5 lucky people who will get the C200 with 30% off the list price.

$1897

  • Missed out on of the 30% perks for the C200, no worries you can grab one of the five 20% discount perks.  That is 20% off of the list price of the C200.

$1997

  • You might have missed out on the big discounts, but get a 10% discount off of the list price of the C200 for the entire length of the campaign.


What Else Do We Need?

There are still ways that you can help us out, even if you cannot contribute to the campaign.  You can share this campaign by using any (or all) of the share options in Indiegogo.

Anything you can do to help get the word out is a big help for us.

What Is It?
The H3J C series control surfaces are physical control surfaces that work like and resemble traditional broadcast switcher control surfaces.  Where we differ is we can control more than one manufacturer at the same time.  We also allow you to completely configure every button on the control surface.And our most important feature, we can control software based video switchers like Wirecast and vMix.  We are the first purpose built video switching device that works out of the box with software based switchers.The StoryHere's a story....  Our background is in video production and up until over a year ago everything we did was done with physical devices like Grass Valley or Black Magic Design switchers.Over a year ago we decided to start a Video Podcasting network.  When we started to look at how to improve our production and streaming we learned about software based switchers.  We settled in on Wirecast as the solution.However, we still maintained the physical ATEM switcher.  This created a complex workflow and 2 different video switchers to control for our production.Plus, if you have used a software based switcher, it is not the same as pressing a physical button, the tactile feedback is missing and it requires some attention to what you are doing.That started the quest to piece together a tool that could control both switchers from a single interface and it be a physical control surface.  We found lots of tools that use things like a midi control surface.  We even adapted them so they could control both the ATEM and Wirecast.Sounds like we found a solution, right?  Well, it worked but not very well and was still not the same as the broadcast control surfaces we like so much.So, as the story goes, we developed our own physical platform that uses the broadcast quality buttons and is much more reliable than the midi controllers that are frequently used.And the story continues because we had now developed a physical solution to one of the most common complaints about software-based switchers.  And in the process we created a multi-vendor solution that can control multiple vendors simultaneously from the same control surface.And that is just the beginning of the story.FeaturesHere are the features of each model broken down separately.C100
20 Broadcast Quality Buttons, each are 2 color (red/green) 15mm caps.  The caps are easily removed so you can label the buttons whatever you want.
2 Bus 8 Channel Layout, familiar layout for most video switchers
4 Custom User Buttons, for whatever you want them to do.
Easily Customization, all done from an easy to use web interface.
Controls BlackMagic Design's ATEM
Controls Telestream's Wirecast software switcher
Controls vMix software switcher
Can control more than one switcher simultaneously
Easily Hackable

C200
33 Broadcast Quality Buttons, each are 3 color (rgb) 17mm 
caps.  The caps are easily removed so you can label the buttons whatever you want.
2 Bus 8 Channel Layout, familiar layout for most video switchers
Extra Row Of Buttons, for you to do with as you want

9 Custom User Buttons, for whatever you want them to do.
Smooth Operating T-Bar Control
LCD Display with 2 rotary encoders
MIDI Output
Serial Output
3 GPIO Ports

story:
KARABOW QUANTUM  (The future is here)

this is a project I belive in. its called the karabow quantum. it is a phone that uses nano electricity to charge itself. it means that you don't need to charge this phone for the next five years. with karabow quantum, just keep playing, keep working until you are tied. Karabowuses the nana particles that can assorb electricity and tansform it to nana electricity called the piezo electic.

Design

Karabow quantum (eco phone) is an innovative  trendy GSM phone that integrated with a Bluetooth headset, Bluetooth Dialer, as well as smart watch technology that you don't need to charge for five years. This new technology allows users to sync the Nano electricity with a Android smart phone’s for new Gmail notification, Google calendar events, call history, phonebook, as well as sent and received SMS messages. Leave the large, burdensome smart phone in your bag or at home when traveling light. you don't have to worry about you power any more

Features

The Karabow quantum is not only a  mobile phone that can be used with any standard SIM card, without having to subscribe to a contract. For those who travel a lot or have more than one SIM card, the Karabow quantum functions as a great backup. Avoid buying another large, weighty phone or fumbling around with multiple SIM cards. Start taking advantage of the Karabow quantum’s tiny size, powerful functions, and colorful appeal.

The Karabow quantum can sync with smart phone, downloading phonebook and call history (iOS 4.0+ and Android 2.4+) to Karabow quantum. When using Android 2.3+ OS, download and install the WiMe Nano Smart APK on the Android device and the Karabow quantum will sync with the Android device (Google calendar events, new Gmail notification, call history, phonebook, sent/received SMS).

With its embedded stereo music chip, the Karabow quantum provides stereo MP3 sound, allowing users to enjoy high-quality sound.

Listening to music from FM radio is another good way to relax the soul. Plug in an earphone and start listening with the Nano Phone.

Karabow quantum acts as a Bluetooth headset and dialer, and can pair with most Bluetooth devices, functioning as a wireless Bluetooth headset.

Misplaced a smart phone around the house, forgot it at a restaurant, or worried of theft? Karabow quantum can also function as a Bluetooth dialer that uses the Karabow quantum technology to dial the linked smart phone as long as the Bluetooth connection has been made.

this phone is also part of the green campaign because it helps conserve electric power for other usage. nana phone removes the burden of low power on your device and give you a power pack battery.

SPECIFICATIONS

OS：Android OS, v4.4.2 plus karabow OS

CPU: kmt octa-Core 1.7GHZ(Low-power Cortex-A7 architecture)

5.5” IPS HD/ FHD Screen  1920*1080 pixels  optional,capacitive touchscreen with 5 points

Internal: RAM:  4G+ROM:16G

Support micro SD（T-Flash）32G

Camera: Front Camera:8.0MP Front Camera +Rear:True 24.0MP AF with flash LED

MS mode: WCDMA/GSM 

3G: WCDMA 2100/850MHZ (HSPA+) and GSM 850/900/1800/1900MHZ

4G:LTE FDD 800/1800/2100 

Sim card： Dual sim cards, Dual standby 

Navigation: GPS+AGPS Navigator 

Video screen: Support 1080 P video recording 

Wireless transmission:3G、Wi-Fi CERTIFIED Miracast、Bluetooth 4.0、EDGE、HSPA+、HSUPA NFC(Near Field Communication)Optional 

Modem features: Wireless AP ( Mobile AP ) 

HSUPA： Support 5.76 Mbps 

HSPA+: Support 42 Mbps 

Button ： One touch recording/Photography

Wireless Charger:Wireless Charger is working with leather case

NFC:Support 

OTG(On-The-Go) ： Support 

Light sensor： Support 

Proximity sensor： Support 

Gravity Sensor： Support 

Bluetooth： Support 

FM: Support 

Java Expand: Support 

Music/video: Support 

WAP Browser: Support 

Hand-writing: Support

Multilingual： Support 

Battery paramete Standard battery content：>5500mAh 

Talk time:  2120-4150 min

Standby time:320-580 hour

Phone book： 10000 Group 

SMS/Color message： Support 

Headphone jack 3.5MM standard interface 

Charging port mini usb 5pin interface 

Comes with: Slim leather case 

Appearance: PDA  touchscreen 

Size (mm) 153.5*76*6.8 mm

Weight (g) 135g

Color:white/Black/golden

story:
Just over a month ago we added a collection of cases for the iPhone 6 to our product range. Since then we have been receiving requests for iPhone 5c and 6 Plus cases which has inspired us to seek to make our most popular designs available.

But to make this happen, we need funding. And so we have launched this Indiegogo campaign to try to raise the funds needed.

So if you are interested in any of our designs for your iPhone 5c or 6 Plus, we need you to support this campaign by pre-ordering your case.

We have already made samples and your support will allow us to raise the funds we need to begin the production. Here’s how to support our campaign:

1. Select a perk on the right hand side

2. Proceed onto the next page to enter shipping information and by payment

3. Complete your payment via Paypal or credit/debit card

4. Share this campaign with your family, friends and colleagues. The more support we get the greater the chances of us being able to produce these cases.

Here are the designs:














Thank you!

FAQs

Do you have cases for iPhone 5s and 6?

Yes, we do visit our estore www.iconemesis.co.uk


Can you ship internationally?

Yes! It’s ship worldwide for £5.00


I’ve picked a perk with a design choice – how do I select a case?

Thanks for your contribution! We’ll email you to confirm the design you’d like.


I have a question and I’d like to talk to someone about my pledge.

Feel free to contact us on info@iconemesis.co.uk and we’ll do our best to respond within two business days.


What if we don’t reach our target?

We appreciate your support in helping to reach our target goal. If we can’t reach our target, all the money raised through this campaign will be used for the production and shipment of our products.


Do you have cases for Android/Samsung/Nokia devices?

Unfortunately, the cases are only compatible with the iPhone 5c and 6 Plus. But we have plans to introduce designs for other devices in the future!


Help! I can’t get my payment to work in PayPal – what should I do?

Email the Indiegogo Customer Happiness Team at support@indiegogo.com – they’ll be able to track your transaction and help with any issues.

story:
LATEST UPDATE!

Certification is passed and Dock Me M1 & M2 are approved for sale and distribution in the US, Canada and Europe! We're on to assembly and shipping! Thanks for everyone's patience and support!!

 

 

MAKE CHARGING FAST & EASY!

 

Quickly charge anything all in one hub

 

Declutter your space and take the stress out of charging. Know where to find your wires, devices and easily stay powered up. All your charging needs in one area.

 

CHARGE ANY DEVICE

 

 

 


 

 

The Dock Me charging tower M1 series has 3 charging shelves. One shelf is for Qi wireless charging of up to 2 devices and the other two shelves are both USB charging shelves. This is the floor standing model which has a 110v power socket in the base. You can charge up to 9 devices at once in this convenient area. 

 

 

 

The Dock Me charging tower Mini M2 series has 2 charging shelves. One shelf is for Qi wireless charging of up to 2 devices and the other shelf is a fast USB charging shelf. This model is wall mountable as the base is detachable. You can quickly charge up to 5 devices on this model.  

 

 

 

 

We are seeking certification for RoHS, CE, UL and FCC. These are compliant with worldwide charging standards.

 

 

 

Please note that if your country is not listed on our shipping list please contact us directly to find out if we deliver to your country. Backers are also responsible for any customs/duty/fees when receiving the shipment into your country. 

 

The Dock Me Story 

Dock Me started out of necessity in our home. We had lots of gadgets and not enough room to charge them. We would misplace devices, chargers and wires too! It was a mess until we created Dock Me. The vertical design allowed us to save out counter space and charge all our devices in one convenient area. It was so convenient our friends wanted on too!

Dock Me can fit cell phones, tablets, speakers, headphones, watches even toys! It's a one stop hub for charging that makes it easy to keep all your gadgets powered up and ready when you need them without the stress associated with charging!

We decided to take to crowdfunding and try to bring Dock Me to market. We have completed the business accelerator at York University and even the Starter Company Plus program from MBEC in Mississauga. We have run and completed a successful Kickstarter campaign and are continuing pre-sales on Indiegogo in response to our backers. All the funding raised through crowdfunding is going to offset the cost of the molds, certification and the initial order.  We are currently in China starting the manufacturing process and are eager to deliver the Dock Me series of chargers soon.

 

 

Left: Our display at the GTA Home & Reno Show 2018. We had our Dock Me Mini M2 available for FREE charging! We got some great feedback and support! Thanks to everyone who showed up!

Right: Our display at OCE Discovery 2018. Both of our charging towers were available for display. More great support and feedback! Left to right Nilay Goyal (Entrepreneurship Manager at York University, Michael Fernandes (Me) & Marie Velechovsky (Head of Operations & my wife!) 

Risks and Challenges

There are many risks with getting a product out to market but we are confident with the help of our established manufacturer, our experienced team and our contacts from York University that we are ready to bring the DOCK ME charging towers to market. We have built several functional prototypes and have tested them extensively. These are production prototypes which we believe will make it easier for us to get the Dock Me charging towers manufactured. The Dock Me towers have even undergone preliminary testing so we are confident that we are on track to make our expected deadlines for delivery to backers.

Due to continued enhancements the final DOCK ME charging towers may vary slightly from the pictures that are displayed but we intend to deliver a final product that fully resembles our prototype.

We are confident about keeping to our schedule but if there are unintended delays during the manufacturing or shipping process we will always inform everyone of all delays then implement appropriate solutions to stay on target. We are committed to being transparent in all our activities and open and informative at all our stages of production until all units are delivered.

Thank you!

story:
As the industry of personal smart devices is thriving in the modern world, there is an increase in the number of gadgets that individuals own and use every day. At Artellia, we set off on a journey to design a one-stop solution to satisfy the needs of charging multiple devices at ease. Multifunctionality was not the only objective, as the world prompts users with higher charging efficiency. We aim to provide not only charging capability, but also efficiency. 

Artellia Monno was kickstarted by an idea of blending smart home technology into everyday household unobtrusively through design. The 5-in-1 charging station provides a one-stop solution for tethered, wirelessly charged, and wearable devices. User safety is prioritized and it is safeguarded by the active heat dissipation system. The design ensures ease-of-use and a carefree experience for users. It’s the fastest 35W wireless charger on the market, with 7 coils technology that can charge up to 5 devices simultaneously.


 

 

Check out the unboxing & hands-on video made by Unbox Fantasy, a professional crew assemblage from the former editors of tech review media.

 

Some deliberate adjustments were made after Apple released iPhone 12, it will make sure that Monno charges for your phone continuously. It delivers up to 7.5W of power to your iPhone and 10W to other Qi-enabled devices. Enjoy the flexibility of charging all your devices at once.


 ^ Monno wirelessly charging multiple iPhone 12 + 11 at once.

 

 Sleek & Modern Design

The sleek and modern design makes Monno look great on any desk and in any home environment. Its low-profile, clean lines neatly complement the space around it. This is the only charging station you will ever need.


Chic & Versatile

Monno is more than a wireless charger. It can blend into your interior decoration perfectly without any incongruity. No matter your home is designed with modern, industrial or Scandinavian style.

 
Organized. No more clutter.

Say goodbye to messiness. Say hello to organization! No more hassling with charging cables. Monno is capable of charging your smartphones, wireless earbuds, power bank, wearables, and other portable devices.

Phone Case Friendly

Your phone case will not affect the charging process. Monno supports charging through your favorite phone cases ( Thickness up to 2mm ).

35W Total Charging Output 

The 5-in-1 Wireless Charging station is pack with a total output of 35W. Monno charges 3 wireless charging spots and 2 additional USB-A charging outputs, it can charge up to 5 devices simultaneously.


With Great Power, Comes Great Coverage.       

With an industry-leading 7 coils technology, there is no need to search for the ‘sweet spot’ on the charging station ever again. Monno’s 7 coils provide an ultra-wide charging area to make the charging process more efficient. You can place your devices in any position and they will begin charging immediately. 

Dual-fans Cooling, Heat Dissipation System

Charge up safely. Monno has 2 internal cooling fans to provide temperature control, prevent overheating and increase the charging speeds. It ensures to complete charging in 4 hours for your smartphones, and ultimately extending your battery lifespan.
 


Premium Anti-scratch Fabric Surface 

The thoughtfully selected fabric protects your smart devices from scratches upon contact by providing a soft & smooth surface.

story:
Introducing: PHOS+CAN (patent pending) 

Founder: Peter Joseph Roland 

So why PHOS+CAN? (Video soon!) 

People like to have water, light and a way to charge stuff i.e.-iphones and androids.  

So I came up with a unique way to cover all the bases with a Solar, Hydration, Survival-can, thus became PHOS+CAN. 

Q:What does Phos mean? 

A: Greek word for "Light" 

Q: Hey what's a can!?...(crickets chirpping) 

A: Really?

Ok...so here's a little more about the goals. 

What We Need :) & What You Get!

I am seeking a min of 20,000.00 in donations to raise for my R&D rep(s) and further to buy the parts, marketing and business development.  

There is a great effort going into sustainable resources and PHOS+CAN offers a new unique tool for all walks of life. So why not?

The Impact...

PHOS+CAN will be apart of multiple sustainable resoruce campains for: solar, water and e-waste initiatives. 

Other Ways You Can Help!  Please tell a friend about this great innovation.

Make this dream come true!  

Thank you for viewing my latest efforts to improve our planet!! 

PHOS+CAN

SOLAR+HYDRATION+SURVIVAL

Humble regards,

Peter Roland 

Founder, PHOS+CAN U.S.A. 

San Diego, California 

info@phos-can.com 

www.phos-can.com

PHOS+CAN will be apart of multiple sustainable resoruce campains for: solar, water and e-waste initiatives. 
Other Ways You Can Help!  Please tell a friend about this great innovation.
Make this dream come true!  

Thank you for viewing my latest efforts to improve our planet!! 
PHOS+CAN
SOLAR+HYDRATION+SURVIVAL
Humble regards,
Peter Roland 
Founder, PHOS+CAN U.S.A. 
San Diego, California 
info@phos-can.com 
www.phos-can.com

story:
Hi everyone, as you know I'm in Vitoria, Brazil researching the use of digital technology by the people from the favelas (slums in Brazil). I was recently chosen by Google to purchase the Google Glass. This gadget could contribute immensely to my research due to its easiness of collecting sound and pictures. Carrying around a digital camera and a voice recorder has been quite risky since favelas are zones of high crime and theft.

Google Glass is more discrete and small, which could call less attention than carrying cameras and recorders.

My budget for this research is very limit, and I can’t afford the Glass on my own, and for that I ask for your help!

Any contribution is very welcome! Thanks

Here's a PDF with more infromation about my Research: http://d2oadd98wnjs7n.cloudfront.net/medias/885042/files/20130621152930-Nemer_Research_Statement.pdf?1371853771

story:
I. Our goal

BE A GLOBAL CITIZEN OF YOUR TIME! WE OFFER THE MOST AMBITIOUS NEXT GENERATION TELECOMMUNICATION TECHNOLOGY!

We try to realize the most complete online TV channels platform bringing together hundreds of channels from all over the world and we want to offer access to such one-of-a-kind service to millions of people. Our platform will be available on any transmission device. 

Are you away from home, working in another country, home-sick?
Do you miss your Greek holiday and yearn to hear some more Greek language shows?
Are you secretly learning a foreign language by watching tons of TV shows in that language?
Imagine a point in time when you can view your favorite TV show on any kind of device, anywhere in the world. You can watch your favorite UK channel on your laptop or smartphone while on a business trip to Australia or you can watch your favorite French TV show while you are in a train from Madrid to Lisbon. The possibilities are endless. That time is now.

CONTRIBUTE NOW and join us realize this ambitious and unique project that may change the television industry, making it more and more penetrant and popular by being viewed of tens of million of people all over the world!! 

II. Who we are and we've done so far

We are a passionate team dabbling in telecommunication technologies for quite a few years now. These years witnessed our mobile TV and web TV platform being used by millions of people from all around the globe. That's not all we do, but this platform is the main focus of this campaign.

All the channels we stream are available on:
  - computers/Laptops (Windows, Linux, Mac OS X);
  - tablets (Android, iPad);
  - phones (Android, iPhone, Windows Phone, Blackberry, Nokia feature phones – you name it);
  - TV set-top-boxes (STBs);
  - smart TVs (Samsung, Sony, LG)

What's best is that every device gets its own stream, adapted to the device's video playing abilities. This way, for instance, your smart TV will get a full HD stream where available, while your older model mobile phone will get the same channel in a lower video size, adapted to its own screen and internet speed.

Our proof of concept results:

- over 300,000 PBX TV registered users in Romania;

The follow-up:

- over 100,000 downloads of PBX TV Android application;

- over 1,000,000 TV  access TV channels  / month;

Now it is time to expand, with your contribution:

First phase: we aim to expand the platform's available channels by adding the most relevant channels from most European and African countries.

Second phase: we aim to further expand our playlist to cover Asia, Australia and the American continents.

Upon expanding the tv channels network we will always take into account your preferences to capture other channels of interest for you and your communities.

III. What we need for doing the project

We have developed this platform already for Romania through PBXTV. However, in order to take it to the next level, we need your continued encouragement, promotion for our platform and financial support from you and all your friends. 

The funds will be used to:

- Expand the array of satellite dishes so that we can down-link all the new channels;
- Expand the data-center capabilities to accommodate the viewing of all the new channels, each channel in the multiple formats needed for each device.
- Add more virtual servers worldwide to increase our content delivery network so that you will be able to automatically connect to the closest possible video server - this way enjoying the smoothest, adapted, viewing experience.

In order to stream TV Channels from all over the world we will create 3 main Datacenters:

- One in Europe covering also African territory;

- Second in The United States of America capturing also the Central and South Americas; and

- The last one in Asia that will cover also Australian continent and New Zeeland. 

IV. What You Get

1. We are offering 30% discounted long term subscriptions for those of you who fund us in this stage and believe in our service. Our subscriptions include unrestricted access to all channels available at the time of and during the subscription, plus special features such as re-runs (catchup) up to 7 days back and recording abilities on select devices. 

2. We are also offering our own set-top-boxes which enable the viewer to view all the channels directly on one's TV set without the need of any other device.

V. The impact

We intend to bring order to a chaotic ecosystem. There are thousands of floating video streams out there. Each in its own, unique and unadapted format. We are planning to streamline everything by encoding all the channels at the same quality level while at multiple video sizes, and to bring everything into one place where you KNOW that it always works and where you can enjoy the same great quality across all channels and devices. All this while at the lowest possible prices. 

VI. Main advantages

1.  You can access as many different channels as you wish and you have the flexibility to change them on a monthly basis, increase or decrease their number.

2. All channels will be received by you at the same quality and resolution.

3. Watch all channels through any existing device, TV Set, laptop, desktop, mobile phones or tablets and see:

- sports events – championships

- music and film awards

- news and politics

- TV shows

4. Watch the channels at any place you are, either you are travelling in a long distance train, or if you travel by car with your family or simply relax fishing or camping in the woods.

5. Re-run of selected programs making possible watching news or shows broadcasted at different time zones.

6. Lower subscription fees than those of the cable operators in your own country and easy to pay them on-line from any place in the world.

7. Easy termination of the subscription at any time with no penalties.

- CONTRIBUTE NOW AND LET’S DO THIS UNIQUE PROJECT TOGETHER!! -

VII. Social benefits

We want to develop this new TV Channels platform to offer comfort to those who miss the most to listen to their native language and be in contact with the news back home.

We want to solve the problems we’ve learned from our friends, relatives and many other people asking us to help them watch live their favorite channels while they no longer live in their own countries - temporary immigrants or people working abroad in embassies, various organizations, multi-national companies.

If you join us realize this ambitious dream we can also help others:

- the students studying abroad could be in touch with the realities from their homelands;

- the volunteers going to Africa to show much about his own country to the Masai tribes;

-  each and every one of us going to holidays for several weeks away from home  to stay tuned with the realities from our own countries

If you haven’t seen yet all the beautiful places in the world, if you cannot travel soon in the destination you want to visit then directly connect to the realities of such places by connecting to our platform and:

-  listen to the local languages,

-  discover the landscaping and the customs of each place;

-  walk on virtual bridges to all places in the world

Our thanks

Go to you, our backers, who will help us grow the available playlist ...and to Shogun, our friend who brings a smile to our tired faces after a day's hard work. 
Our team also includes:

Shogun - Responsible for our joy, fun and creativity

story:
SUMMARY

Open Sesame Garage Door Opener is a combination of two things. A tiny bluetooth box and a smart phone application that controls the garage door controller via bluetooth box.

  • Open Sesame easily and securely turns your smart phone in to a garage remote. And for the price of a single regular garage remote, you can have as many remotes as the smart phones in your household
  • We actually have working prototypes that we have even started using for ourselves. What we would like to do, with your help, is to take this product one step further and make it production ready and have it available to millions of smart phone users.

WHERE WE ARE

At this point 80% of the manufacturing is already automated, we are working with our manufacturer back and forth to finalize the latest version of the prototype. At the same time we are working on security, robustness and reliability tests as we speak. So we are close to kicking off the official pilot programs with units fully manufactured by our manufacturer.

We have an iPhone application working with the prototype, which is also used in the video we shot. Obviously it is not in the app store yet, we have to finalize the UI to make it all look good and add some more functionality to it.

Lately with the release of iOS 8, there were couple issues that destabilized the app. We have worked on them and all is fixed now.

With your support we will be able to make the app all shiny, easy to use and useful on the iPhone. Also will be able to start the Android app quickly right after iPhone version is completed. It usually takes a lot less time to port completed iOS apps to Android.


WHAT'S NEXT ?

  • Spend more time on testing and make the product rock solid that does what it says it does all the time without a flaw.
  • Fully automate the manufacturing process and start the pilot programs.
  • We would like to polish the packaging and make it look like more slick and neat. 
  • Be prepared to go to production with higher volumes to be able to handle the demand
  • Re-skin our mobile applications to make them look prettier. iPhone version is functional at this point. We are kicking off the Android version soon as well.

  • Timeline - Our goal is to start shipping the first item in April of 2015.



PRODUCT SPECIFICATIONS

Communication - Bluetooth 4.0

Battery  - CR2450 Lithium 3v Battery 

Open Sesame Size - 1  9/16" x 1  9/16"

Box Size - 3 7/8" x 2.5" x 11/16"

Colors - Yellow, Red, Black, White, Blue, Green

Connectors - 2 connectors


FEATURES & BENEFITS

  •   No carrying your remote, no bulky item in your pockets or in your hands anymore
  •   Not having to carry means you won't lose your original remote anymore, just leave it in the car all the time. Open Sesame will do it for you.
  •   You can pair all the smart phones in your household, it is like buying unlimited additional remotes for free
  •   Does not prevent you from using your original remote. You can still use your original remote along with Open Sesame just like before.
  • Low price/affordable
  • Very easy to install
  • No Wifi needed. Wifi setup takes more time and is more complex
  • Secure


HOW DOES IT WORK ?

STEP 1 Install App
Download the Open Sesame Garage Door Opener app from the App Store or Google Play

  
STEP 2 Authenticate & Authorize
Scan the QR code to authenticate the Open Sesame device and enter the password to authorize it
STEP 3 Install Open Sesame
Using the 2 wires sticking out from Open Sesame attach it to controller panel of your garage door controller

TAP IT! Tap your finger to open or close the garage door
Once authentication and authorization process is successfully completed, your smart phone will save this device and connect to it. After attaching the device to your garage door controller you can open or close your garage door with just a tap of finger.


SECURITY

  • Every Open Sesame device has its unique QR Code. 
  • Every Open Sesame device has its own unique password. 
  • Nobody can pair it without the unique password. 
  • Nobody can use Open Sesame device without pairing. 
  • If Open Sesame receives wrong password connection attempts more than 10 times, then the device closes connection feature for a while. This time period is adjustable.
Note: We have another initiative for a feature where users can set their own password with reset to factory settings capability. We will update on this as we progress.


PERKS

$5 - Thank You

$25 - H&A T-Shirt

1 Open Sesame Garage Door Opener - $39   (Original Price $49)

2 Open Sesame Garage Door Openers - $75

3 Open Sesame Garage Door Openers - $109

10 Open Sesame Garage Door Openers - $349

100 Open Sesame Garage Door Openers - $3450


FAQ


How long does the battery last? 1-2 years depending on usage pattern. In our road map we are planning to use the power that's already there for the garage controller. Once that is done batteries will be optional.

What is the maximum number of mobile devices we can use with a single Open Sesame device? There is no limit on the number of mobile devices that can be used with a single Open Sesame device. But at a given time, you can use only one smart phone to operate your garage door. If you want to be able to use multiple smart phones to open/close your garage door simultaneously, you need to install multiple Open Sesame devices on the same garage door controller.

Does connecting Open Sesame to the garage door controller disable your existing garage remotes? No. You can keep using your original remotes as usual.

Can you pair more than one Open Sesame to your mobile device? Yes. This helps if you have a multiple-door garage.

What is the maximum distance from which garage door can be operated? 100 feet.

Is Open Sesame Mobile App free? Yes.

How to pair additional smart phones to the Open Sesame device? - You can bring your phone close to your Open Sesame device and pair just like you paired it with the first mobile device. Also we are working on a feature where you can optionally pair it through an already paired mobile device. 

Which garage door controller manufacturers do you support? Open Sesame Garage Door Opener is a generic solution that can be used with pretty much any garage door controller that has a wall switch or a console

I have more than one garage door for my garage. Can Open Sesame operate all? Yes. You would have to pair a separate Open Sesame device for each garage door controller for that.

Can Open Sesame app control garage doors of multiple homes? Yes. If you attach a separate Open Sesame device to each garage door controller you can control all.

Does Open Sesame let me operate my garage door even when I am away from home via Internet? You can operate your garage door only when you are in or around your home via bluetooth only. Open Sesame does not connect to Internet.

What happens if I replace my mobile device? Please keep the QR code and Password. You can set up your new smart phone with this security information. Alternatively with mobile pairing you can use another existing mobile device to set it up. If you lose your QR code/password and do not have another paired phone you can contact us.

Can Open Sesame tell me if my garage door is open or close? At this point it does not. But we are considering adding this feature for future releases. 

Will attaching Open Sesame to my garage door controller void its warranty? No. Open Sesame acts like a 3rd party switch to your controller.

Is there a shipping cost?  Shipping is free within the United States. International shipment fees apply.

If you have any questions that has not been answered here, please send it in to support@mygarageopener.com


TEAM



Ali Ozgun (on the right)
Ali has been in the IT industry for 15 years. After graduating from University of Southern California, he worked at start up companies as well as large corporations such as Cisco Systems as a Software Specialist. He has been in the mobile software business for the last 4 years. Applications he produced together with his partner exceeded 1 Million in downloads.


Hayrettin Yucel (on the left)
Hayrettin has been in the Electronic Industry for 13 years and IT industry for 9 years. He worked for start up companies and also for major software companies like Microsoft as a vendor. He has been in the mobile software business for 4 years. Applications he produced together with his partner exceeded 1 Million in downloads.

Will attaching Open Sesame to my garage door controller void its warranty? No. Open Sesame acts like a 3rd party switch to your controller.
Is there a shipping cost?  Shipping is free within the United States. International shipment fees apply.
If you have any questions that has not been answered here, please send it in to support@mygarageopener.com

TEAM




Ali Ozgun (on the right)Ali has been in the IT industry for 15 years. After graduating from University of Southern California, he worked at start up companies as well as large corporations such as Cisco Systems as a Software Specialist. He has been in the mobile software business for the last 4 years. Applications he produced together with his partner exceeded 1 Million in downloads.

Hayrettin Yucel (on the left)
Hayrettin has been in the Electronic Industry for 13 years and IT industry for 9 years. He worked for start up companies and also for major software companies like Microsoft as a vendor. He has been in the mobile software business for 4 years. Applications he produced together with his partner exceeded 1 Million in downloads.

story:
This campaign is ended.

Amber is a chic case that charges Apple Watch on the go. You can charge and protect your Apple Watch with this innovative and stylish portable power bank.

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

Move around freely as your Apple Watch charges in your bag

  • With its snug and secure fit, Amber will ensure that the Apple Watch’s magnetic charger remains securely attached.
  • Your Apple Watch will remain protected from any items which may damage or scratch it. 
  • No need to deal with the hassle of pulling out and untangling wires as the charging cable stays tidily hidden within your Amber, just place your watch in the case and go!

 

 

 

 

 

 

Amber charges iPhone as well

Simply plug your iPhone in the USB port of Amber.

 

Amber can charge your Apple Watch and iPhone simultaneously:

 

 

Amber can fully charge Apple Watch up to 6 times, or iPhone 6 once.

The Birth of Amber

Being Apple lovers, it’s no surprise that we got our hands on Apple Watch at its soonest available time. During the long awaited period, we actively discussed and brainstormed, how we could best charge it on the go.

It is our belief that an ideal power bank for Apple Watch should meet the following requirements: 

  • It must be able to charge Apple Watch on the go. With conventional power banks, the watch would easily disconnect from the magnetic connector – we knew we needed one that would securely hold it in place. 
  • It would be able to power other devices as well, so we wouldn’t have to carry multiple power banks.

From these initial criteria, Amber was born. 

 

 

Polishing Amber

We set to work to build and along the way came up with a creative solution to keep the 2 meter cable secure and elegantly hidden. 

Through trial and error, we designed a special spool which the charging cable fits snugly around:

 

 

Which can then securely fit the magnetic connector:

 

 

We crafted a cover to place over the spool, exposing only the connector creating a space-saving and attractive case following the beautiful Apple aesthetic that we have come to know and love.

 

 

This video shows how to twine your 2m or 1m Apple Watch charging cable onto Amber's spool:

Conventional power banks are not suitable for daily charging because: 

  • When they have been completely drained and not used for a period of time, it can’t immediately charge other devices even if it’s connected to a power source and charging. 
  • Conventional power bank’s voltage will become unstable when overloaded due to simultaneously charging devices and being charged with input and output occurring at the same time. Unstable voltage will adversely affect the life and stability of the batteries.

With that in mind, we improved Amber’s circuitry so that when it’s connected to a power source, Amber will continue to charge your Apple Watch, iPhone, and Amber itself directly through the external power supply. By directing the incoming electric current flow outward, Amber effectively saves its battery cycle life. And when Amber itself runs out of charge, it simply functions as a normal charger and powers devices immediately.  

 

 

Simply plug Amber in and it will power your Apple Watch and iPhone simultaneously all while charging itself.

 

 

Amber has an iPhone app

We are developing an app for Amber, which will enable you to:

  • Check Amber's states: remaining battery level, temperature, charge-discharge circle count, etc.
  • Receive notifications: Amber has been fully charged, Apple Watch has been fully charged, etc.

Here is a home-made video shows the app's interfaces:

 

The app is now available in the App Store: https://appsto.re/cn/Bi-O_.i .

Raising Amber with the best

The foundation of any power bank is, of course, the battery. This is why we chose world-class battery manufacturer, Desay as our supplier. All Desay batteries are subjected to a battery of tests (we couldn’t help ourselves) before leaving the factory exposing them to extreme temperatures, intense pressure, and aging tests.

To ensure quality at every step of the production process, we chose the biggest and best factory in the world - Foxconn. We have already conducted two successful pre-production trials and we can guarantee that Amber will be subjected to strict and rigorous testing.

Getting Amber to market

 

 

  • First trial production successfully completed, i.e. EVT (Engineering Verification Test). Amber’s electrical components have been fully tested and verified. 
  • Second trial production completed, i.e. DVT (Design Verification Test). Amber’s moldings were rigorously tested and tuned.

 

 

Check out this video and watch Amber come together:

 

A simple test of Amber's prototype:

 

Amber comes in multiple colours

Yes, like iPhones and Apple Watches.

 

 

Timeline

  • 2015.03 ClearGrass team founded
  • 2015.05 Amber's design concept completed, testing and evaluation completed
  • 2015.08 EVT (Engineering Verification Test) delivered
  • 2015.09 DVT (Design Verification Test) delivered
  • 2015.11 PVT (Progress Verification Test), small batch production begins
  • 2016.1 Start shipping Ambers to backers
  • 2016.2 Start retail

Specifications

Amber can fully charge Apple Watch up to 6 times, or iPhone 6 / iPhone 6s once.

  • Power in: Micro-USB, compatible with adaptors outputting both 5V/2A and 5V/1A
  • Power out 1: USB (Apple Watch Magnetic Charging Connector), 5V/0.5A (max)
  • Power out 2: USB, 5.1V/2A (max)
  • Battery: 3800mAh, 3.7V
  • Dimensions: 101 * 101 * 46.4 mm / 3.98 * 3.98 * 1.83 in.
  • Weight: 280 g / 9.88 oz.
  • Materials: Aluminium, Plastic
  • Bluetooth 4.0 LE

Power out 2: USB, 5.1V/2A (max)

story:
The Magic Cable is the first cable to transform on BOTH ends making it the World's most adaptable cable.  It can be used as a normal charging cable or you can plug it into your devices to power another one of your devices.  We built the Magic Cable so that you would never need to buy another charging cable, forever, for any your devices.

 

 

 

To receive a Magic Cable for FREE simply follow the instructions below!
 
1) Pledge for at least ONE cable.  Only contributors can qualify for a free cable.
 
2) Share our campaign on Facebook using the Facebook share button on our campaign page or share using our unique link www.igg.me/at/magiccable
 
3) Screenshot your share on your Facebook page.  You will need this later.
 
4) Send us an email to info@themagiccable.com  Please include your order number and your screen shot in your email. 
 
Please note that only contributors who follow the steps above exactly will be entitled to an additional FREE Magic Cable.

            

With just a flick of your finger you can turn your normal USB side into Micro USB and transform your device into a Power Bank.

By being able to transform from USB to Micro USB, you can use the Magic Cable like any other regular charging cable or you can plug it into your Micro USB device and use that device as a power bank!

 

With its built in adaptor, the Magic Cable can transform to charge any devices that use Micro USB or Lightning.

 

We designed the Magic Cable so that you will never need to use another cable again!  The Magic Cable is all you need, whether you are charging your Android, an iPhone, your headphones or even your camera, the Magic Cable can do it all!

 

 

Use the Magic Cable to transfer files securely from one device to another! 

Right now we are taking orders for the Magic Cable in Gold and Rose Gold.  There will be more colors available soon as part of our stretch goals, so stay tuned....

 

VOTE FOR YOUR FAVORITE COLORS BY COMMENTING!

We have been working on various cable colors exclusive for the Magic Cable and we want your help to decide! To vote for your favorite cable color PLEASE LEAVE A COMMENT in the comment section wiith your favorite color of choice!  You can pick from GREEN, ORANGE, RED, WHITE, PURPLE, or BLUE.  Make sure you leave a comment to vote for your favorite color to avoid disappointment. 

 

CHECK OUT OUR NEW VINTAGE T-SHIRTS AVAILABLE NOW!!!

We have recently launched our new retro vintage t shirts by The Charge Factory.  You can now order one under our T Shirt Perk! Check out the cool designs below!  The Tees are vintage-washed and available in Small, Medium, Large and X Large!

 

We have already invested into the design, mold and initial cost of production.  The funds that is collected from our Indiegogo campaign will help us fund our first purchase order and allow us to bring our prices down.  More than 60% of the budget will go directly into production cost.  

What are the risks and challenges of the Magic Cable project?
During the past 5 months we have perfected the Magic Cable, from the design to the prototype and have already entered into mass production.  We have teamed up with a factory in Shenzhen China whom we have been working with over 3 years.  Together with our joint expertise, we are confident that we will be able to ship in time as per schedule with no delays.  
 
When do we begin shipping?
If we continue to meet our current deadlines, shipping will commence once we have collected the funds from Indiegogo in mid January.  
 
When can I select the color of my Magic Cable?
Once the campaign has ended an email survey will be sent out which will allow you to pick the colors that are available.
 
How about stretch goals?
We are currently working on a range of new colors and they will be available as part of the stretch goals.
 
Can the Magic Cable sync as well as charge?
Yes apart from charging the Magic Cable allows you to Sync as well as transfer data/files from one device to another?
 
Can I use the Magic Cable as a regular charging cable?
Yes, the Magic Cable can be used as a regular charging cable once your switch the Micro USB to USB.
 
Will you be getting MFI?
We are currently looking into this option and will update you on any further developments.
 
How long is the Magic Cable?
The Magic Cable is a standard 1.2 meters. 
 
How do I contact you?
For any questions please email info@themagiccable.com

Yes, the Magic Cable can be used as a regular charging cable once your switch the Micro USB to USB.
 
Will you be getting MFI?
We are currently looking into this option and will update you on any further developments.
 
How long is the Magic Cable?
The Magic Cable is a standard 1.2 meters. 
 
How do I contact you?
For any questions please email info@themagiccable.com

story:
Creative tool Whitelines Link digitizes handwriting and sketches

Swedish innovators Whitelines revolutionized the market for stationery when they in
2006 introduced to the world their paper products built on a simple yet brilliant idea -
white lines against a light grey background.  In september 2012 the team launched yet another innovative product: Whitelines Link, an iPhone application that digitizes the user's handwritten works.
 
Whitelines Link is a happy combo of physical and digital notes. You could call it a
clever scanner-app that in combination with Whitelines Link paper makes it super easy to capture, save and share your notes.
 

Whitelines Link for Android

The application is free and aready available  for iPhone but we want it to be availble for everyone. This is why we need to develop the app for Android.
 

How to use Whitelines Link

The basic idea is to let the app and the special Whitelines Link paper actually see each other and the rest will happen automatically.
  • make sure the four corner markers of the paper are visible in the display
  • hold still for a moment
  • let the app capture your note
  • save or share your note in whichever way you like

 

Makes your handwriting better than in real life

The app will automatically straighten the paper, clean it from the background and also even-up your handwriting so it will turn out a iittle bit smoother than in  reality.
 

A shortcut makes sharing even easier

A quick way to save or share your work is to tick a Quick Box on the paper with a pen. The app will find your instruction and automatically act on it, either by instantly
creating an e-mail or by sending it to your Dropbox or Evernote account. Inside the app there are other ways of saving or sharing your notes, which also will be stored in the local library.
 
 
From inside the app you'll have more sharing options. Publish your doodles straight on Twitter or Facebook within seconds.
 
 

Make it happen!  Make the Whitelines Link go Android

Our ambition is to get the Whitelines Link for Android on the market by this summer. Your contribution will be crucial for us.  Hopefully you will find  a perk that you think is attractive, but  if your only contribution is to share  the site we will be  cheering that too. In fact, we will be that happy, we will step outside  for each share and  shout  ”thank you”.

 If we by chance would surpass our fundinglevel, the means will be dedicated to further development of the free Whitelines Link app. To new platforms, adding more functionality, meet more ideas, adapte it  to new situations, or… you get it, we have the ideas. Just not the cash.

 

 

What other say about us

  • Tap!Magazine 
  • The Hickensian
  • Makeuseof
  • Evernote für pfiffige
  • Springpad 
  • Speaq
  • iPhoneclub
  • The NewYork Times
  • Gourmetpens
  • Flaxart&design 
  • Konigi 
  • Beezinthebelfry 

 

Whitelines, the story

Whitelines was founded in January 2006 by three friends in Stockholm with one ambition: to make a contribution to a better world, no matter how small. The means to this end was a simple but very effective idea – a new kind of writing paper which, through its remarkable clarity, could support everyone’s writing, drawing and thinking. Why not take one of the mainstays of everyday life and improve it? Whitelines® is today based in Stockholm, Sweden, working to support your ideas for the future.

 

Watch  the full story  >>
