story:
The Contros is a Wi-Fi timer that enables you to set timers and turn your home appliances on/off from iOS/Android phone anytime from anywhere. 


With easy-to-use features, everyone has the chance to enjoy the smart life brought by the Contros as the promotion price starts from only US$6!


Smaller, but smarter. The Contros is half the size of iPhone 5s which is the smallest smart plug with night light in the world! 


Designed with a simple interface, you can turn your devices on and off through one-button control. The usually complicated timer tasks are made easy by the user-friendly interface.


Mum taps the screen of her smartphone to remotely turn off the light, so that her sleeping baby won’t be woken up.


Set the coffee machine to work at 7 am every morning, so that people can enjoy a hot coffee after getting up.


The Contros enables you to set the countdown timer to turn off your electric cooker. No more thick porridge and burnt pasta!


Based on the timer setup, the router will be automatically turned off, so that people can enjoy a good sleep without being exposed to harmful radiation.


Set the repeater time to make the electric watering device periodically water the flowers for you, effectively saving your time and energy.


As a protection against would-be thieves, the Contros can turn on your lamp randomly by setting the random timer.


Overcharging smartphones will significantly reduce their battery life. The Contros automatically stops charging when the battery is full.


Equipped with a mini night light, the Contros can light your way when you go to bed at night. This is also featured in the timer setup function. 



You can benifit from powerful functions at a super lower price now! So what are you waiting for?!


Are you still wasting time setting up your traditional outlet timer? If so, the Contros is the solution to your problem! With a stable performance, it enables you to automate and control your home appliances. More importantly, the price is even cheaper than the traditional outlet timer.


•  Stable performance：The prior versions of the SP series reached over 500,000 homes which accumulated a huge customer base. As the 4th generation product, the Contros is a reliable product with stable performance.

•  Secure information：The “Lock device” function, effectively prevents your devices from being controlled by other people.

•  Reliability: Available with US and EU plug types with TUV certification, the Contros is designed with fire resistant PC material and tested with over 50,000 switches life time.


•Download the free BroadLink “e-Control” App from the Apple App Store/Google Play.

•  Plug the Contros into the power outlet, making sure the Wi-Fi LED is flashing rapidly before proceeding to the configuration mode.

•  Enter the password of your Wi-Fi network on the configuration page, tap“Configure” to connect your devices to the WLAN.

•  Control your devices from anywhere.



We provide you two plug types of the Contros for your requirement. Customers should remark in the order (noted  in the shipping information) the type from the above 2 options. For example, your shipping information can be like this: Street/City/Country(US plug type). If you don't remark it, we will ship you the Contros with a corresponding plug type according to your shipping address. We apologize for the inconvenience that the Contros is not available for more types of socket. Your understanding and support will be greatly appreciated.


Hangzhou Gubei Electronics Technology Co., Ltd (BroadLink) is China’s leading Wi-Fi smart home solution provider with products including smart plugs, universal remotes, light switches, environment sensors, Wi-Fi speakers etc. We also provide OEM manufacturers with turn-key solutions including Wi-Fi modules, firmware, cloud services and apps to help them launch smart products. Meet BroadLink, meet the future!

Follow us to get latest news:

                                


Hangzhou Gubei Electronics Technology Co., Ltd.
Room 106, Building 1, No. 611 Jianghong Road, Binjiang, Hangzhou, Zhejiang 310052, China
Tel: +86-571-85159281
Email: e-sales@ibroadlink.com
Official website: www.ibroadlink.com



| About the Project

How can I help?

From telling your friends, following us on Facebook or twitter, writing a review, making a pledge, to sharing your ideas and suggestions, we really appreciate your making this project happen.

I want to be a beta-tester!

Hey, volunteers for beta-testing are all welcome. We have received quite a few requests, so not everyone will be successful in becoming a beta-tester. If it's no problem with you, we'd like to keep you records (name, address, contact information) and contact you at the time when we're ready for beta-testing.

What is the range of Contros?

Approximate 200 feet or about 60 meters.


| Technologies

Why Contros uses Wi-Fi technology?

Compared with ZigBee, Z-Wave or 433 MHz wireless technologies, Wi-Fi is already very popular now – Every day you use Wi-Fi everywhere – at home, in office, in coffee shop or even on the street and all smartphones support Wi-Fi.

Can I build my own app for Contros?

We offer open API for developers to build their own apps for Contros. Please contact us to register for the API files and documentations for development.


| Functionalities

How long the data will be saved?

All data will be saved in your phone storage forever until your phone ends its life. Before changing your phone, you can login to your account and backup your data to the cloud. You can retrieve it on your new phone with the same account.

What is the maximal load for Contros?

The max load for Contros is 16A(EU) / 15A(US)

Can I control devices outside my house?

Yes. You will be able to control devices within different networks – other Internet enabled Wi-Fi network, 3G or 4G, no matter you are at home, in office or traveling.

How many devices can be used within one network?

The network scale depends on the capability of your Wi-Fi router. A traditional Wi-Fi router for home use normally accept 20 to 30 devices and an enterprise class router may accept 40 or more.

Can I control multiple devices at once?

You can group several devices and control them together.

Which plug types does Contros support?

Contros currently comes with plug types for Germany (EU), United States and mainland China.

Other plug types may be considered later.

Does Contros have surge-protection?

Yes. Contros is built in with surge-protection.

What is the power consumption of Contros?

Contros itself consumes less than 1.1W – much less than the power wasted on most of home appliances.

Can more than one phone control the same Contros?

A Contros can be controlled from multiple phones. The status and settings on all the phones are synchronized as the same.

Can anyone hacked into my Contros and control my home appliances?

Your Wi-Fi password is the first security wall for all the devices. Only who knows your Wi-Fi password can access your devices. Also you can select to “lock” your device so it will not be added by any other phones even he is free to use your home Wi-Fi network.


| Supports

What smartphones does Contros work with?

Contros works with iPhone4/4s/5/5c/5s with iOS6 or above and most of Android phones with Android 2.3 or above.

What languages does the app support?

Upon release, the app and instructions will be available in English, Spanish, Japanese and Chinese. We may offer other languages in the future depends on the market demands worldwide.

How do you ensure the quality?

The quality will be guaranteed from these factors:

1.  Contros will be certified with TUV CE, GS and ETL (pending).

2.  The case is made with high heat resistant materials which is conformed to UL/V0 standard.

3.  The radio will be compliant with the regulation of FCC for best EMC performance.

What's the expected lifetime of products?

We insist to use all world’s best components on our products and the majority of our components have a 10(+) year life expectancy and the switch is built to sustain 50,000 clicks (on/off). Like other electronic products, we offer buyers 1 year warranty but based on our testing results under normal use they can work perfectly for 5 years or more.


| Purchase

Is the shipping cost included in pledge amount or is it charged?

If you an international backer and there is a shipping fee incurred to send you your Contros, Indiegogo will automatically prompt you to enter the additional shipping fee. If you have accidentally not added the shipping fee, please return and edit your original pledge amount when you pledge. In the event that the stated shipping fee does not cover VAT and Duty charges.

Do I need to purchase a gateway or controller separately working with Contros?

No. Benefitted by the universal technology Wi-Fi, almost every house and every office has a Wi-Fi router and Contros will link to your router to work – not like ZigBee, Z-Wave or 433 Mhz devices which requires a separate gateway – this saves your cost and makes the device workable in anywhere.

If I want to become a distributor, do I need to have my own server to provide the cloud service?

No. You don’t need to invest anything for your local cloud service! Our cloud service is running on Amazon servers which is capable to provide reliable and high performance services for customers all over the world and another benefit is the service is totally FREE!


Legal Disclaimer


"Delivery of rewards/perks are subject to best efforts and not guaranteed."
story_txt:
The Contros
is a Wi-Fi timer that enables you to set timers and turn your home
appliances on/off from iOS/Android phone anytime from anywhere. 



With easy-to-use features, everyone has the chance to enjoy the smart life brought by the Contros as the promotion price starts from only US$6!




Smaller, but smarter. The Contros is half the size of iPhone 5s which is the smallest smart plug with night light in the world! 




Designed
with a simple interface, you can turn your devices on and off through
one-button control. The usually complicated timer tasks are made easy by the
user-friendly interface.





Mum taps the screen of her smartphone to remotely turn off the light,
so that her sleeping baby won’t be woken up.


Set
the coffee machine to work at 7 am every morning, so that people can enjoy a hot
coffee after getting up.


The Contros
enables you to set the countdown timer to turn off your electric cooker. No more thick porridge and burnt pasta!


Based
on the timer setup, the router will be automatically turned off, so that people can
enjoy a good sleep without being exposed to harmful radiation.



Set
the repeater time to make the electric watering device periodically water the
flowers for you, effectively saving your time and energy.



As
a protection against would-be thieves, the Contros can turn on your lamp randomly by setting
the random timer.


Overcharging smartphones will significantly reduce their battery life. The Contros
automatically stops charging when the battery is full.

Equipped
with a mini night light, the Contros can light your way when you go to bed at
night. This is also featured in the timer setup function. 





You can benifit from powerful functions at a super lower price now! So what are you waiting for?!


Are
you still wasting time setting up your traditional outlet timer? If so, the Contros
is the solution to your problem! With a stable performance, it enables you
to automate and control your home appliances. More importantly, the price is even
cheaper than the traditional outlet timer.


•  Stable
performance：The prior versions of the SP series reached over 500,000 homes which
accumulated a huge customer base. As the 4th generation product, the Contros is
a reliable product with stable performance. 
•  Secure
information：The “Lock device” function, effectively prevents your devices from being controlled
by other people.
•  Reliability:
Available with US and EU plug types with TUV certification, the Contros is designed with
fire resistant PC material and tested with over 50,000 switches life time.




•Download the free BroadLink “e-Control” App from the Apple App Store/Google Play.
•  Plug the Contros into the power
outlet, making sure the Wi-Fi LED is flashing rapidly before proceeding to the
configuration mode.
•  Enter the password of your Wi-Fi
network on the configuration page, tap“Configure” to connect your devices to the WLAN. 
•  Control your devices from
anywhere.






We provide you two plug types of the Contros for your
requirement. Customers should remark in the order (noted  in the shipping information) the type from the above 2 options. For example, your shipping information can be like this: Street/City/Country(US plug type). If you don't remark it, we will ship you the
Contros with a corresponding plug type according to your shipping address. We apologize for the inconvenience that the Contros is not available for more types of
socket. Your understanding and support will be greatly appreciated.




Hangzhou Gubei Electronics Technology Co., Ltd
(BroadLink) is China’s leading Wi-Fi smart home solution provider with products
including smart plugs, universal remotes, light switches, environment sensors,
Wi-Fi speakers etc. We also provide OEM manufacturers with turn-key solutions
including Wi-Fi modules, firmware, cloud services and apps to help them launch
smart products. Meet BroadLink, meet the future!
Follow us to get latest news:


                                

Hangzhou Gubei Electronics Technology Co., Ltd.Room 106, Building 1, No. 611 Jianghong Road, Binjiang, Hangzhou, Zhejiang 310052, ChinaTel: +86-571-85159281Email: e-sales@ibroadlink.comOfficial website: www.ibroadlink.com





| About the
Project
How can I help?
From
telling your friends, following us on Facebook or twitter, writing a review,
making a pledge, to sharing your ideas and suggestions, we really appreciate
your making this project happen.
I want to be a beta-tester!
Hey,
volunteers for beta-testing are all welcome. We have received quite a few

story:
African-American girls are overlooked by the mobile industry. Although there are hundreds of thousands of mobile applications on the market, not one has been created for African-American girls. 3 million African-American girls in the United States hold a buying power of $24 billion, but Internet/mobile technology companies don’t have this valuable demographic on their radar. When you search the term  "Black Girls” on any search engine the negative imagery and lack of representation the girls face in the media and online is depressing and not a true reflection of this special demographic.    

SOCIALgrlz is building an app to fill the void and to give African-American girls (13-17) their own platform to learn and connect together. We are dedicated to improving the quality of life for African-American girls through the development of a mobile, Web and publishing service.  We are the first company of its kind!                

                 

After years of research and conceptual development, our mobile website has been launched and now we are ready to develop a mobile application for the Android and Apple platforms. The mobile app will have articles, interviews and our specially designed book called the SOCIALgrlz TXTbook, a collaborative book between girls and experts, as well as a column with pearls of wisdom from seasoned African-American women. The purpose of the column is to provide African-American girls valuable guidance from successful role models and energize inter-generational interaction. Some of the girls may not have relationships with their grandmothers or other seasoned women who can provide much needed guidance and love; we want to help them connect to women they can look up to for advice.                                 

               SOCIALgrlz provides five interactive channels: Be Heard!; SOCIALgrlz TXTtbook; SOCIALgrlz Bookshelf; SOCIALgrlz Certified and Odessa’s Wisdom. All of these mobile platforms provide African-American girls with opportunities to improve their self-esteem through modern technology by engaging and learning from each other, as well as, gaining wisdom from women who have great insight and life experience.

                                  

TheSOCIALgrlz Textbook gives African-American girls a chance to use their voices in a way that has never been done. The SOCIALgrlz TXTbook will cover six specific topics -- Lifestyles, Health & Wellness, Finance, Education, Leadership and Building Relationships. The book is designed to give girls a safe place to speak about topics important to them and receive advice from women who understand their questions about life. This innovative book will become a valuable tool for girls to help navigate through their social issues, and ultimately a source for experts. 

 SOCIALgrlz would respectfully like your support of our crowd-sourced funding campaign to raise $50,000 for the development of our startup mobile application. The cost will cover design, testing and development of a mobile application for Apple and Android platforms.

                                                WAYS TO CONTRIBUTE 

  • 2 Cents Contributor  $5  - We will give you a shout out on Facebook and Twitter. Your name will also be listed on SOCIALgrlz.com as a fan.  
  • SOCIALgrlz Ambassador $10 - You will receive a SOCIALgrlz Fan shout out as well as receive our very own SOCIALgrlz screen saver that can be shared through social media or displayed on your phone.  
  • SOCIALgrlz Champion Contributor $25 - Special Message on SOCIALgrlz USB Wrist Band and SOCIALgrlz Fan shout out.

                                   

  • Your Voice Contributor $50 - You will receive a special designed (QR Code) SOCIALgrlz T- Shirt and SOCIALgrlz Fan shout out.     
Be Heard Contributor $50- You will receive (SOCIALgrlz Logo) SOCIALgrlz T- Shirt and SOCIALgrlz Fan shout out.



  •  I LOVE This Concept Contributor $100 - You will become a part of the SOCIALgrlz Beta Program which gives you full access to the pre-release version of the SOCIALgrlz mobile app and SOCIALgrlz fan shout out. 
  • Odessa’s Wisdom Contributor  $1000 - Named after CEO Marissa Jennings late grandmother Odessa McClary.  You will receive a Shout Out, Screen Saver, Wrist Band, SOCIALgrlz Logo T- Shirt, participate in Beta Program and have an opportunity to feature a young girl who is making a change in her community. 
  • Early Adopter Advertiser $2000 and UP - 1 time Special Advertisement package to sponsor SOCIALgrlz Web Site & Mobile Application, participate in Beta Program, feature a young girl making a change in her community, USB Wristband, QR Code & SOCIALgrlz Logo T-shirts, Screen Saver & SOCIALgrlz Fan shout out.

                                    THANK YOU FOR YOUR SUPPORT! 

 

Twitter: @SOCIALgrlzLLC - make sure you use the hashtag #2Cents4SOCIALgrlz

Facebook: SOCIALgrlzLLC                                                         www.SOCIALgrlz.com


The following links provide information about additional support for SOCIALgrlz & our campaign

https://www.blackenterprise.com/technology/white-house-initiative-on-educational-excellence-

steam/https://www.blackenterprise.com/technology/socialgrlz-launches-campaign-to-fund-first-mobile-app-for-african-american-girls/

http://wschronicle.com/2013/11/social-media-community-launched-at-bennett/

Socialgrlz comes to Bennett - YouTube

http://www.ebony.com/news-views/white-house-hosts-black-twitter-chat-on-education-756

http://www.npr.org/templates/transcript/transcript.php?storyId=169040981

story:
DreamMe ORBIT is the first „sleep and relaxation aid in one“ which uses your mobile phone as a projector. Helps you to relax and fall asleep faster. Furthermore, it turns your smartphone or tablet into a pocket planetarium. Relax by watching planets on your ceiling.

Sleep aid: DreamMe ORBIT projects proper breathing technique from YOGA using special color coding on to the ceiling. No need to concentrate on virtual counting. This helps to use the breathing technique effectively in the correct rhythm.

Relaxation aid: DreamMe ORBIT turns your smartphone or tablet into a pocket planetarium and helps you relax by watching planets on your ceiling.

Become the "astronaut" who moves around the selected planet in the "orbit". DreamMe ORBIT turns your smartphone into a pocket planetarium.

The calming rotation of the planets and the relaxing sounds have been proven to reduce the pulse beat and bring your thoughts into distant galaxies. Thus, DreamMe ORBIT prepares you for the sleep phase and helps you to relax. Optionally, custom relaxation or sleep sounds can be selected. You can customize the DreamMe ORBIT APP to your personal liking.

The Voyager missions previously passed the probes to Jupiter, Saturn, Uranus and Neptune, and some of them provided spectacular images. We decided to integrate all the planets of the inner and outer solar system into the DreamMe ORBIT app. All eight planets (Jupiter, Neptun, Uranus, Mercury, Earth, Mars, Saturn, Venus, plus the Moon) have an individual appearance and rotate in the projection at the same speed (the rotation speed is adjustable). With the projection of the planets, we can not produce super-high-resolution images. It is much more about the impression and atmosphere produced by soothing planetary rotation and relaxing music.

In addition to the visual relaxation by DreamMe ORBIT, the selected planet sequence is supported by selected soundtracks matching the respective planet.  

Each of the eight planets and the moon, are assigned their own sound, all of them are unique and relaxing. In the app, the background sounds can be activated or deactivated. The length / duration as well as the volume are also set here. If you want, you can also play your own music.

We already know from the yoga world that breathing is good for the body and the soul! When we are stressed, we often breathe too shallowly. To relax and reduce heart beat frequency, there are some helpful breathing exercises learned from YOGA. With DreamMe ORBIT these exercises do not have to be learned. Intuitively, the projection guides you through inhaling and exhaling in the proper rhythm without having to concentrate on whether your technique is correct or not. Thus, all your attention is directed to breathing and leads to the desired outcome faster - relaxation!

YOGA breathing exercise 5-5

  • breathe through the nose for 5 seconds,
  • exhale through the mouth for 5 seconds.

YOGA breathing exercise 4-7-8

  • inhale through the nose for 4 seconds
  • stop the air for 7 seconds
  • exhale through the mouth for 8 seconds

DreamMe ORBIT supports you and helps you intuitively bring your breathing into the right relaxing balance. With DreamMe ORBIT you can turn off your mind - effectively and quickly so you can relax and sleep.

Disconnect thoughts: Your brain gets re-focused and thoughts do get distracted from daily routine by the soothing light, stopping them from keeping you awake.

To fall asleep faster: Depending on the exercise you selected and it´s lengths, DreamMe ORBIT app will automatically switch off and help you fall asleep naturally without any medication.

 
 
UWE SPANNAGEL™ is an office for industrial design.
 
 
 
We engage in continuous cooperation with our customers in the fields of brand development, strategic product planning and product development. Accordingly, the guiding principles of our design philosophy are simple and logical.
 
 
DreamMe ORBIT impresses with its clear use of form. The two identical parts, of which the upper one carries the optics, have the exact same contour and sit mirrored to each other, which is why in silhouette they form a shapely cylinder that keeps its symmetry even when it is unscrewed to adjust the picture sharpness. Considering its aesthetics, it is almost a pity it is being used in the dark. The selected material not only is non-slip and extremely lightweight but also offers comfortable haptics preventing scratches.
 
 
 
 
 
 
*** Mockup of the non finished app
 
 

Making a demo video of DreamMe ORBIT live in action is nearly impossible for non-experts as the environment has to be darkened in order to see the projection.

We have done our best to show you a demo video with as little modification as possible.

Demo of relaxation mode - showing some example planets in the following order: 1. Earth 2.Mars 3.Jupiter 4.Venus. - light on to see the setup.

 
Demo of sleep mode: Here you see first the 5-5 breathing technique with counter (still mirrored / mockup), then without counter. Next sequence is the 4-7-8 breathing technique with counter (still mirrored / mockup), then without counter – light on to see the setup.

We decided to integrate all the planets of the inner and outer solar system into the DreamMe ORBIT app. All eight planets (Jupiter, Neptun, Uranus, Mercury, Earth, Mars, Saturn, Venus, plus the Moon) have an individual appearance and rotate in the projection at the same speed (the rotation speed is adjustable). With the projection of the planets, we can not produce super-high-resolution images. It is much more about the impression and atmosphere produced by soothing planetary rotation and relaxing music.In addition to the visual relaxation by DreamMe ORBIT, the selected planet sequence is supported by selected soundtracks matching the respective planet.  Each of the eight planets and the moon, are assigned their own sound, all of them are unique and relaxing. In the app, the background sounds can be activated or deactivated. The length / duration as well as the volume are also set here. If you want, you can also play your own music.We already know from the yoga world that breathing is good for the body and the soul! When we are stressed, we often breathe too shallowly. To relax and reduce heart beat frequency, there are some helpful breathing exercises learned from YOGA. With DreamMe ORBIT these exercises do not have to be learned. Intuitively, the projection guides you through inhaling and exhaling in the proper rhythm without having to concentrate on whether your technique is correct or not. Thus, all your attention is directed to breathing and leads to the desired outcome faster - relaxation!YOGA breathing exercise 5-5
breathe through the nose for 5 seconds,
exhale through the mouth for 5 seconds.
YOGA breathing exercise 4-7-8
inhale through the nose for 4 seconds
stop the air for 7 seconds
exhale through the mouth for 8 seconds

DreamMe ORBIT supports you and helps you intuitively bring your breathing into the right relaxing balance. With DreamMe ORBIT you can turn off your mind - effectively and quickly so you can relax and sleep.
Disconnect thoughts: Your brain gets re-focused and thoughts do get distracted from daily routine by the soothing light, stopping them from keeping you awake.
To fall asleep faster: Depending on the exercise you selected and it´s lengths, DreamMe ORBIT app will automatically switch off and help you fall asleep naturally without any medication.
  UWE SPANNAGEL™ is an office for industrial design. 
  We engage in continuous cooperation with our customers in the fields of brand development, strategic product planning and product development. Accordingly, the guiding principles of our design philosophy are simple and logical.  DreamMe ORBIT impresses with its clear use of form. The two identical parts, of which the upper one carries the optics, have the exact same contour and sit mirrored to each other, which is why in silhouette they form a shapely cylinder that keeps its symmetry even when it is unscrewed to adjust the picture sharpness. Considering its aesthetics, it is almost a pity it is being used in the dark. The selected material not only is non-slip and extremely lightweight but also offers comfortable haptics preventing scratches.      *** Mockup of the non finished app  
Making a demo video of DreamMe ORBIT live in action is nearly impossible for non-experts as the environment has to be darkened in order to see the projection.
We have done our best to show you a demo video with as little modification as possible.
Demo of relaxation mode - showing some example planets in the following order: 1. Earth 2.Mars 3.Jupiter 4.Venus. - light on to see the setup.

 

Demo of sleep mode: Here you see first the 5-5 breathing technique with counter (still mirrored / mockup), then without counter. Next sequence is the 4-7-8 breathing technique with counter (still mirrored / mockup), then without counter – light on to see the setup.

story:
When you think about it, it makes sense... they make millions from cables with an average life expectancy of 3-6 months. If your IronWire lasts 5 years, they lose as much as 10 TIMES their revenues!

So help us disrupt the market place and put an end to bad cables. You're also helping save the world by reducing waste product in landfill!

      

 

We've developed the first cable ever to overcome excessive stress at the connector ends

How've we improved?

Well, since our first ever campaign we've taken feedback from all of our users and gone back to evaluate weaknesses found in ALL cables.

We realised that no matter the brand or how strong the cable itself is, the main point of weakness for cables is the point where the connector and cable join together.

 

With a second layer of tough, flexible plastic right through the connector joint we've stopped excessive wear which provides unparalleled strength.

  

 

Share & Comment to win! 1 winner EVERY DAY!

   

                             

"Lightning fast" customer response

after all, our successes are thanks to you...

so we endeavour to surpass expectations in customer service as well as the products themselves

 

See more of our product reviews for IronWire 1

 

  

 

  

  

 

  

  

We are proud to continue improving our products, striving toward being a brand synonymous with strength and reliability.

The cables have been rigorously tested, pulled, and haven withstood over 50,000 bends, making them the best performing cables ever.

Share & Comment to win! 1 winner EVERY DAY!

 

Echo named entrepreneur of the year at St James' Palace, London by HRH Prince Andrew

celebrated as a brand to watch, with growing sales in the US, Europe and Asia

story:
Pouff3D Scanner - Product Description

We created the most optimal home 3D scanner with parameters: it’s efficient, it looks good and it’s inexpensive.

All you need is a fairly new smart phone. 

In comparison to 3D scanners costing many times more, Pouff3D provides the same accurate rendition with a 1mm precision.  

Pouff3D reproduces surface colours well.

Pouff3D works with smart phones, you can use your cell phone’s camera offline and the application developed by us for your phone. There is no need to connect your phone to the computer and make calculations in cloud. The application is simple, you don't need to be an expert. It is also compatible with any type of 3D printing devices. This application turns the digitallised material into widely known formats.

The reason why Pouff3D is different is because it does not use a disk to turn around objects. This opens the way to scan objects or shapes that traditional scanners have not been able to handle until now.

Beside its uniqueness, Pouff3D is also a fashionable decor in your home so it will not be in the way. It is a piece of furniture: you can use it as a chair.

Pouff3D will not fall into disuse in a couple of years time. As smart phones develop you change them - but this scanner stays with you. It will renew alongside the new softwares and phones from year to year.

Before the scanning procedure, the software calibrates your phone’s best features so the hardwares used during scanning adjust to your phone. Following the scanning, the file can be printed or may be shared on the Internet, even from your phone.

How Can This Device Compete in Knowledge and Precision with Systems Costing 10 Times More?

  • Creative approach  
  • The highest knowledge in image creation  
  • A developed unique structured light device  

Based on all these, high quality and modelling software development. We have University background for technological development.

Why Is the Approach Unique and Creative?

  • The blend of an everyday home object and modern technology
  • More than one function in a desing chosen by you
  • Beside the design, a full-value scanning function with high technical content
  • This device will not become outdated

Pouff3D works the same any flatbed scanners: after placing the object inside, the lid is closed. During scanning the object is invisible to us, we do not hold it in our hands.

Our aim is the avoid trembling hands holding a camera or trying to compensate the movement of the object with special optics, and avoid a software using up a lot of memory space or size precision measured in centimeters. These all rise the cost of the dimensionally accurate scanner.

We have created the right, well researched conditions to use your smart phone camera and hardware for good quality, accurate 3D scanning.

And all these in a cool and stylish object.

What Are the Limits?

Size

True, you cannot scan a bus but it is also impossible to print a bus with a home printer.

Talking seriously: at first we plan to manufacture a one size pouffe with different decor and design. With one size it is possible to optimalise, to define the space needed for the pouffe, its price, and functionality.

Accuracy and Colour Rendering

It depends on your phone optics.

If you are not planning to change your phone soon but wish to maintain the high level of dimensional accuracy and colour rendering, you may be interested in the version with separate optics. In this case costs of the separate optics will be built into the price.

The Seat of the Team

The company’s seat is in Sarasota, Florida.  We plan to supply the US market with our products from there. However, the development and technical support is in Europe. Product assembly is carried out in both places, depending on the place of delivery. We look for solutions to provide an optimal customer supply.

Quality Guarantee

Product assembly for the US market is carried out in the USA. Also, as our aim is to provide the best quality possible, we constantly test the parts for the final product. We seek out partners, suppliers and assembly shops who can provide the high level of service and high quality material used in manufacturing. The hardware parts are put to strict testing and we look into suggestions that could make the Pouff3D better and more stable.

Prototype

During the development of the scanner we constantly carry out experiments concerning the hardware and software performance. The current device creates good-quality 3D objects based on cell phone photos. Research have shown that the final quality depends on the accuracy and optical design of the cell phone camera. With the best optical sensor, precision of less than 1mm is possible. Based on experiments with the photos of an iPhone 4, we can say that a precision of 1-2mm is achieved when rendering an object.

The goal of this funding campaign is to build a better prototype.

The first mechanical results are soon to be published. The movement of the cell phone in the prototype is carried out with pre-set parameters. However, our plan is to achieve the control of mechanical movement, using the bluetooth communication channel.

The design has a key role. We believe that when buying a product for the home, it is right to expect an aesthetic experience. We plan to provide a pouffe that is available in different designs, made of different materials. Our aim is to provide a piece of furniture that is not only functional but is a perfect decoration of any home. 

To achieve that, we look forward to any feedback on the product apperance.

Check out our current designs:

We will send a Pouff3D T-shirt for all supporters over $25.

The development, Milestones and Dates

The development is currently ongoing, the next steps will be determined by the tests on the prototype. The planned schedule:

  • Finallising the design: July 31 2014
  • Finallising the mechanical hardware, defining and testing parts and materials: September 30 2014
  • Finallising the software: December 15 2014
  • Choosing suppliers: December 15 2014
  • Starting the manufacturing: January 15 2015
  • Fulfilling first orders: Mid April 2015 

Pricing

Our aim is is to keep the price around $500.

Due to the design and pouffe-function it is a piece of furniture that could be a great decoration of anyone’s home. Its strenght lies in its multifunctionality, as it blends the currently available highest technology with design. Also, currently available 3D scanners have not been developed for home-use. This is the first affordable 3D scanner in the world suitable for home-use.

Description

We came up with the idea of the scanner 4-5 years ago. András started thinking about how 3D scanners could become available to anyone for an affordable price and what ways a 3D scanner could be used. It was not the right time at that point to make such devices, the technology, softwares and hardwares were not at the right level. About 1 year ago we took up on the idea again, seeing how cell phone and hardware manufacturers tried to bring 3D closer to people. We looked into our opportunities and the tools available. We realised that there are devices of very good quality but they are all aimed at indulstrial users and they are all ugly. We wanted to bring this technology into people’s home but not the version in a grey or black metal case with cables hanging out on all sides. This is where design came into the picture. We though of the pouffe to achive all this.

Also, we wanted to break with the working tradition of table 3D scanners that turn around the object and only check the sides of the objects. Our aim was to create a scanner that scans the object  from all sides without moving it. The best solution is when we “go around the object” instead of moving it.

What we aim to achieve:

  • High level of technnology,
  • A product that is available for people too - cheap and simple
  • Something that looks good
  • Something that is cool and stylish

We believe we can fulfil this criterion. The tests show promising results, the feedback is also positive. We have received help and encouragement so far.

story:
Hot-Dock Station and Hot-Dock Wall are beautiful docking stations for all smartphones and tablets.

Hot-Dock Station and Hot-Dock Wall are beautiful docking stations for all smartphones and tablets that will keep the clutter away while you charge. No more tangled cords and jiggling stands, with Hot-Dock you can safely charge your device, with its cover, and then pick it up when you are ready to go.

Hot-Dock Station
Tiered of all the cable clutter? Want to keep using your device while it’s charging? Hot-Dock Station is the perfect solution for you!

A charging dock and stand, Hot-Dock Station holds your smartphone or tablet on any surface in both portrait and landscape positions, allowing you to keep working without interrupting the charge.


Compatible with ALL smartphones and tablets with or without the cover

Hot-Dock Station is compatible with all smartphones and tablets, including iPhones, iPads, Android phones, Android tablets, Windows Phones, Surface, and more. You can even keep the covers on!

Secure tab holds the device firmly in place
With Hot-Dock Station you can keep working with your device while it’s charging. A versatile secure tab holds the device firmly in place with or without its cover, while allowing access to the screen and “Home” button. The device can be placed in both portrait and landscape positions.

No tangled cords
Hot-Dock Station keeps all the clutter away from your desk. The cord is safely wrapped on a special holder at the back, eliminating any annoying tangled cords.

Seamless docking and undocking
Since the cord is safely wrapped in the back, all you have to do is place your device and then pick it up when you are ready to go. No more connecting and disconnecting cables, it’s that easy.

Affordable price
Hot-Dock is designed to be sold at a very affordable price. This means you can buy one for your desk, for the coffee table, nightstand, kitchen, and more.

Five awesome colors to choose from
Just pick your favor color.





You have a socket but no surface to place your device while it’s charging? Don’t worry, Hot-Dock Wall will hold it for you.
A wall charging dock, Hot-Dock Wall lets you charge your device directly on a wall, without any tangled cords.



Choose your favorite color:


compatible with all smartphones




Your amazing Rewards:

Early birds (first 100 only) - Pledge 8$ or more and get with your pledge one Hot-Dock Station with the color of your choice.

Early birds (first 100 only) - Pledge 8$ or more and get with your pledge one Hot-Dock Wall with the color of your choice

Pledge 10$ or more and get with your pledge one Hot-Dock Station with the color of your choice.

Pledge 10$ or more and get with your pledge one Hot-Dock Wall with the color of your choice

Early birds (first 50 only) - Pledge 22$ or more and get with your pledge one Hot-Dock Wall + Hot-Dock Station Plus extra Hot-Dock Wall or Hot-Dock Station with the color of your choice.

Pledge 25$ or more and get with your pledge one Hot-Dock Wall + Hot-Dock Station Plus extra Hot-Dock Wall or Hot-Dock Station with the color of your choice.

Early birds (first 50 only) - Pledge 25$ or more and get with your pledge the triple pack Bondi family which include a Bondi, Bandi and the Mini Bondi with the color of your choice. (Please watch the next video)

Pledge 30$ or more and get with your pledge the triple pack Bondi family which include a Bondi, Bandi and the Mini Bondi with the color of your choice.



Watch the Bondi family video:

http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=rYC4A9IrrNk&feature=c4-overview&list=UUz0cOxNa7RrLwh_pYsj-uNQ



Thank you!


Risks and challenges

Thanks to the simplicity of the design we do not expect too many unforeseen challenges when going into full steam production. We have actually already produced a small batch of items to ensure our quality expectations are met when increasing production quantities.

story:
DEUTSCH ⎜ ENGLISH

Stolpersteine in München: Vorgeschichte

Die Nationalsozialisten haben während 1933 und 1945 elf Millionen Menschen ermordet: Juden, Homosexuelle, politische Gegner, Sinti und Roma, sowie Behinderte und andere Menschen, die nicht dem rassistischen Ideal entsprachen.

Stolpersteine wurden ins Leben gerufen, damit keiner der elf Millionen Menschen je vergessen wird.

Stolpersteine sind 10 x 10 x 10 cm große, in Beton gegossene Steine mit einer an der Oberseite verankerten Messingplatte, die dort in den Gehsteigen verlegt werden, wo diese Menschen lebten, bevor sie verschleppt, deportiert und ermordet wurden. Auf den Stolpersteinen sind die Namen der Opfer, sowie Geburts- und Todestag, sowie der Ort der Ermordung eingehämmert.

Inzwischen gibt es über 40'000 Stolpersteine in nahezu 1100 Städten in 16 Ländern Europas.

Jedoch nicht in München, wo der Nazi-Terror begann und die NSDAP ihre ersten Wurzeln schlug.

2004 hat der Stadtrat die Verlegung von Stolpersteinen auf öffentlichem Grund im Stadtgebiet verboten. Wenige Stunden nach dieser Entscheidung wurden die 13 zuvor verlegten Stolpersteine durch Angestellte der Stadt hastig aus dem Boden gerissen. Ohne Rücksicht auf die Gefühle der Angehörigen der Opfer, denen es ein tiefes Anliegen war, ihrer Eltern, Goßeltern oder Geschwister einen Ort des Gedenkens zu geben.

Seit diesem schwarzen Tag kämpft die Initiative "Stolpersteine für München e.V." gemeinsam mit Münchner Bürgern gegen den unfaßbaren Stadtratsbeschluss und hat dabei zahlreiche Gemeinderäte im Münchner Umland, sowie vier von fünf Parteien in München auf ihrer Seite.

Zwischenzeitlich wurden 221 Stolpersteine hergestellt und 24 konnten auf privatem Grund nahe des Gehsteiges verlegt werden. 197 Stolpersteine warten auf ihre Verlegung. Über 5000 Opfer des Holocaust warten auf ihr Mahnmal.

Dokumentationsprojekt für Stolpersteine

Mit unserer Dokumentation werden wir noch in diesem Jahr ein digitales Mahnmal für diese Opfer errichten.

Die von uns entwickelte Smartphone-App funktioniert folgendermaßen:

Kommt der Benutzer der App am ehemaligen Wohnort eines der Opfer vorbei, wird ihm dies durch einen Ton oder Vibration signalisiert. Die App wird dann - wie ein Stolperstein auch - Namen, Geburts- und Todestag, sowie den Ort, wo der Mensch ermordet wurde, anzeigen. Die App wird diese Daten um eine kurze Biographie, das Schicksal des Einzelnen und seiner Familie, zusammen mit einem Foto - soweit vorhanden - anzeigen.

Eine Übersichtskarte zeigt die Positionen und führen den Benutzer an die entsprechende Stelle. Doch auch von zu Hause oder außerhalb von München können diese digitalen Stolpersteine angeklickt und die Biographien gelesen werden.

Für Touristen, Münchner Bürger, Historiker, Schulklassen und kommende Generationen ist die App ein hervorragendes Werkzeug gegen das Vergessen. Und sie wird ein Mahnmal sein, dass so etwas nie wieder geschehen darf.

Was wir brauchen

Mit Erreichen unseres Finanzierungsziels können wir die erste Version der APP programmieren, die das Schicksal von 221 Menschen dokumentiert, für die es bereits Stolpersteine gibt, die jedoch bis zur Verlegung eingelagert oder ausgestellt sind.

3000 EUR benötigen wir für die Programmierung der ersten APP-Version

2210 EUR (10 EUR pro Stein) benötigen wir für die Erstellung der ersten 221 Biographien.

Über das Finanzierungsziel hinaus werden wir für jeweils 10 EUR pro Stein ein weiteres Schicksal recherchieren, eine Biographie und redaktionelle Begleittexte erstellen und diese in der APP veröffentlichen. Mit dem Ziel, den über 4000 Opfern des Nationalsozialismus in München ein elektronisches Denkmal zu setzen.

Jeder kann mithelfen, unserem Vorhaben Leben einzuhauchen. Innerhalb der APP wird es in einer späteren Version die Möglichkeit geben, für weitere Dokumentationsseiten zu spenden. 

Jede Spende bedeutet, dass das Gedenken an einen weiteren Menschen am Leben erhalten werden kann.

Unser Ziel

Mit unserer APP wollen wir das Schicksal der NS-Opfer ins Bewußtsein der Öffentlichkeit rücken, den Opfern ein Gesicht und eine Biographie geben und vor allem junge Menschen, die erfahrungsgemäß zu den engagiertesten Unterstützern der Stolpersteine gehören, weiter für das Thema zu sensibilisieren.

Vielen Münchnern ist das Projekt "Stolpersteine" unbekannt, da sie diese noch nie gesehen haben, außer in anderen Städten. Und das möchten wir ändern.

Damit ist die Stolpersteine APP auch eine Form des Widerstands gegen das Verbot durch den Stadtrat, denn digitale Stolpersteine kann man weder verbieten, noch entfernen.

Weitere Wege, wie man helfen kann

Erzählen Sie möglichst vielen Freunden und Verwandten von unserem Vorhaben, posten Sie den Link zu unserer Kampagne auf Facebook, Twitter etc.:

http://igg.me/at/stolpersteine

Wenn Sie Journalist sind oder Kontakte zur Presse oder den Medien haben, freuen wir uns natürlich über entsprechende Publicity.

Stolpersteine sind Zeichen des Erinnerns.

Mit Ihrem Beitrag geben Sie der Erinnerung einen Namen, ein Gesicht, eine Biographie.

Helfen Sie uns dabei, die Erinnerung an eine Frau, einen Mann oder ein Kind am Leben zu erhalten.

 

 

ENGLISH

Stolpersteine

The Nazis murdered during their reign of terror – 1933 – 1945 - 11 million people – Jews, homosexuals, dissidents, Sinti and Roma, and other groups. Stolpersteine have been created to make sure that none of these 11 million individuals is forgotten.

“Stolpersteine” is German for “stumbling blocks”, and that is precisely what they are: brass-topped concrete blocks some 10 cm x 10 cm in size that are placed in the sidewalks in front of the buildings where the people they are commemorating lived before being dragged off to their places of death.

Engraved in the brass plaque is the name, date of birth and place of death or deportation of the individual being commemorated.

There are now 40,000 Stolpersteine. They are found in nearly 1100 cities in 16 countries.

But not in Munich, even though it the city was where the Nazi party was founded and gained strength.

Stolpersteine: banned in Munich

In 2004, Munich’s municipal council banned the placing of Stolpersteine on public property – the city’s sidewalks. A few hours after this hasty and ill-conceived decision, 13 Stolpersteine – installed at the express and heartfelt wish of relatives of the victims – were ripped out of their sidewalks.

Ever since then, "Stolpersteine für München e.V." initiative has spearheaded a broad-ranging coalition fighting to get this decision rescinded. A number of borough councils and four of the five major political parties have joined prominent figures from intellectual and business life in calling for a revoking of the decision.

Meanwhile, under the initiative’s auspices, more than 230 Stolpersteine have been created. Twenty-three have been placed on private property adjoining sidewalks, the rest await their installment.

This means that over 5,000 victims of the Shoah are waiting to be commemorated.

Stolpersteine Documentation Project

Our Stolpersteine smartphone app will create a digital memorial for these victims.

The app will work like this. The user of the app will be alerted by it when she or he is approaching the place of final residence of a victim of the Shoah. The app will display the name, picture and short biography of the victim, with this including her or his fate.

The Stolpersteine app will also display a clickable map. It will provide an overview of where present and potential Stolpersteine sites are located in Munich, thus guiding users to them.

This app will thus be a powerful tool for researchers and for schools, which will use it to go on tours commemorating the victims and thus warning against a revival of such persecution.

What we need

As soon as we have reached our financing goal, we can start programming the initial version of our app, which will include the biographies of the some 230 people for whom a Stolperstein has been created.

  • We will need 3000 EUR for the programming of the first app version, and

  • 2210 EUR (10 EUR per Stolperstein) for the 221 biographies

Anything above that will be used to fund our long-term goal of creating electronic memorials for all of Munich’s victims of the Shoah.

Use our app to donate

You can use our app to donate for

A person or persons

A place in which the victims lived prior to being deported.

What your donation does

It keeps alive the memory of a person who suffered persecution, hardship and death.

It keeps alive the memory of the Shoah itself, especially for young persons, who are among the most dedicated supporters of Stolpersteine.

It tells people in Munich – many of whom have never had an opportunity to do such – that there are such things as Stolpersteine. And the electronic Stolpersteine can’t be banned or ripped out of sidewalks.

Other ways you can help

Get the word out! Tell your friends, family and the media about our project, and post the link to our campaign on Facebook, Twitter or whatever social media you are using:

http://igg.me/at/stolpersteine

DEUTSCH ⎜ ENGLISH


Stolpersteine in München: Vorgeschichte
Die Nationalsozialisten haben während 1933 und 1945 elf Millionen Menschen ermordet: Juden, Homosexuelle, politische Gegner, Sinti und Roma, sowie Behinderte und andere Menschen, die nicht dem rassistischen Ideal entsprachen.
Stolpersteine wurden ins Leben gerufen, damit keiner der elf Millionen Menschen je vergessen wird.
Stolpersteine sind 10 x 10 x 10 cm große, in Beton gegossene Steine mit einer an der Oberseite verankerten Messingplatte, die dort in den Gehsteigen verlegt werden, wo diese Menschen lebten, bevor sie verschleppt, deportiert und ermordet wurden. Auf den Stolpersteinen sind die Namen der Opfer, sowie Geburts- und Todestag, sowie der Ort der Ermordung eingehämmert.
Inzwischen gibt es über 40'000 Stolpersteine in nahezu 1100 Städten in 16 Ländern Europas.
Jedoch nicht in München, wo der Nazi-Terror begann und die NSDAP ihre ersten Wurzeln schlug.
2004 hat der Stadtrat die Verlegung von Stolpersteinen auf öffentlichem Grund im Stadtgebiet verboten. Wenige Stunden nach dieser Entscheidung wurden die 13 zuvor verlegten Stolpersteine durch Angestellte der Stadt hastig aus dem Boden gerissen. Ohne Rücksicht auf die Gefühle der Angehörigen der Opfer, denen es ein tiefes Anliegen war, ihrer Eltern, Goßeltern oder Geschwister einen Ort des Gedenkens zu geben.
Seit diesem schwarzen Tag kämpft die Initiative "Stolpersteine für München e.V." gemeinsam mit Münchner Bürgern gegen den unfaßbaren Stadtratsbeschluss und hat dabei zahlreiche Gemeinderäte im Münchner Umland, sowie vier von fünf Parteien in München auf ihrer Seite.
Zwischenzeitlich wurden 221 Stolpersteine hergestellt und 24 konnten auf privatem Grund nahe des Gehsteiges verlegt werden. 197 Stolpersteine warten auf ihre Verlegung. Über 5000 Opfer des Holocaust warten auf ihr Mahnmal.
Dokumentationsprojekt für Stolpersteine
Mit unserer Dokumentation werden wir noch in diesem Jahr ein digitales Mahnmal für diese Opfer errichten.
Die von uns entwickelte Smartphone-App funktioniert folgendermaßen:
Kommt der Benutzer der App am ehemaligen Wohnort eines der Opfer vorbei, wird ihm dies durch einen Ton oder Vibration signalisiert. Die App wird dann - wie ein Stolperstein auch - Namen, Geburts- und Todestag, sowie den Ort, wo der Mensch ermordet wurde, anzeigen. Die App wird diese Daten um eine kurze Biographie, das Schicksal des Einzelnen und seiner Familie, zusammen mit einem Foto - soweit vorhanden - anzeigen.
Eine Übersichtskarte zeigt die Positionen und führen den Benutzer an die entsprechende Stelle. Doch auch von zu Hause oder außerhalb von München können diese digitalen Stolpersteine angeklickt und die Biographien gelesen werden.
Für Touristen, Münchner Bürger, Historiker, Schulklassen und kommende Generationen ist die App ein hervorragendes Werkzeug gegen das Vergessen. Und sie wird ein Mahnmal sein, dass so etwas nie wieder geschehen darf.
Was wir brauchen
Mit Erreichen unseres Finanzierungsziels können wir die erste Version der APP programmieren, die das Schicksal von 221 Menschen dokumentiert, für die es bereits Stolpersteine gibt, die jedoch bis zur Verlegung eingelagert oder ausgestellt sind.
3000 EUR benötigen wir für die Programmierung der ersten APP-Version
2210 EUR (10 EUR pro Stein) benötigen wir für die Erstellung der ersten 221 Biographien.
Über das Finanzierungsziel hinaus werden wir für jeweils 10 EUR pro Stein ein weiteres Schicksal recherchieren, eine Biographie und redaktionelle Begleittexte erstellen und diese in der APP veröffentlichen. Mit dem Ziel, den über 4000 Opfern des Nationalsozialismus in München ein elektronisches Denkmal zu setzen.
Jeder kann mithelfen, unserem Vorhaben Leben einzuhauchen. Innerhalb der APP wird es in einer späteren Version die Möglichkeit geben, für weitere Dokumentationsseiten zu spenden. 
Jede Spende bedeutet, dass das Gedenken an einen weiteren Menschen am Leben erhalten werden kann.
Unser Ziel
Mit unserer APP wollen wir das Schicksal der NS-Opfer ins Bewußtsein der Öffentlichkeit rücken, den Opfern ein Gesicht und eine Biographie geben und vor allem junge Menschen, die erfahrungsgemäß zu den engagiertesten Unterstützern der Stolpersteine gehören, weiter für das Thema zu sensibilisieren.
Vielen Münchnern ist das Projekt "Stolpersteine" unbekannt, da sie diese noch nie gesehen haben, außer in anderen Städten. Und das möchten wir ändern.
Damit ist die Stolpersteine APP auch eine Form des Widerstands gegen das Verbot durch den Stadtrat, denn digitale Stolpersteine kann man weder verbieten, noch entfernen.
Weitere Wege, wie man helfen kann
Erzählen Sie möglichst vielen Freunden und Verwandten von unserem Vorhaben, posten Sie den Link zu unserer Kampagne auf Facebook, Twitter etc.:
http://igg.me/at/stolpersteine
Wenn Sie Journalist sind oder Kontakte zur Presse oder den Medien haben, freuen wir uns natürlich über entsprechende Publicity.
Stolpersteine sind Zeichen des Erinnerns.
Mit Ihrem Beitrag geben Sie der Erinnerung einen Namen, ein Gesicht, eine Biographie.
Helfen Sie uns dabei, die Erinnerung an eine Frau, einen Mann oder ein Kind am Leben zu erhalten.

story:
LATEST DEVELOPMENTS

Our devices have gone from strength to strength, as we improve them every day to bring you the best experience possible. 

Here is a brief summary of the improvements made so far:

  1. Redesign of the internal mechanics, improving efficiency and minimising problems.
  2. New ergonomic exterior styling designed to improve usability for both genders.
  3. Improved product names, Onyx and Pearl.
  4. All new packaging, styled with adults in mind.
  5. Improved connection for our worldwide platform chat experience.
  6. Bigger, better, stronger team with content writers, designers, researchers and social media experts.
  7. Brand new website. Check out all our articles!

 

PRODUCT IMAGES


Social media is now an ever-present part of how we perceive and use the internet. We do notice the novelty is wearing of fast. So time to permanently add an extra dimension to social networking. 


Kiiroo will add a tactile substance to social media. Our mission is to give members the world over the chance to actually touch their partners online. 

We offer a highly personalised social platform that let's you experience flirtatious and adventurous sensations that quench more than your thirst for lust. Share what matters to you and select potential partners based on similarities in taste and overall view on life. Seeking intimacy is a part of who we are as humans.


We at Kiiroo are the young souls that are fascinated by the opportunities supplied by our new technology driven world.

Kiiroo will set out to launch a private social platform along sides a luxurious line of devices that enables you to physically touch another person online. 

Kiiroo has been given shape by a passionate crew of tech enthusiasts based in Amsterdam, the global capital of liberal values!

It’s a good thing Kiiroo a has passion for Gadgets and Gadgets for passion!

Kiiroo can be described as the next generation of designer intimacy hardware. We will be the first to pioneer the combination of a secure  social platform with exciting, intimate, playful electronics. 

Kiiroo is now in it’s pre-production phase. This means we have working prototypes ready which are optimized to go into production at a moments notice . We have design documents in place to have our social media platform constructed. You can give us the last push! And help us secure a bright future for social media! 



Kiiroo Platform. Where all the magic happens.

Kiiroo offers a social platform where you can share content to your heart’s desire. Add comments, write rich blog posts, and post media that reflects your personality. Potential partners will value you for who you are as a person. When you hit it off, Kiiroo also allows you to experience actual intimacy. 

Social media, as it is now, only speaks to our eyes and ears. What if we could add touch to the equation. We feel that being able to touch your partner is a crucial part of what keeps a comfortable level of intimacy going throughout a long distance relationship. 

Kiiroo SVir. The male masturbator.

The male devices, send and receives date activating our patented Kiiroo’s ring technology. A set of eight contracting rings in SVir, concave the movement of the OPue in real time. evoking actual physical touch. Whether it is a female to male connection, male to male, or female to multiple male devices.

Kiiroo OPue. The female vibrator. 

A sleek Vibrator, carefully designed to satisfy your needs. while registering your every movement, by using the technology of capacitive touch. much like a smartphone screen, OPue senses skin contact and movement and sends it to the Kiiroo Platform.







* How do I clean the SVir device?

We created the SVir with an easy to remove rubber inlay, similar to a condom. This one can be turned inside out and be washed with water. 

* What language is Kiiroo written in?

C, Python, Java, Javascript, PhP

Of course some scripts are purely intended for use on the devices, others for the platform and some for the communication between, platform and devices. For that we use Python.

* How long does it take to connect?

The connection is near instantaneous (less than 3 seconds in ideal conditions). 

* What is the latency?

Short: Around 250ms in ideal conditions

Long: Latency is a difficult one. There are some factors which affect the overall latency. Some of them can be controlled by us, but some can’t. There is a given network latency which can vary quite a lot depending on the quality of the network, there is latency for decoding the received image, and finally there is latency.

Based on research and testing, we can say that around 250ms is acceptable for normal use. As you see, we are trying our best to reduce the latency, but there are factors that our out of our control.

* Power for the KIIROO devices + dongle?

The devices will be charged through an USB cable, which can be done through the computer or directly in the wall socket. The dongle will be powered through the USB connector and does not need any external charging, only the computer power to function.

* Will there be an SDK?

Kiiroo has been written carefully with modularity in mind. The base of both the streamer and the receiver application are two shared libraries, which could be integrated into 3rd party products relatively easily.

As for an official SDK, we have it on our roadmap, depending on the Indiegogo funding round, if it be with the first release.

* Are you planning Android/iOS support?

We don't have an iOS/Android app planned for the initial release. It is on our roadmap though.

story:
Project Update:11/26/2013 - Pursuant to the inputs from some of the experts in opensource community, we have removed the source code perk and decided to release the final deliverable in launchpad on AGPL V3.0 license.


We are developing a native Android application that works seamlessly with OpenERP v7.0, to release it free on Google play store. Our vision is a state of the art, yet simple and clean app that makes available interesting features from the core modules of OpenERP and more -- that makes sense to enable 'work-on-the-move’ from a smartphone/tablet.

Our purpose of doing this:

Our own experience with using OpenERP, interaction with various customers and the understanding of their business workflow has made us realize the pressing need for a fully functional and hassle-free mobile app for OpenERP. Through this build, we intend to bring about a significant positive impact on the way SMBs use mobile ERP – an area which is dominated by big players at the moment. 

  • We have taken up this exciting challenge to contribute to the community to a greater extent, as our experience and expertise with the system is solid. This has brought us here..

Please join hands with us to make 'OpenERP Mobile’ – A Reality!

Who we are:

It has been over 4 years now that Confianz has been working on OpenERP -- one of the fastest growing and best available opensource ERP systems. We have dug down on advanced customization on all major modules, integration with third party systems and module development to tailor the system for a variety of verticals.

Our plan in a nutshell:

The OpenERP community envisions building a complete responsive design for the web interface which will work well on handheld devices for v8.0. While it is a great and welcome move, yet the inability to work during lack of internet connectivity will be a cause of concern. Our focus is a native application with an in memory database "sqlite" and intelligent sync mechanism which ensures that people on the move like sales guys, field officers, supervisors etc. can efficiently use ERP on a smartphone or tablet to get their work done. 

Feature Overview:


  • A clean user interface that would be simple to use and navigate
  • Local data storing and syncing with server in the absence of internet connectivity for selected modules
  • Enable Sales team, HR team, Purchase & Warehouse operations the flexibility and ease of mobility
  • Build with a view to scale for use with v8.0.


What We Need and What You Get:

The amount required for the complete development will be 50,000USD. When we say all major modules working in harmony, we mean it and are up on our toes with the initial homework on the build. We look forward to raising 30,000USD through this community funding. Please see complete features list on the attached file on this campaign. 

When it comes to OpenERP mobile app, trials on the existing few on app stores have revealed a tough ride on installation and a difficult experience for use with OpenERP v7.0. Hence, the community is still on the look-out for a complete app for the awesome web ERP that OpenERP has proved to be.

The funds raised through this campaign will primarily be used for the design, development and testing of the mobile application so as to achieve the level of performance and perfection expected of an efficient mobile ERP system.

Contributors will be provided with early access to all releases and future updates.

Here is a breakdown of what our goal accomplishes and what we would do if we hit stretch goals:

1) 25% - We have to confine ourselves to building only the CRM modules, until we find alternative funding sources

2) 50% - We will stretch out to do HR module also 

3) 100% - All the features mentioned in the features pdf

4) 125% - We will work on 6.1 version compatibility as well

5) If we raise more than 125%, we will start working on an iOS version as well.


Will the source code be free?

Yes, the OpenERP Mobile App source code will be released on AGPL V3.0 license. Source code can be downloaded from launchpad. 


Will the application be free?

The OpenERP Mobile App will be released free which means, any releases and improvements will be open to all on the Google play store.

When the system will be released?

We look forward to a sharp take-off ,making the most of the funding achieved. If we are not able to completely reach our goal for funding, we would first build  with minimal features that would form the basis of a clean start as a fore-runner to emerging with the ultimate solution. But we will make sure no stone is left unturned in fulfilling our vision of building the complete app.

Who all are benefited?

Whether you use OpenERP to manage your business or you are an OpenERP developer/consultant/enthusiast, it will be great to have a fully loaded and working mobile app.

Other Ways You Can Help

While we welcome you to join hands with us on our mission and to help fund the app build, there are other ways also, by which you can help and support us. Below are some options:

1) You can share our word through social networks or talk to your friends/relatives/co-workers/boss who might be interested. We do have a Twitter, Linkedin and Facebook pages, so tweet, like and share us at the links alongside.

2) If you can use the indiegogo tools to share about the mission, we would always appreciate it. 

3) If you are a graphic designer, a content writer or know foreign language, you can express interest to help us spread word effectively once we have completed the build. If you can help with translating the app to another language, we will appreciate that.

4) If there is any out-of-the box idea or functionality that you would suggest for the mobile users, please do not hesitate to write to us at: openerpmobile@confianzit.biz

Please like us on Facebook to see daily updates on the app.

Thanks,

Confianz Team
story_txt:
Project Update:11/26/2013 - Pursuant to the inputs from some of the experts in opensource community, we have removed the source code perk and decided to release the final deliverable in launchpad on AGPL V3.0 license.We are developing a native Android application that works seamlessly with OpenERP v7.0, to release it free on Google play store.
Our vision is a state of the art, yet simple and clean app that makes available
interesting features from the core modules of OpenERP and more -- that makes
sense to enable 'work-on-the-move’ from a smartphone/tablet.Our purpose of doing this:
Our own experience with using OpenERP, interaction with various
customers and the understanding of their business workflow has made us realize
the pressing need for a fully functional and hassle-free mobile app for
OpenERP. Through this build, we intend to bring about a significant positive impact
on the way SMBs use mobile ERP – an area which is dominated by big players at
the moment. We have taken up this exciting challenge to contribute to the community to a greater extent, as our experience and expertise with the system
is solid. This has brought us here..Please join hands with us to make 'OpenERP Mobile’ – A Reality!
Who we are:
It has been over 4 years now that Confianz has been working on
OpenERP -- one of the fastest growing and best available opensource ERP systems.
We have dug down on advanced customization on all major modules, integration
with third party systems and module development to tailor the system for a
variety of verticals. 
Our plan in a nutshell:
The OpenERP community envisions building a complete responsive
design for the web interface which will work well on handheld devices for v8.0.
While it is a great and welcome move, yet the inability to work during lack of internet connectivity
will be a cause of concern. Our focus is a native application
with an in memory database "sqlite" and
intelligent sync mechanism which ensures that people on the move like
sales guys, field officers, supervisors etc. can efficiently use ERP on a
smartphone or tablet to get their work done. 
Feature Overview:

A clean user interface that would be simple to use and navigate
Local data storing and syncing with server in the absence of internet connectivity for selected modules 
Enable Sales team, HR team, Purchase & Warehouse operations the flexibility and ease of mobility 
Build with a view to scale for use with v8.0.


What We Need and What You Get:
The amount required for the complete development will be
50,000USD. When we say all major modules working in harmony, we mean it and are
up on our toes with the initial homework on the build. We look forward to raising 30,000USD through this community funding. Please see complete features list on the attached file on this campaign. 
When it comes to OpenERP mobile app, trials on the existing few on app stores have revealed
a tough ride on installation and a difficult experience for use with OpenERP v7.0. Hence, the community is still on the look-out for a complete app
for the awesome web ERP that OpenERP has proved to be.
The funds raised through this campaign will primarily be used
for the design, development and testing of the mobile application so as to
achieve the level of performance and perfection expected of an efficient mobile
ERP system.
Contributors will be provided with early access to all releases and future updates.
Here is a breakdown of what our goal accomplishes and what we would do if we hit stretch goals:1) 25% - We have to confine ourselves to building only the CRM modules, until we find alternative funding sources2) 50% - We will stretch out to do HR module also 3) 100% - All the features mentioned in the features pdf4) 125% - We will work on 6.1 version compatibility as well5) If we raise more than 125%, we will start working on an iOS version as well.Will the source code be free?Yes, the OpenERP Mobile App source code will be released on AGPL V3.0 license. Source code can be downloaded from launchpad. Will the application be free?
The OpenERP Mobile App will be released free which means, any releases and improvements will be open to all on the Google play store.
When the system will be released?
We look forward to a sharp take-off ,making the most of the
funding achieved. If we are not able to completely reach our goal for funding, we would first build  with minimal features that would form the basis of a clean start as a fore-runner to emerging with the ultimate solution. But we will make sure no stone is left unturned in fulfilling our vision of building the complete app.Who all are benefited?Whether you use OpenERP to manage your business or you are an OpenERP developer/consultant/enthusiast, it will be great to have a fully loaded and working mobile app.
Other Ways You Can Help
While we welcome you to join hands with us on our mission and to help fund the app build, there are other ways also, by which you can help and support us. Below are some options:
1) You can
share our word through social networks or talk to your
friends/relatives/co-workers/boss who might be interested. We do have a Twitter, Linkedin and Facebook pages, so tweet, like and share us at the links alongside.
2) If you can use the indiegogo tools to share about the mission, we would always appreciate it. 
3) If you
are a graphic designer, a content writer or know foreign language, you can
express interest to help us spread word effectively once we have completed the
build. If you can help with translating the app to another language, we will appreciate that. 
4) If there
is any out-of-the box idea or functionality that you would suggest for the
mobile users, please do not hesitate to write to us at: openerpmobile@confianzit.bizPlease like us on Facebook to see daily updates on the app.Thanks,Confianz Team

story:
10,000 Accounts To Sponsor!


Existing Users

You already have your own SiteAutoBackup account and could use more backup space down the road. This is a good opportunity for you to do just that.

For each 1 GB backup space you sponsor, you get the same amount of free backup space added towards your own SiteAutoBackup account. How cool is that!

This applies to all SiteAutoBackup packages, including basic, reseller, and private backup server packages.

New Users

For those of you who are new to SiteAutoBackup and like to get backup coverage, this is a good opportunity for you as well. 

For each 1 GB of backup space you sponsor, you will also get the same amount of free backup space towards your own new SiteAutoBackup account.

Just open your new backup account for free directly at SiteAutoBackup.Com (no payment required). 

Then when you contribute here, we will add your backup space with the amount contributed by matching your email address. You will have no recurring payment whatsoever afterwards. Cool eh?

How does the backup work?

It works! For more than 5 years now! You can backup regular hosting accounts, reseller hosting accounts, vps hosting, dedicated servers, and even cloud based hosting platforms. 

We backup everything, including your files, databases, email accounts (and all email messages in it), logs, stats, every single hosting configuration you have. 

The best part is, you can move in to ANY cPanel web hosting provider (if you see that your current web host is not up to your standard) ANY TIME!

Never, ever, get held back by your current web host when it's time to move on.

Currently our backup service are being used by thousands of web developers, bloggers, internet marketers, web hosting resellers, web designers, and even web hosting providers who love the power and simplicity of our backup service.

Below is a short video on how it works with regular hosting accounts. 

For thorough details on how everything works with reseller hosting, vps server, dedicated server, and cloud hosting, go visit our site at https://www.siteautobackup.com



What's in it FOR ME?

More Backup Space

We already know how responsible you are by keeping in charge of your own backups. You'll get MORE backup space! We'll match the backup space you sponsor and add it to your existing or new SiteAutoBackup account. That is with no recurring charges whatsoever.

Backup Other Stuff

As an added bonus to your responsibility we will provide you with a backup account that works with your Windows PCs and Macs! You get to backup all your Windows and Mac computers as well. To get this perk, after contributing, log into your SiteAutoBackup.Com account, click on the Partner menu on top. Then click on the second drop down menu. This additional service also comes with no recurring charges whatsoever. 


More Income (if you wish)

Yes, you can resell your bonus backup space!

If you have contributed $50 or more, you are allowed to use your own bonus backup space to resell it to your own (future) customers.

Say you contribute $100, you got ALL THE TIME you need to slowly sell this 100 GB of backup space at your own pace and at your own price. 

Time is on your side. No rush.

If you made $50 or more contributions and wanted to have your account upgraded to a reseller account, drop us a line at support[at]siteautobackup.com and we'll upgrade your account.


Sponsored Accounts

You also get an opportunity to sponsor someone else who wants to be more responsible (like you) in keeping their own backups, but are lacking the funds to actually pay for a reliable backup service on top of their web hosting bill.

This is where you come into place. We will add a new backup package which we'll name 1 GB Sponsored Backup.

You get to type in your own sponsorship message with a link to your own defined web page.

For example,  on top of all the backup panel interface of the sponsored account will show: This backup account is sponsored by "Your sponsor message here combined with your link to your defined web page"

Welcome emails, backup email notices, and backup panel interfaces will be branded by your defined sponsorship message.

You can give away these free sponsored accounts to anyone you wish (your friends or customers), or just give it away to anyone who are signing up directly at SiteAutoBackup.Com (we will randomly choose a sponsor for them)

We're Not Done Yet!

If you choose to give away the sponsored accounts to your friends or customers, we will provide you with a special link for them to redeem/get their sponsored accounts.

If your sponsored account ever outgrew the 1 GB of backup space you gave them and upgrade to a larger account, you will get 50% of ALL INCOME paid by that person, for the entire life time of their account. How about that?

We strongly believe in partnership and will not waste any effort you made to make others be responsible of their own backups.

Now, we're done!

We strongly believe in partnership and will not waste any effort you made to make others be responsible of their own backups.Now, we're done!
