story:
First of all, thank you for dropping by! We appreciate it :)

Short Summary: http://numbby.com/

In a nutshell Numbby is... # + Meaning

Numbby is a free web/mobile social network where people can post numbers and give them a meaning. Here is an example of a numbby: 7 - Deadly sins of startups. Here's another one: 644 - Million websites in the world. And there's a lot more!

Our product enables people to share numbers with meaning (numbbies) with each other: information, data, statistics, percentages, etc. in a free, intuitive, modern, easy to use web and mobile app. 

There is nothing like Numbby in the market, and we believe we will revolutionize the industry with our product the way Facebook did with pictures, Twitter with text, Wikipedia with content and Pinterest or Instagram with photos, but we will do it with numbers!


What's the fuss about?

Well, this is our dream. We strongly believe in Numbby and we will make some noise! We will knock on as many doors as we need to until someone opens one. We will pitch the idea to investors until we get funding and we will strive to move people like you to feel as passionate as we do about Numbby. Our team feels that people will really enjoy Numbby and find it valuable in their day to day life. Give us the opportunity to prove it, support us, we won't let you down.


Who's involved?

A small group of passionate entrepreneurs and brilliant professionals. There's four of us, each with a unique background and a diverse set of skills. Our areas of expertise are: Design, Development, Project Management and Business. Trust us, you're in good hands :)

 

 

 

What We Need

We don't need much :) We are striving for $13,000. But that's just a starting point. If we get more that would be great because we could actually fund some advanced features we would like to include in the product that will blow your mind. If we get less then we will prioritize our needs and invest it wisely. For sure you will see the result of your contribution either way. No money will go to waste, we take any contribution big or small seriously. So of course by now you're thinking: So, what's the money for?

Well, like any tech (web/mobile) startup at least we need to cover some basic costs on this initial phase:

  • Product launch
  • Marketing and advertising
  • Continue design and development
  • Hosting
  • SSL
  • Domain name

By the way, we believe in total transparency and want you to know that we've been working on numbby for a couple of weeks now. We're almost done and need your help to finish it, launch it and continue enhancing the product.

What You Get

Some really cool perks! 

What You Will Help Achieve

A lot. Without you, numbby would have no purpose. People are the core of numbby, since only people can give numbers a meaning. Your help is greatly appreciated since it will enable us to launch the product, spread the word, market the app and continue our design and development efforts. 

Numbby is reallly valuable for the world and has a huge growth potential. It's something we need and we don't have. Have you ever had the case where you're looking for something on the web, you need it from a reliable source, you don't want to deal with long articles, text or content and want the information to be expressed in numbers? Of course you have. Sometimes you found what you needed and others you didn't. We've all wasted hours on the web trying to find statistics, percentages, information, market shares, business deals, costs, etc. from a reliable, current source. With your contribution your helping solve this problem.

Other Ways You Can Help

If you don't have any money right now or can't contribute at the moment, we understand. That's ok and there are actually other ways you can help: 

  • Help us get the word out and make some noise about this campaign.
  • Share this campaign on Facebook, Twitter, Google+ and/or LinkedIn. Wherever you prefer :) Of course the more places the better, but that's entirely up to you, no pressure.
  • Sign Up on Numbby.com, it's free!
  • Like us on Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/numbby2013
  • Follow us on Twitter: https://twitter.com/numbby2013

Finally, we want you to know that we really appreciate you taking the time to read, support, help, spread the word, etc. about our project.

Thank You!!! It's people like you who make a difference in this world.

With your contribution your helping solve this problem.


Other Ways You Can Help

Help us get the word out and make some noise about this campaign.
Share this campaign on Facebook, Twitter, Google+ and/or LinkedIn. Wherever you prefer :) Of course the more places the better, but that's entirely up to you, no pressure.
Sign Up on Numbby.com, it's free!
Like us on Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/numbby2013

Follow us on Twitter: https://twitter.com/numbby2013



Finally, we want you to know that we really appreciate you taking the time to read, support, help, spread the word, etc. about our project. 
Thank You!!! It's people like you who make a difference in this world.

story:
The Scanther Kit

Customers carrying smartphones willing to connect to your business' web and social media pages are walking out the door of your business in droves, without connecting. Moreover, walking out the door with the customer are your missed opportunities for sales, loyalty, and profit from that customer and all of their social media friends.

Why?

Signs directing customers to web and social media pages are, to put it kindly, prehistoric. Take a look around at the impossibly long Facebook URL painted on the wall of the coffee shop, or the giant homemade QR code in the window of the restaurant. More importantly, notice how many businesses have no signs at all to direct customers to their web and social media pages.

Best time to engage

The single best time to engage a happy customer on your web and social media pages is when they are at your business.

Now for the kicker - even if you are able to navigate your way to a business' web page with your smartphone, about 90% of business websites are not mobile ready. You probably already know this from your own experience.

The Scanther Kit solves ALL of these problems. Virtually every business needs at least one Scanther Kit. Simply put, if a business has or needs a website or one of the various types of social media pages, they need a Scanther Kit.

What is a Scanther Kit?

Scanther is a retail boxed kit of 5 professionally designed smart signs using NFC, QR, and SMS to drive traffic to your included Instant Mobile Site. (What is NFC, QR, & SMS? - see below). Setup is simple and you can be up and running in as few as 10 minutes. Basically, Scanther is a Smart Sign set, Text messaging campaign, and Mobile Website in a box.

 

 What is NFC?

NFC is the abbreviation for Near Field Communication. NFC is a short-range wireless connectivity technology that uses enables communication in close proximity. When a customer positions an NFC enabled smartphone near or against the “TAP” logo on your Scanther smart sign, it opens your mobile site. NFC has other uses as well. NFC is emerging technology and is currently being adopted by businesses around the world.

 What is a QR code?

QR is the abbreviation for Quick Response. A QR code is a two dimensional matrix barcode into which information can stored. When a customer with a QR reader app on their smartphone scans the QR code on your Scanther smart sign, it opens your mobile site on the web browser of the customer's smartphone. QR codes have other uses as well.

What is a SMS?

SMS is text messaging. When a customer texts from your Scanther Smart Sign, Scanther auto responds with a single text message that contains a link to your Instant Mobile Website. On smartphones with web browsers the link sent by Scanther should appear as a "hot" link so that your Instant Mobile Website will be accessed when the customer touches the link.

What’s included with the Scanther Mobile Site Builder?

Your mobile site can include the following elements, in the order you want:

  • Your logo with an optional text description area
  • Social Media and Web Buttons each with an optional annotation line
  • Custom Buttons each with an optional annotation line
  • Photos with optional captions and your Video
  • Text Area where you can write whatever you want
  • Your Address, Location Map, Hours, Events, and Contact Information
  • Email Signup and Comments so you can connect with your customers
  • Survey Questions you write so you can get direct feedback from your customers

 

 

 

 

 

Scanther Analytics

Your Scanther site comes with a robust suite of analytics so that you can see what is happening with your Smart Signs and Instant Mobile Website. Our analytics suite allows you to track how customers are engaging so you can get the most out of your web and social media campaigns.

What are the Scanther Accessories?

At this time there are two Scanther Accessories with even more on the drawing board. The Scanther Accessory price point is $59.95.

  • Scanther Table Top Signs sold in packs of 10 – these are small standalone signs that are perfect for restaurant or coffee shop table tops.
  • Scanther Decals sold in packs of 20 – these are decals, approximately the size of a business card that can be placed on menus, tables, clipboards, etc.

How much will Scanther cost?

Scanther is a retail product, in a box. The initial price point will be $69.95 which includes a one month prepaid subscription.  Each subscription month includes 100 SMS messages.  Additional SMS messages are 4 cents each. Subscriptions are $10.00 per month. There are no long term contracts.

What’s in the box?

  • (1) Scanther Acrylic Counter Sign with NFC, QR, and SMS.
  • (6) Social media and web icons for application on Counter Sign and on your window glass
  • (2) Scanther Window Clings with NFC, QR, and SMS
  • (2) Scanther Decals with NFC, QR, and SMS
  • (1) Scanther Installation Spray, (1) Squeegee, and (1) Microfiber Cloth 

Important Statistics

  • Smartphones are used by 50.4% of U.S. consumers. [Nielsen, May 2012] 
  • The top two uses of Smartphones are browsing the internet (24.81 minutes per day) and using social media (17.49 minutes per day) [O2, June 2012] 
  • Only about 10% of websites are mobile ready. [Mongoose Metrics, Feb 2012]

Where We Are Now

  • Prototype: 100% Complete
  • Sign and Icon Design: 100% Complete
  • Materials for First Production Run of 1000 Scanther Kits: 100% acquired.
  • Packaging Boxes and Materials: Packaging Boxes ordered. 
  • Packaging Artwork: Complete
  • UPC Codes: Obtained
  • Intellectual Property Rights: Both Trademark and Patent protection have been filed. All original Artwork has Copyright and Trademark designations. 
  • Website Development: 90% Complete. Estimated Completion Early March 2013.
  • Promotional Video: Complete
  • Marketing Plan: In progress. Plan will encompass mass market in the USA.

Who We Are

We are a father and two sons who love to brainstorm, create, and invent.  Michael Archuleta has a BBA, MBA, JD, and MD degree. EJ Archuleta has a BA and JD degree. Austin Archuleta is a senior engineering student with an expected graduation date of May 2013. Working together over the past 8 months the Scanther idea was hatched, refined, planned, and implemented. 

How will Scanther use funds? 

Funds will be used for completion of the website, product launch at SXSW, and opening the mass market to Scanther in the USA. Important secondary goals are to open mass markets for Scanther worldwide.

Spread the word

Dont forget to like Scanther on Facebook and make sure to share it with all your friends!

Customers carrying smartphones willing to connect to your business' web and social media pages are walking out the door of your business in droves, without connecting. Moreover, walking out the door with the customer are your missed opportunities for sales, loyalty, and profit from that customer and all of their social media friends.
Why?
Signs directing customers to web and social media pages are, to put it kindly, prehistoric. story:
The SMS Text Home Automation System

We created the SMS Text Home Automation System to provide homeowners with low-cost, easy-to-install, wireless home monitoring for security, potential disasters, and minor mishaps that become more costly when left unattended.

While most smartphone apps simply monitor homes for security intrusions via camera or video link, this state-of-the-art, FCC-certified technology monitors for burst water pipes, power outages, flooding, and intrusions.  The SMS Text Home Automation System sends text alerts and photos directly from the installed device, eliminating costly central alarm system set-up and monthly service subscription fees. The SMS system is also completely wireless, making installation and maintenance simple and streamlined for any homeowner with a smartphone.

The system is simply designed for consumer convenience. All that is required is a separate Sim card, which is provided by your cell phone carrier.

Why We Need Your Help 

I've invested a great deal of my time and money into bringing the SMS Text Monitoring System to this point. With your help, we can purchase all of components in volume at price points that will make theSMS Text Monitoring System affordable for everyone. However, I have a lot to do before I can start shipping the SMS Text Monitoring System. By funding this project you are also helping to:

  • Finalize the packaging for all the units
  • Purchase additional test equipment for final quality control
  • Fund the development of additional devices to function with the control center

We have contracted with a manufacturing facility in Hong Kong. The facility has completed other manufacturing projects for us and we have a great deal of confidence in doing an outstanding job with this project!

About the Team

Each team member has their own story of experimenting with radio frequency and designs accessible to hobbyists & enthusiasts, and in creating low-cost professional scale projects.

Michael Reeves, Inventor

I have more than 40 years of experience as a telecommunications engineer and inventor. In addition to this enhanced, text-based home security system, I also invented the highly successful holiday light bulb tester, “The Guiding Light,” which sets of a  strobe light when 911 is dialed from inside a home, and “The Notifier,” which alerts a UPS or Federal Express delivery person if there is a package for pick-up inside a building.

The idea for this project came from my experience living in Florida, where power outages are common and lengthy, and regularly traveling to visit family in my hometown of Kankakee, Illinois. I wanted a home monitoring system that didn't require high monthly alarm company payments, or a centrally monitored, hard-wired communications system.

Nick Robinson (Engineering student/Michael Reeves' grandson)

I am an engineering student at Illinois Institute of  Technology  working with software and hardware engineers. Although this is my first project, my team members have been involved with The Edison Inventors group in Florida and together we have developed many electronic projects.

Risks and challenges

Due to the nature of the project, we have a professional lab certification for all of the devices we have developed. Therefore, all devices in the project have FCC certification. We also have sought legal advice to ensure that our equipment is in full compliance with American and international regulatory bodies.

As with any other technology project, our delivery dates can be affected by component inventory. We have tried to avoid any surprises during a production run by selecting only parts with viable stock quantities during the design phase of the SMS Text Monitoring System. Additionally, we have been in contact with distributors about their inventory.

A successful production run has been planned from the very beginning of the project. We selected a manufacturer that has experience with prototype and production runs for all boards. In using the same manufacturer all the way through, we are able to correct and avoid issues. At this time, our delivery dates are based on worst case scenario and lead times can always change. I am doing all in my power for earlier delivery and there exists a good chance of this happening.

To further ensure the quality of shipped SMS Text Monitoring System, I have run an extensive quality control and electrical tests to verify each system. The last item is to package everything in a functional and pleasing package. This is to be completed thru independent packaging service which we have used in the past.

Rewards

Contributors can order the home alarm system and all related components for a starting price of $65.00, without contracts, subscriptions or long-term commitments. All that is required for activation is a new Sim card and a text messaging subscription plan from your preferred cell phone carrier.

story:
Currently The CyanGlow Lite is only avalable, the audio version is still in beta and not offered at this time. Contact us for more info.



Entertainment on the Go.

With CyanGlow, turn your plain long board or empty room into an unforgettable experience.

Imagine riding down the street at night on your longboard as you illuminate the road with flashes of multicolored lights perfectly synced to your favorite song.

Now start to imaging the awe on the peoples faces as they see you carve through the night.

    


Not Just for Longboarders.

It's not only for longboarders, simply mount CyanGlow to a wall and make any room a party. You can choose a wall, ceiling, or table and even pair multiple CyanGlows for the ultimate party experience.



The Logistics:


The Structure:



Further Explanaition:

  • Wirelessly Control your CyanGlow with the included remote.
  • Easily attach your CyanGlow with either Velcro, double sided mounting tape or even screws for a durable hold. 
  • Option to be completely wireless; or plugged into a wall.



Your Options:


What People are saying about CyanGlow:


Upgrades and Rewards for Your Support

Obviously the more funds we get for development, the more awesome features we can bring to you. So as a whole if our campaign (with your help of course!) can reach certain milestones, we will be happy to give complementary upgrades for the contributors!

We have already created a completely wireless method for you to control your audio and lighting experience; however, depending on how much you like our product and how much funding that we receive, we can:

  • Finalize Audio Sync Technology utilizing your music to pair with your lighting experience
  • Upgrade the wireless audio to a technology better than Bluetooth® allowing multiple receivers and a higher quality audio experience.
  • Add a website feature so that you can plug in your board to a computer and customize the lights and features.

These upgrades are dependent on YOUR support, as a whole, these milestones will be set and hopefully reached, for your help, we will complimentary upgrade to whatever level that we reach by the end of the campaign.


Don't have the Funds but still want the Party?

Just because you do not have the funds does not mean that you are excluded from receiving this exclusive pre-order of CyanGlow™. 


  • Use the Indiegogo Share tool above that looks like this to track your referrals (Make sure you log in!)


Thank you for your support and hope you enjoy!

Contributors fund ideas they can be passionate about and to people they trust. Here are some things to do in this section:
story_txt:
Short Summary
Contributors fund ideas they can be passionate about and to people they trust. Here are some things to do in this section:

story:
PoliticalContributions.us has become the largest source of political contributions information in the United States. We provide a unified source of publishing campaign finance data in a clear easy to understand format.

To date we have aggregated all available information from the 2012 election cycle, but need your support to complete the publishing process for only two states California and Arizona. Additionally, we are committed to remaining the only organization that exposes this data to search engines to increase exposure for the general public. You can help us complete the journey of becoming the premier destination to increase awareness of the effect of money in politics.

In addition to providing information our organization is dedicated to advocating for greater transparency in political.  You can help us by:

     1)  Sign our online petition.  We will transmit that information to the states that do not allow digitized access to contribution data.

     2)  Join our social networks.  Twitter Facebook Linkedin 

The idea to create a repository started earlier this year and we have made tremendous progress efficiently aggregating and publishing data. We are confident that the last 15% of data will easily migrate into our existing architecture.

Our problem has been keeping up with traffic on the web server. While confident in our ability to execute the solution of upgrading servers, the chief risks are temporary server outages during migration and delays (beyond our expected 10 day implementation).

story:
Short Summary

I love everything about the 3D printing revolution and while I know its early days for everyone, I'm absolutely sure it's here to stay. I'm not an expert in designing 3D printers but I am an expert in providing 3D content which I firmly believe is just as important as the machines themselves. 

Anyone can take a photo but not everyone can take a good photo. Even less people can edit them using specialist software so, in my opinion not everyone is going to be able to model things in 3D. That’s why I want to build MediumWare into the largest library of usable 3D components available.

The plan is to start simple. I've modelled a number of different categories of standard components and created hundreds of thousands of variations. The important thing is that all these parts are designed to work so you can print usable parts for your projects - threads tighten, gears mesh & bearings roll!

I need your help because I really need you to test these parts out on your printers. Do they print OK? Do they work? What settings did you use? What's your preferred material choice? 

Your expertise and feedback here is vital to ensure this library of parts maintains the high quality standard that MediumWare set's out to achieve.

When the site goes live to the public, these parts will be downloadable via our web store and, like the Google play or Apple app stores, some will be free and some be paid for. Right now though, because I need your help as Beta testers, I'm offering full access to the entire library for just £5 which is a massive saving.

What We Need...

The funding is needed to pay for an assistant to help me incorporate all your feedback into the library. I expect this Beta testing phase will take 3 months and that it will cost approximately £5000 in wages to employ someone for this period.

... and What You Get:

As a thank you for your pledge we'll be giving you lifetime access to your selected categories, even when the site goes live. 

Remember, all our models are designed to work straight off the 3D printer so you'll have access to a huge and expanding range of working parts for your projects.  

In addition, as a valued member of our Beta testing team, you'll be the first to know about new categories, special offers and the latest MediumWare news.

What happens if I don't get all the funds?

The project will still go ahead if I don't get all the funding but it will likely take a bit longer to launch the site. What's more important is that I get your help as Beta testers because I really need your feedback to get this just right.

The Impact

By helping me to achieve my goal you'll be helping everyone in the maker community who need fast access to useful, high quality parts in order to get their projects up and running. This is just the beginning however as we'll be introducing the following categories over the coming months:

  • Pipes and fittings
  • Valves
  • Clips
  • Hinges
  • Fans
  • Pumps
  • Gearboxes
  • Wall fixings
  • Blanking Plugs
  • Pastry cutters
  • Springs

As MediumWare Beta testers we'll issue you with coupons so when these categories are released you'll get access for a significant discount. If we hit our targets with this campaign I may even be able offer them as stretch goals and incorporate them into the initial launch catalogue. 

In the future I plan to use my experience to provide fully parametric models via the site and my ultimate aim is to teach others how to do this and how to generate income by contributing to the MediumWare library. I can't stress enough that your help is vital in getting the foundations in place!!

You should also know that I've done this numerous times before and successfully created large libraries of parts as a consultant for corporate clients, so I'm absolutely sure of my approach and costings.

Other Ways You Can Help

If you can't contribute don't worry but if you're excited about the MediumWare project; please, please do your best to get the word out via the Indiegogo tools, Facebook, Twitter and Google Plus. You can also subscribe to our newsletter for updates via Mediumware.co.uk. Promoting this campaign will really help MediumWare to get the exposure it needs to make it a success.

The plan is to start simple. I've modelled a number of different categories of standard components and created hundreds of thousands of variations. The important thing is that all these parts are designed to work so you can print usable parts for your projects - threads tighten, gears mesh & bearings roll!
I need your help because I really need you to test these parts out on your printers. Do they print OK? Do they work? What settings did you use? What's your preferred material choice? 
Your expertise and feedback here is vital to ensure this library of parts maintains the high quality standard that MediumWare set's out to achieve.
When the site goes live to the public, these parts will be downloadable via our web store and, like the Google play or Apple app stores, some will be free and some be paid for. Right now though, because I need your help as Beta testers, I'm offering full access to the entire library for just £5 which is a massive saving.
What We Need...
The funding is needed to pay for an assistant to help me incorporate all your feedback into the library. I expect this Beta testing phase will take 3 months and that it will cost approximately £5000 in wages to employ someone for this period.
... and What You Get:
As a thank you for your pledge we'll be giving you lifetime access to your selected categories, even when the site goes live. 
Remember, all our models are designed to work straight off the 3D printer so you'll have access to a huge and expanding range of working parts for your projects.  
In addition, as a valued member of our Beta testing team, you'll be the first to know about new categories, special offers and the latest MediumWare news.
What happens if I don't get all the funds?
The project will still go ahead if I don't get all the funding but it will likely take a bit longer to launch the site. What's more important is that I get your help as Beta testers because I really need your feedback to get this just right.
The Impact
By helping me to achieve my goal you'll be helping everyone in the maker community who need fast access to useful, high quality parts in order to get their projects up and running. This is just the beginning however as we'll be introducing the following categories over the coming months:




Pipes and fittings
Valves
Clips
Hinges
Fans
Pumps
Gearboxes
Wall fixings
Blanking Plugs
Pastry cutters
Springs



As MediumWare Beta testers we'll issue you with coupons so when these categories are released you'll get access for a significant discount. If we hit our targets with this campaign I may even be able offer them as stretch goals and incorporate them into the initial launch catalogue. 
In the future I plan to use my experience to provide fully parametric models via the site and my ultimate aim is to teach others how to do this and how to generate income by contributing to the MediumWare library. I can't stress enough that your help is vital in getting the foundations in place!!
You should also know that I've done this numerous times before and successfully created large libraries of parts as a consultant for corporate clients, so I'm absolutely sure of my approach and costings.
Other Ways You Can HelpIf you can't contribute don't worry but if you're excited about the MediumWare project; please, please do your best to get the word out via the Indiegogo tools, Facebook, Twitter and Google Plus. You can also subscribe to our newsletter for updates via Mediumware.co.uk. Promoting this campaign will really help MediumWare to get the exposure it needs to make it a success.

story:
"You can't do sketches enough. Sketch everything and keep your curiosity fresh." 

--John Singer Sargent

Ready to ship now! 


Featured on:

About Sketchbook iPad Pro Case

Our first impression on iPad pro is clear: This is a great tool for artists and designers to carry around. It will replace the sketchbook in our backpack, which has been with us from the moment we pick up the pencil and learn how to draw a line. Modern technology has changed the way we draw, but the affection will not fade over time.

So we decided to create a case to retain this special bond with sketchbook, without sacrifice the protection and function. We present to you : The wire bound iPad pro case.

We use wire-bound to make the iPad case looks more like sketchbook, This is a bold decision. Nobody has ever try to use wire bound in iPad case, it looks fragile for a expensive device. We spent months to try different binding spines in the market. The ones we found work well, but not perfect. we were expecting something more solid.

So we decided to customize the wire, use reinforced material (Cold formed steel, 1.35mm Thickness). The final test was great, the material is hard enough and it won't jam when you open / close the case. 

To give a better protection, We used 3 layers different material:

Bicast (PU) Leather in the surface to prevent scratch 

+ Hard plastic in the middle, absorb impact

+ Microfibre inner to protect the screen

Inside we use 2 straps to secure your Apple pencil, Prevent it from scratch and missing

2 stand mode : Landscape and Portrait, for watching movie or reading

Cover options:

About us  

We are a professional tablet case company in China. Our mission is to provide stylish, funcional & durable tablet cases in competetive price. We want to creative something different for you, provide an alternative between cheap cases in poor quality and overpriced fancy cases.

story:
*The user with the most referrals will receive the War Ready package! *


Follow Our Twitter!  https://twitter.com/TheJuicerBatter


The official Facebook page!

https://www.facebook.com/pages/Thejuicerbattery/724587734266915


We are updating our Indiegogo daily! Videos to come and more information!

We are almost done with more videos! 


Visit our website! 

http://www.thejuicerbattery.com

We have fixed our paypal and now taking contributions! 


Featured Q-A:

Q)  What countries is this available for, and do i pay for shipping?

A) We will ship to all countries and offer free shipping with the slowest and lowest priority available.





By using cunning edge technology being developed by our engineers, The Juicer , will be a one of a kind battery that is influenced from previous batteries, but with a reconstructed and innovative twist, which potentially could allow our battery to charge faster and last longer than anything available on the market. A special casing aluminum frame cover for the back of the phone is also being developed to make it more environmentally friendly, allowing it to be charged by any light source; all thanks to technology found on larger solar panels but on a micro scaled level. The Juicer will be a revolutionary battery that finally uses all of the technology available in today’s world. 


The Juicer Battery-

                                       

                                           

 

                                       

  • The Juicer is a small two person company influenced by the needs of our customer. We recognized how some people would carry chargers with them all the time. We also recognized how battery power is a huge consideration when buying a new cell phone. As a project for college, our lead German engineer, Vandal Schnizel, designed a micro prototype battery, which vastly exceeded his expectations. By modifying existing battery topologies to be more power efficient, he was able to record an astonishing power density that is 1900 times greater than other lithium ion batteries. Teaming up with me, Paul Bednard, lead business and marketing for The Juicer, we had a dream to use the technology Schnizel found on a macro scale to essentially create the worlds longest lasting cell phone battery. High on dreams but short on money, we came to indiegogo to help fund our revolutionary battery. 


FASTER CHARING and longer battery-

  • The world's highest capacity battery @ 13440mAh. More than 4 times than the original capacity & slimmer than other extended battery.  We estimate on heavy use, this battery can handle up to 40+ hours of internet browsing, 48 hours of HD movie watching, or 84 hours of 3g talk time. This can manage around 30 hours of screen-on time in a battery endurance run.    
  • We estimate that this battery charges around 20-40% faster than the original factory one. Testing is still not complete, and may change after time.

  • A fiber optic USB 3.1 cable is also included. This USB cable will become the standard in the future.


   

  About the battery -                  

     

  • The Juicer uses the most innovative, groundbreaking lithium-ion battery available. 
  • Our battery reinvents typical electrode structure from standard li-ion batteries by adding a three-dimensional anode and cathode, replacing the modern two-dimensional anode and cathode, by doing so it increases the surface area; therefore, resulting in more chemical reactions to take place in the same amount of space, theoretically causing more discharge speed and charging. 
  •  Along with other groundbreaking things we can’t discuss, this would make our battery the best out there allowing it to last an estimated 25-70 percent longer than your generic smart phone battery. 

FLEXIBILITY-

Faster Charging -

Flexibility was one of our main concerns, which is why we designed multiple batterys to be able to fit into today’s most popular smart phones. 

So far we only have tested it in the Samsung Galaxy; however, we are in the process of making batteries that are able to fit in other popular smart phones on the market. So far, we have only thought about adding the phones listed below, but could consider expanding more. 

  • LG Phones
  • HTC One
  • Samsung Galaxys 
  • Sony phones  

 A new laser fiber optic USB cable is also being included.  

Fiber Optic USB 3.1 Cable Specs-    

                                                                                                                                                                                        

  1. More Durable than standard cables. 
  2. More Bendable than standard cables.              
  3. Bi Direction and dual channel. 
  4. 50 percent thinner than standard cables
  5. 75 percent lighter than standard cables. 
  6. The Type-C 3.1 connector become the new standard of usb cables which will out-date full-sized USB and micro USB.
  7.  7.9 GBPS download Speeds. USB 2.0 supports 480 mbs/sec
  8. Current range 2A-5A. Voltage range 5- 15V. Devices which consume alot of energy will be able to receive more power.
------

With breaking new technologically, we are developing new and very fast chargers but we are facing major challenges on how to shrink it to fit in other smartphones. It is only a matter of time before we relase updated bette chargers!

  • This cable, which is still being developed, is the future of USB.

Charging in the sunlight!

Since we know how inconvenient it can be to have your phone die. A new solar panel case was designed to not only keep your phone secured, but to charge your phone from any light source. 

  • We separate ourselves from the competitors by using an aluminum frame instead of a cheap plastic frame.  Our solar panels have technology found in larger solar panels, but to a nano-scaled degree, which gives us an unlimited range of motion to charge your phone, compared to other solar panels cases that must be at a 90 degree angle to the sun.
  •  The best aspect of this technology is its spectrum range of light; enabling it to be charged in the shade. Testing is still being done to a larger scale; however, we estimate that it takes an hour to charge completely in the light, and it takes two hours when cloudy.  

   The battery comes with a solar panel charging case available in different            colors and styles to appeal to the consumer.        

Goals-

-----------------------------------------------------------------------

Q)  What countries is this available for, and do i pay for shipping?

A) We will ship to all countries and offer free shipping with the slowest and lowest priority available.

-----------------------------------------------------------------------


What phones will the battery be available for? 

Hopefully we will make it for all of the top end smart phones but so far we have plans for LG phones , HTC phones, Samsung Galaxys, and Sony phones.  

----------------------------------------------------------------------

Q) How  long will it take for it to be manufactured?

A) Testing is still being done to ensure this product is safe under all weather conditions. Once it passes testing and enough money is raised, the Juicer begin manufacturing for a large. 

-----------------------------------------------------------------------

Q) How is your battery the fastest on the market?

 A) By changing what we know about how the battery works, our engineers reinvented the wheel, by creating a more efficient powerful battery by alternating its cathode and anode structures, and other secrets we can’t give out yet.  

-----------------------------------------------------------------------

Q)  How long does your battery last? 

 A) We estimate up to 50-75 percent increase to your phones battery power compared with the stock battery.  

-----------------------------------------------------------------------

Q) How long is the fiber optic USB cable?

A) The fiber optic cable is up to 3 meters long.  

-----------------------------------------------------------------------

 Q)Will the fiber optic cable be compatible with usb 3.0 and 2.0? 

 A) Yes. 

-----------------------------------------------------------------------

Q) Will the cable help it charge faster?  

A) Yes the cable will help the battery charge faster

-----------------------------------------------------------------------

Q) How fast will the battery charge? 

A)  Due to emerging advances in electrical engineering, our battery charges up to 50 percent faster than standard batteries.  

-----------------------------------------------------------------------

 Q) Will there be more color cases?

 A)  Yes, we offer the colors available above and expanding. 

-----------------------------------------------------------------------

  Q) How does the solar panel case work?  

  A) Nanotechnology which is influenced on how larger solar panels worked, inspired our engineer to create the most effective solar charging case that is available on the market?

-----------------------------------------------------------------------

Q) 'Is the battery the same size as the original factory one?

A) Yes, The Juicer Battery keeps the same dimensions as the  Galaxy S5 battery.

-----------------------------------------------------------------------

More FAQ Questions to Come!



Special Deal! 


Get the most referrals and we will offer you the War Ready for free! 

  •  The ultimate goal is to provide the maximum amount of convenience for our customer. By adding another battery, you now could potentially have up to a week of power for your mobile device. Helpful for business men and women who constantly travel will now never have to worry about missing a call.

story:
From now everyone can build a professional website

What is Webfish?

Webfish is an innovative web application for fast and easy website development. It is a first complex solution for websites creation. Style of work is similar to work in graphic editors. User doesn’t need to write code. Application is based on Drag & Drop interface. The application approaches for developers, designers and even people who doesn’t know coding.

Who needs this application?

Regular users.

Website development must be available for everyone. Now people who don’t know programming can create websites on webfish. And not only simple sites, but also a professional and multifunctional websites.

Developers.

Web developers are tired of writing the same rows of code. We need to optimize a website development process. Our app will let developers an opportunity to make websites faster and easier. Now they can concentrate on innovations creation. Technology must evaluate.

Web designers.

Now designers will be able to create websites by themselves.Designer can create a website and send link with his design in live html. So never will be difference between design and a final website. 




Why we did this?

We work in web development sphere for four years. During this time we’ve realized that web design evaluates, appear new technologies, but development methods not changing. Developer build websites in the same way like it was fifteen years ago. Same hand coding. So we decided to create an application that will combine all necessary tools for developers and designers.

Features





Timeline

We’ve worked on our application for a year. And we created  innovative platform for website development. Now Webfish can create websites based on Joomla CMS or Html or create templates for Joomla. Websites built on our application is  an automatically responsive. Website fits himself to any screen resolution. Still we need to improve our application and add more tools.


Where the money goes?

We need your help to finalize our application development and open it to a wide audience.We are very excited about this project and hope you are too. We appreciate your support and please share Webfish with your friends too!The amount of funding we require to achieve our main goals is $150,000. We hope you will find it in your heart to help us deliver this innovative and useful technology. 


Rewards

Update - 20-08-2014





Our team

We have a real passion for Internet technologies – and we obviously enjoy seeing new gadgets.  In short, we built the Webfish because we really want to use it ourselves. We believe that is the best way to innovate.
We consider it our mission to pool our talents and bring the Webfish to the wide audience of users.

Risks and challenges

It is a hard work to develop application like this.  And it is a huge engineering challenge. We need to hire more developers to finalize our application. They must be experienced professionals. And everyone must be able to work by himself.  Webfish is very easy in use, but behind this simplicity stands a year of work restless nights. We haven’t been able to take example of somebody else because there is no analogues to this application.
We are sick with idea of availability of internet technologies. We believe that during campaign on Indiegogo we will build a big community. And our community will help us to find adequate developers.
Also we need to find a high quality and fast web server. We know a couple of good servers already. So it will not be a problem.
We’ve made a giant work already, so we will solve all these tasks.

You can be a part of revolution in internet technology

Press kit

story:
Short Summary

Started only two years ago, the Westwood Robotics (also known as 221 Robotics) team has grown exponentially from just 3 members to more than 20 committed members today. Through hard work and dedication we were able to revitalize the team. This year, we were extremely proud to be titled the Alberta Vex Champions. We also represented Fort McMurray in the international Vex Championships for the first time ever.

Impact

The Vex platform provides our students with hands on experience that can be not be found in high school courses. Through this means, students are being trained to be future scientists, engineers, and entrepreneurs of our society. Students will gain leadership qualities and improve their ability to work in a team. Previously, our students went on to receive thousands of dollars in scholarships and community awards that have aided them in pursuing higher studies. 

What We Need

Although the robotics program comes with many benefits, it also comes with a big price. Currently, it costs us $2000 to send a student to the world championships. Moreover, each robotics part also comes with a hefty price. To reduce these expenses and keep growing, we need your support!

Through your support, we will use the money to lower the trip expenses, buy additional robotic parts and encourage the expansion of our Robotics team.

Moreover, we need you guys to spread the word about us. You can do so by liking our Facebook page: https://www.facebook.com/pages/Northern-Lights-Robotics/201121626730508 or by visiting our website: http://northernlightsrobotics.com
story_txt:
Short Summary
Started only two years ago,
the Westwood Robotics (also known as 221 Robotics) team has grown exponentially
from just 3 members to more than 20 committed members today. Through hard work
and dedication we were able to revitalize the team. This year, we were
extremely proud to be titled the Alberta Vex Champions. We also represented
Fort McMurray in the international Vex Championships for the first time ever.
Impact
The Vex
platform provides our students with hands on experience that can be not be
found in high school courses. Through this means, students are being trained to
be future scientists, engineers, and entrepreneurs of our society. Students
will gain leadership qualities and improve their ability to work in a team. Previously,
our students went on to receive thousands of dollars in scholarships and
community awards that have aided them in pursuing higher studies. 
What We Need
Although the robotics
program comes with many benefits, it also comes with a big price. Currently, it
costs us $2000 to send a student to the world championships. Moreover, each
robotics part also comes with a hefty price. To reduce these expenses and keep
growing, we need your support!
Through
your support, we will use the money to lower the trip expenses, buy additional
robotic parts and encourage the expansion of our Robotics team. 
Moreover,
we need you guys to spread the word about us. You can do so by liking our Facebook
page: https://www.facebook.com/pages/Northern-Lights-Robotics/201121626730508
or by visiting our website: http://northernlightsrobotics.com
